tika-s0103t0:349_5: pañhuddhāro, taṃ gahetvāva gacchati attano mahāpaññatāya, satthu ca dhammadesanāyaṃ akilāsubhāvato.
tika-s0103t0:351_0: 166. Ārocitepi tasmiṃ atthe. Sāmiko hoti, tassa sāmikabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “sova tassā
tika-s0103t0:351_1: ādimajjhapariyosānaṃ jānātī”ti āha. Evanti vacanasampaṭicchanaṃ. Cundattherena hi
tika-s0103t0:351_2: ānītaṃ kathāpābhataṃ bhagavā sampaṭicchanto “eva”nti āha. “Eva”nti durakkhāte dhammavinaye
tika-s0103t0:352_0: Yasmā …pe… pākaṭaṃ hoti byatirekamukhena ca neyyassa atthassa vibhūtabhāvāpattito.
tika-s0103t0:352_1: Atha vā yasmā…pe… pākaṭaṃ hoti dosesu ādīnavadassanena tappaṭipakkhesu guṇesu ānisaṃsassa
tika-s0103t0:352_2: vibhūtabhāvāpattito. Vokkammāti apasakketvā. Āmeḍitalopena cāyaṃ niddeso, vokkamma
tika-s0103t0:352_3: vokkammāti vuttaṃ hoti, tena tassa vokkamanassa antarantarāti ayamattho labbhatīti
tika-s0103t0:352_4: āha “na nirantara”ntiādi. Dhammānudhammapaṭipattiādayoti tena satthārā vuttamuttidhammassa
tika-s0103t0:352_5: anudhammaṃ appaṭipajjanādayo. Ādi-saddena pāḷiyaṃ āgatā asāmīcipaṭipadādayo ca saṅgayhanti.
tika-s0103t0:352_6: Manussattampīti pi-saddena “vicāraṇapaññāya asambhavo, dosesu anabhinivesitā, asandiṭṭhiparāmāsitā”ti
tika-s0103t0:352_7: evamādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. “Tathā eva”nti padehi yathākkamaṃ pakārassa kāmaṃ tirokkhatā,
tika-s0103t0:352_8: paccakkhatā vuccati, tathāpi yathā “tathā paṭipajjatū”ti padena paṭipajjanākāro niyametvā
tika-s0103t0:352_9: vihito, tathā “evaṃ paṭipajjatū”ti imināpīti idaṃ tassa atthadassanabhāvena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t0:353_0: 167. Ñāyati muttidhammo etenāti ñāyo, tena satthārā vutto dhammānudhammo, taṃ paṭipannoti
tika-s0103t0:353_1: ñāyappaṭipanno, so pana yasmā tassa muttidhammassa adhigame kāraṇasammato, tasmā
tika-s0103t0:353_2: vuttaṃ “kāraṇappaṭipanno”ti. Nipphādessatīti sādhessati, siddhiṃ gamissatīti vuttaṃ
tika-s0103t0:353_3: hoti. Dukkhanibbattakanti sampati, āyatiñca dukkhassa nibbattakaṃ. Vīriyaṃ karoti micchāpaṭipannattā.
tika-s0103t0:356_0: 170. Idha sāvakassa sammāpaṭipattiyā ekantikaapassayadassanatthaṃ satthu sammāsambuddhatā,
tika-s0103t0:356_1: dhammassa ca svākkhātatā kittitāti “sammāpaṭipannassa kulaputtassa pasaṃsaṃ dassetvā”ti
tika-s0103t0:356_2: vuttaṃ. Evañhi imissā desanāya saṃkilesabhāgiyabhāvena uṭṭhitāya vodānabhāgiyabhāvena
tika-s0103t0:356_3: yathānusandhinā pavatti dīpitā hoti. Abodhitatthāti appaveditatthā, paramatthaṃ catutthasaccapaṭivedhaṃ
tika-s0103t0:356_4: apāpitāti attho. Pāḷiyaṃ “assā”ti padaṃ “sāvakā saddhamme”ti dvīhi padehi yojetabbaṃ
tika-s0103t0:356_5: “assa sammāsambuddhassa sāvakā, assa saddhamme”ti. Sabbasaṅgahapadehi katanti sabbassa
tika-s0103t0:356_6: sāsanatthassa saṅgaṇhanapadehi ekajjhaṃ kataṃ. Tenāha “sabbasaṅgāhikaṃ kataṃ na hotīti
tika-s0103t0:356_7: attho”ti. Pubbenāparaṃ sambandhatthabhāvena saṅgahetabbatāya vā saṅgahāni padāni
tika-s0103t0:356_8: katāni etassāti saṅgahapadakataṃ, brahmacariyaṃ. Tappaṭikkhepena na ca saṅgahapadakatanti
tika-s0103t0:356_9: yojanā. Rāgādipaṭipakkhaharaṇaṃ, yathānusiṭṭhaṃ vā paṭipajjamānānaṃ vaṭṭadukkhato
tika-s0103t0:356_10: paṭiharaṇaṃ nibbānapāpanaṃ paṭihāro, so eva ā-kārassa i-kāraṃ katvā paṭihiro, paṭihiro
tika-s0103t0:356_11: eva pāṭihiro, saha pāṭihirenāti sappāṭihiraṃ, tathā suppaveditatāya sappāṭihiraṃ
tika-s0103t0:356_12: katanti sappāṭihirakataṃ. Tādisaṃ pana vaṭṭato niyyāne niyuttaṃ, niyyānappayojanañca
tika-s0103t0:356_13: hotīti āha “niyyānika”nti. Devalokatoti devalokato paṭṭhāya rūpīdevanikāyato pabhuti.
tika-s0103t0:356_14: Suppakāsitanti suṭṭhu pakāsitaṃ. Yāva devamanussehīti vā yāva devamanussehi yattakā
tika-s0103t0:356_15: devā manussā ca, tāva te sabbe abhibyāpetvā suppakāsitaṃ. Anutāpāya hotīti anutappo,
tika-s0103t0:356_16: so pana anutāpaṃ karonto viya hotīti vuttaṃ “anutāpakaro hotī”ti.
tika-s0103t0:357: 172. Thiroti ṭhitadhammo kenaci asaṃhāriyo, asekkhā sīlakkhandhādayo therakārakā dhammā.
tika-s0103t0:358: 173. Yogehi khemattāti yogehi anupaddutattā. Saddhammassāti assa saddhammassa. Assāti ca assa satthuno.
tika-s0103t0:359: 174. Upāsakā brahmacārino nāma visesato anāgāmino. Sotāpannasakadāgāminopi tādisā tathā vuccantīti “brahmacariyavāsaṃ vasamānā ariyasāvakā” icceva vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t0:360_0: 176. Sabbakāraṇasampannanti yattakehi kāraṇehi sampannaṃ nāma hoti, tehi sabbehi
tika-s0103t0:360_1: kāraṇehi sampannaṃ sampattaṃ upagataṃ paripuṇṇaṃ, samannāgataṃ vā. Imameva dhammanti
tika-s0103t0:361_0: Udakena padesaññunā attano paññāveyyattiyataṃ dassetuṃ aniyyānike atthe payuttaṃ
tika-s0103t0:361_1: paheḷikasadisaṃ vacanaṃ, bhagavatā attano sabbaññutāya niyyānike atthe yojetvā dassetuṃ
tika-s0103t0:363_0: 177. Saṅgamma samāgammāti tasmiṃyeva ṭhāne labbhamānānaṃ gativasena saṅgamma ṭhānantarato
tika-s0103t0:363_1: pakkosanena samāgatānaṃ vasena samāgamma. Tenāha “saṅgantvā samāgantvā”ti. Atthena
tika-s0103t0:363_2: atthanti padantare āgataatthena saha tattha tattha āgatamatthaṃ. Byañjanena byañjananti
tika-s0103t0:363_3: etthāpi eseva nayo. Samānentehīti samānaṃ karontehi, opammaṃ vā ānentehi. Saṅgāyitabbanti
tika-s0103t0:363_4: sammadeva gāyitabbaṃ kathetabbaṃ, taṃ pana saṅgāyanaṃ vācanāmaggoti āha “vācetabba”nti.
tika-s0103t0:364_0: 178. Tassa vā bhāsiteti tassa bhikkhuno bhāsite atthe ceva byañjane ca. Atthamicchāgahaṇaropanāni
tika-s0103t0:364_1: yathā honti, taṃ dassetuṃ “cattāro satipaṭṭhānā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Ārammaṇaṃ “satipaṭṭhāna”nti
tika-s0103t0:364_2: gaṇhāti, na satiyeva “satipaṭṭhāna”nti. “Satipaṭṭhānānī”ti byañjanaṃ ropeti tasmiṃ
tika-s0103t0:364_3: atthe, na “satipaṭṭhānā”ti. Upapannatarānīti yuttatarāni. Allīnatarānīti siliṭṭhatarāni.
tika-s0103t0:364_4: Yā cevāti liṅgavipallāsena vuttaṃ, vibhattilopena vā. Puna yā cevāti liṅgavipallāseneva
tika-s0103t0:364_5: niddeso. Neva ussādetabboti na ukkaṃsetabbo virajjhitvā vuttattā. Na apasādetabboti
tika-s0103t0:364_6: na santajjetabbo vivādapariharaṇatthaṃ. Dhāraṇatthanti upadhāraṇatthaṃ sallakkhaṇatthaṃ.
tika-s0103t0:365_0: 181. Atthena upetanti aviparītena atthena upetaṃ taṃ “ayamettha attho”ti upecca paṭijānitvā
tika-s0103t0:365_1: ṭhitaṃ. Tathārūpo ca tassa bujjhitā nāma hotīti āha “atthassa viññātāra”nti. Evametaṃ
tika-s0103t0:365_2: bhikkhuṃ pasaṃsathāti vuttanayena dhammabhāṇakaṃ amuṃ bhikkhuṃ “evaṃ lābhā no āvuso”tiādiākārena
tika-s0103t0:365_3: pasaṃsatha. Idānissa pasaṃsabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “eso hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Esāti pariyattidhammassa
tika-s0103t0:365_4: satthukiccakaraṇato, tattha cassa sammadeva avaṭṭhitabhāvato “buddho nāma esā”ti
tika-s0103t0:365_5: vutto. “Lābhā no”tiādinā cassa bhikkhūnaṃ piyagarubhāvaṃ vibhāvento satthā taṃ attano
tika-s0103t0:367_0: 182. Tatopi uttaritaranti yā pubbe sammāpaṭipannassa bhikkhuno pasaṃsanavasena “idha
tika-s0103t0:367_1: pana cunda satthā ca hoti sammāsambuddho”tiādinā pavattitadesanāya upari “idha cunda
tika-s0103t0:367_2: satthā ca loke udapādī”tiādinā desanā vaḍḍhitā. Tatopi uttaritaraṃ savisesaṃ desanaṃ
tika-s0103t0:367_4: āsavāti paccayānaṃ pariyesanahetu ceva paribhogahetu ca uppajjanakā kāmāsavādayo.
tika-s0103t0:367_5: Tesaṃ diṭṭhadhammikānaṃ āsavānaṃ “idha, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako micchāājīvaṃ pahāya
tika-s0103t0:367_6: sammāājīvena jīvitaṃ kappetī”ti “idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu paṭisaṅkhā yoniso cīvaraṃ
tika-s0103t0:367_7: paṭisevatī”tiādinā ca sammāpaṭipattiṃ upadisanto bhagavā paṭighātāya dhammaṃ deseti
tika-s0103t0:367_8: nāma. “Yo tumhesu pāḷiyā atthabyañjanāni micchā gaṇhāti, so neva ussādetabbo, na
tika-s0103t0:367_9: apasādetabbo, sādhukaṃ saññāpetabbo tasseva atthassa nisantiyā”ti evaṃ pariyattidhamme
tika-s0103t0:367_10: micchāpaṭipanne sammāpaṭipattiyaṃ bhikkhū niyojento bhagavā bhaṇḍanahetu uppajjanakānaṃ
tika-s0103t0:367_11: samparāyikānaṃ āsavānaṃ paṭighātāya dhammaṃ deseti nāma. Yathā te na pavisantīti
tika-s0103t0:367_12: te āsavā attano cittasantānaṃ yathā na otaranti. Mūlaghātena paṭihananāyāti yathā
tika-s0103t0:367_13: mūlaghāto hoti, evaṃ mūlaghātavasena pajahanāya. Tanti cīvaraṃ. Yathā cīvaraṃ idamatthikatameva
tika-s0103t0:369: 183. Sukhitanti sañjātasukhaṃ. Pīṇitanti dhātaṃ suhitaṃ. Tathābhūto pana yasmā thūlasarīro hoti, tasmā “thūlaṃ karotī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t0:370_0: 186. Naṭhitasabhāvāti anavaṭṭhitasabhāvā, evarūpāya kathāya anavaṭṭhānabhāvato sabhāvopi
tika-s0103t0:370_1: tesaṃ anavaṭṭhitoti adhippāyo. Tenāha “jivhā no atthī”tiādi. Kāmaṃ “pañcahi cakkhūhī”ti
tika-s0103t0:370_2: vuttaṃ, aggahitaggahaṇena pana cattāri cakkhūni veditabbāni. Sabbaññutaññāṇañhi samantacakkhūti.
tika-s0103t0:370_3: Tassa vā ñeyyadhammesu jānanavasena pavattiṃ upādāya “jānatā”ti vuttaṃ. Hatthāmalakaṃ
tika-s0103t0:370_4: viya paccakkhato dassanavasena pavattiṃ upādāya “passatā”ti vuttaṃ. Nemaṃ vuccati
tika-s0103t0:370_6: nikhātoti bhūmiṃ nikhanitvā sammadeva ṭhapito. Tasminti khīṇāsave. Anajjhācāro acalo
tika-s0103t0:370_7: asampavedhī, yasmā ajjhācāro setughāto khīṇāsavānaṃ. Sotāpannādayoti ettha ādi-saddena
tika-s0103t0:370_8: gahitesu anāgāmino tāva navasupi ṭhānesu khīṇāsavā viya abhabbā, sotāpannasakadāgāmino
tika-s0103t0:370_9: pana “tatiyapañcamaṭṭhānesu abhabbā”ti na vattabbā, itaresu sattasu ṭhānesu abhabbāva.
tika-s0103t0:372_0: 187. Gihibyañjanenāti gihiliṅgena. Khīṇāsavo pana gihibyañjanena arahattaṃ pattopi
tika-s0103t0:372_1: na tiṭṭhati vivekaṭṭhānassa abhāvāti adhippāyo. Tassa vasenāti bhummadevattabhāve
tika-s0103t0:372_2: ṭhatvā arahattappattassa vasena. Ayaṃ pañhoti “abhabbo so nava ṭhānāni ajjhācaritu”nti
tika-s0103t0:372_3: ayaṃ pañho āgato itarassa pabbajjāya, parinibbānena vā abhabbatāya avuttasiddhattā.
tika-s0103t0:372_4: Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ bhikkhugahaṇanti āha “bhinnadosattā”tiādi. Aparicchedanti apariyantaṃ,
tika-s0103t0:372_5: tayidaṃ suvipulanti āha “mahanta”nti. Ñeyyassa hi vipulatāya ñāṇassa vipulatā veditabbā,
tika-s0103t0:372_6: etena “apariccheda”nti vuccamānampi ñeyyaṃ satthu ñāṇassa vasena paricchedamevāti
tika-s0103t0:372_7: dassitaṃ hoti. Vuttañhetaṃ “ñāṇapariyantikaṃ neyya”nti anāgate apaññāpananti anāgate
tika-s0103t0:372_8: visaye ñāṇassa apaññāpanaṃ. “Paccakkhaṃ viya katvā”ti kasmā viya-saddaggahaṇaṃ kataṃ,
tika-s0103t0:372_9: nanu buddhānaṃ sabbampi ñāṇaṃ attano visayaṃ paccakkhameva katvā pavattati ekappamāṇabhāvatoti?
tika-s0103t0:372_10: Saccametaṃ, “akkha”nti pana cakkhādiindriyaṃ vuccati, taṃ akkhaṃ pati vattatīti cakkhādinissitaṃ
tika-s0103t0:372_11: viññāṇaṃ, tassa ca ārammaṇaṃ “paccakkha”nti loke niruḷhametanti taṃ nidassanaṃ katvā
tika-s0103t0:372_12: dassento “paccakkhaṃ viya katvā”ti avoca, na pana bhagavato ñāṇassa appaccakkhākārena
tika-s0103t0:375_0: Aññattha vihitakenāti aññasmiṃ visaye pavattitena. Saṅgāhetabbanti samaṃ katvā kathayitabbaṃ,
tika-s0103t0:375_1: kathanaṃ pana paññāpanaṃ nāma hotīti paññāpetabbanti attho vutto. Tādisanti satataṃ
tika-s0103t0:375_2: samitaṃ pavattakaṃ. Ñāṇaṃ nāma natthīti āvajjanena vinā ñāṇuppattiyā asambhavato.
tika-s0103t0:375_3: Ekākārena ca ñāṇe pavattamāne nānākārassa visayassa avabodho na siyā. Athāpi siyā,
tika-s0103t0:375_4: anirupitarūpeneva avabodho siyā, tena ca ñāṇaṃ ñeyyaṃ aññātasadisameva siyā. Na hi
tika-s0103t0:375_5: “idaṃ ta”nti vivekena anavabuddho attho ñāto nāma hoti, tasmā “carato ca tiṭṭhato
tika-s0103t0:375_6: cā”tiādi bālalāpanamattaṃ. Tenāha “yathariva bālā abyattā, evaṃ maññantī”ti.
tika-s0103t0:376_0: Satiṃ anussaratīti satānusāri, satiyānuvattanavasena pavattañāṇaṃ. Tenāha “pubbenivāsānussatisampayuttaka”nti.
tika-s0103t0:376_1: Ñāṇaṃ pesesīti ñāṇaṃ pavattesi. Sabbatthakameva ñeyyāvaraṇassa suppahīnattā appaṭihataṃ
tika-s0103t0:376_2: anivāritaṃ ñāṇaṃ gacchati pavattaticceva attho. “Bodhi vuccati catūsu maggesu ñāṇa”nti
tika-s0103t0:376_3: vacanato catumaggañāṇaṃ bodhi, tato tassa adhigatattā uppajjanakaṃ paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ
tika-s0103t0:376_4: “bodhijaṃ ñāṇaṃ uppajjatī”ti vuttaṃ. Bodhijaṃ bodhimūle jātaṃ catumaggañāṇaṃ, tañca
tika-s0103t0:376_5: kho anāgataṃ ārabbha uddissa tassa appavattiatthaṃ tathāgatassa uppajjati tassa uppannattā
tika-s0103t0:376_6: āyatiṃ punabbhavābhāvato. Kathaṃ tathāgato anāgatamaddhānaṃ ārabbha atīrakaṃ ñāṇadassanaṃ
tika-s0103t0:376_7: paññāpetīti? Atītassa pana addhuno mahantatāya atīrakaṃ ñāṇadassanaṃ tattha paññāpetīti
tika-s0103t0:376_8: ko ettha virodho. Titthiyā pana imamatthaṃ yāthāvato ajānantā – “tayidaṃ kiṃ su,
tika-s0103t0:376_9: tayidaṃ kathaṃsū”ti attano aññāṇameva pākaṭaṃ karonti. Tasmā bhagavatā sasantatipariyāpannadhammappavattiṃ
tika-s0103t0:376_10: sandhāya “aññavihitakaṃ ñāṇadassana”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Itaraṃ pana sandhāya vuccamāne
tika-s0103t0:376_11: sati tathārūpe payojane anāgatampi addhānaṃ ārabbha atīrakameva ñāṇadassanaṃ paññāpeyya
tika-s0103t0:376_12: bhagavāti anatthasaṃhitanti ayamettha atthoti āha “na idhalokatthaṃ vā paralokatthaṃ
tika-s0103t0:376_13: vā nissita”nti. Yaṃ pana sattānaṃ anatthāvahattā anatthasaṃhitaṃ, tattha setughāto
tika-s0103t0:376_14: tathāgatassa. “Bhāratayuddhasītāharaṇasadisa”nti iminā tassā kathāya yebhuyyena abhūtatthataṃ
tika-s0103t0:376_15: dīpeti. Sahetukanti ñāpakena hetunā sahetukaṃ. So pana hetu yena nidassanena sādhīyati,
tika-s0103t0:376_16: taṃ tassa kāraṇanti tena sakāraṇaṃ katvā. Yathā hi paṭiññātatthasādhanato hetu, evaṃ
tika-s0103t0:376_17: sādhakaṃ nidassananti. Yuttapattakāleyevāti yuttānaṃ pattakāle eva. Ye hi veneyyā
tika-s0103t0:376_18: tassā kathāya yuttā anucchavikā, tesaṃyeva yojane sandhāya vā kathāya patto upakārāvaho
tika-s0103t0:377_0: 188. “Tathā tatheva gadanato”ti iminā “tathāgato”ti āmeḍitalopenāyaṃ niddesoti dasseti.
tika-s0103t0:377_1: Tathā tathevāti ca dhammaatthasabhāvānurūpaṃ, veneyyajjhāsayānurūpañcāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0103t0:377_2: Diṭṭhanti rūpāyatanaṃ daṭṭhabbato, tena yaṃ diṭṭhaṃ, yaṃ dissati, yaṃ dakkhati, yaṃ
tika-s0103t0:377_3: sati samavāye passeyyaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ “diṭṭhaṃ” tveva gahitaṃ kālavisesassa anāmaṭṭhabhāvato.
tika-s0103t0:377_4: “Suta”ntiādīsupi eseva nayo. Sutanti saddāyatanaṃ sotabbato. Mutanti sanissayena
tika-s0103t0:377_5: ghānādiindriyena sayaṃ patvā pāpuṇitvā gahetabbaṃ. Tenāha “patvā gahetabbato”ti.
tika-s0103t0:377_6: Viññātanti vijānitabbaṃ, taṃ pana diṭṭhādivinimuttaṃ viññeyyanti āha “sukhadukkhādidhammāyatana”nti.
tika-s0103t0:377_7: Pattanti yathā tathā pattaṃ, hatthagataṃ adhigatanti attho. Tenāha “pariyesitvā vā
tika-s0103t0:377_8: apariyesitvā vā”ti. Pariyesitanti pattiyāmatthaṃ pariyiṭṭhaṃ, taṃ pana pattaṃ vā
tika-s0103t0:377_9: siyā appattaṃ vā ubhayathāpi pariyesitamevāti āha “pattaṃ vā appattaṃ vā”ti. Padadvayenāpi
tika-s0103t0:377_10: dvippakārampi pattaṃ, dvippakārampi pariyesitaṃ, tena tena pakārena tathāgatena abhisambuddhanti
tika-s0103t0:377_11: dasseti. Cittena anusañcaritanti copanaṃ apāpetvā citteneva anusaṃcaritaṃ, parivitakkitanti
tika-s0103t0:377_12: attho. Pītakanti ādīti ādi-saddena lohitakaodātādi sabbaṃ rūpārammaṇavibhāgaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-s0103t0:377_13: Sumanoti rāgavasena, lobhavasena, saddhādivasena vā sumano. Dummanoti byāpādavitakkavasena,
tika-s0103t0:377_14: vihiṃsāvitakkavasena vā dummano. Majjhattoti aññāṇavasena vā ñāṇavasena vā majjhatto.
tika-s0103t0:377_15: Eseva nayo sabbattha. Tattha tattha ādi-saddena saṅkhasaddo paṇavasaddo, pattagandho
tika-s0103t0:377_16: pupphagandho, pattaraso phalaraso, upādinnaṃ anupādinnaṃ, majjhattavedanā kusalakammaṃ
tika-s0103t0:378_0: Appattanti ñāṇena asampattaṃ, aviditanti attho. Tenāha “ñāṇena asacchikata”nti. Tatheva
tika-s0103t0:378_1: gatattāti tatheva ñātattā abhisambuddhattā. Gata-saddena ekatthaṃ buddhiatthanti
tika-s0103t0:378_2: attho. “Gatiatthā hi dhātavo buddhiatthā bhavantī”ti akkharacintakā.
tika-s0103t0:380_0: 189. “Asamataṃ kathetvā”ti vatvā samopi nāma koci natthi, kuto uttaritaroti dassetuṃ
tika-s0103t0:380_1: “anuttarata”nti vuttaṃ. Sā panāyaṃ asamatā, anuttaratā ca sabbaññutaṃ pūretvā ṭhitāti
tika-s0103t0:380_2: dassetuṃ “sabbaññuta”nti vuttaṃ. Sā sabbaññutā saddhammavaracakkavattibhāvena loke
tika-s0103t0:380_3: pākaṭā jātāti dassetuṃ “dhammarājabhāvaṃ kathetvā”ti vuttaṃ. Tathā sabbaññubhāvena
tika-s0103t0:380_4: ca satthā imesu diṭṭhigatavipallāsesu evaṃ paṭipajjatīti dassento “idānī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0103t0:380_5: Tattha sīhanādanti abhītanādaṃ seṭṭhanādaṃ. Seṭṭhanādo hesa, yadidaṃ ṭhapanīyassa
tika-s0103t0:380_6: pañhassa ṭhapanīyabhāvadassanaṃ. Ṭhapanīyatā cassa pāḷiāruḷhā eva “na heta”ntiādinā.
tika-s0103t0:380_7: Yathā upacitakammakilesena itthattaṃ āgantabbaṃ, tathā naṃ āgatoti tathāgato, satto.
tika-s0103t0:380_8: Tathā hi so rūpādīsu satto visattoti katvā “satto”ti ca vuccati. Itthattanti ca paṭiladdhattā
tika-s0103t0:381_0: “Atthasaṃhitaṃ na hotī”ti iminā ubhayattha vidhuratādassanena niratthakavippalāpataṃ
tika-s0103t0:381_1: tassa vādassa vibhāveti, ubhayalokatthavidhurampi samānaṃ “kiṃ nu kho vivaṭṭanissita”nti
tika-s0103t0:381_2: koci āsaṅkeyyāti tadāsaṅkānivattanatthaṃ “na ca dhammasaṃhita”nti vuttaṃ. Tenāha
tika-s0103t0:381_3: “navalokuttaradhammanissitaṃ na hotī”ti. Yadipi taṃ na vivaṭṭogataṃ hoti, vivaṭṭassa
tika-s0103t0:381_4: pana adhiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ nu khoti koci āsaṅkeyyāti tadāsaṅkānivattanatthaṃ “na ādibrahmacariyaka”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t0:382_0: 190. Kāmaṃ taṇhāpi dukkhasabhāvattā “dukkha”nti byākātabbā, pabhavabhāvena pana sā
tika-s0103t0:382_1: tato visuṃ kātabbāti “taṇhaṃ ṭhapetvā”ti vuttaṃ. Tenāha “tasseva dukkhassa pabhāvikā”tiādi.
tika-s0103t0:382_2: Nanu ca avijjādayopi dukkhassa samudayoti? Saccaṃ samudayo, tassā pana kammassa vicittabhāvahetuto,
tika-s0103t0:382_3: dukkhuppādane visesapaccayabhāvato ca sātisayo samudayaṭṭhoti sā eva suttesu tathā
tika-s0103t0:382_4: vuttā. Tenāha “taṇhā dukkhasamudayoti byākata”nti. Ubhinnaṃ appavattīti dukkhasamudayānaṃ
tika-s0103t0:382_6: atthato dassitovāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Na hi bhāvanābhisamayena vinā pariññābhisamayādayo
tika-s0103t0:382_8: yathā sātisayaṃ idhalokatthāvahaṃ, evaṃ yāva ñāṇassa tikkhavisadabhāvappattiyā abhāvena
tika-s0103t0:382_9: navalokuttaradhammasampāpakaṃ na hoti, tāva tattha tattha sampattibhave abbhudayasampatti
tika-s0103t0:382_11: navavidhampi lokuttaradhammaṃ nissāya pavattaṃ tadadhigamūpāyabhāvato. Yasmā saccasambodhaṃ
tika-s0103t0:382_12: uddissa sāsanabrahmacariyaṃ vussati, na aññadatthaṃ, tasmā etaṃ saccavavatthāpanaṃ
tika-s0103t0:384_0: 191. Taṃ mayā byākatamevāti taṃ mayā tathā byākatameva, byākātabbaṃ nāma mayā abyākataṃ
tika-s0103t0:384_1: natthīti byākaraṇāvekallena attano dhammasudhammatāya buddhasubuddhataṃ vibhāveti.
tika-s0103t0:384_2: Tenāha “sīhanādaṃ nadanto”ti. Purimuppannā diṭṭhiyo aparāparuppannānaṃ diṭṭhīnaṃ
tika-s0103t0:384_3: avassayā hontīti “diṭṭhiyova diṭṭhinissayā”ti vuttaṃ. Diṭṭhigatikāti diṭṭhigatiyo,
tika-s0103t0:384_4: diṭṭhippavattiyoti attho. Idameva dassanaṃ saccanti “sassato attā ca loko cā”ti idameva
tika-s0103t0:384_5: dassanaṃ saccaṃ amoghaṃ aviparītaṃ. Aññesaṃ vacanaṃ moghanti “asassato attā ca loko
tika-s0103t0:384_6: cā”ti evamādikaṃ aññesaṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ vacanaṃ moghaṃ tucchaṃ, micchāti attho.
tika-s0103t0:384_7: Na sayaṃ kātabboti asayaṃkāroti āha “asayaṃkato”ti, yādicchikattāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0103t0:385_0: 192. Atthi khoti ettha kho-saddo pucchāyaṃ, atthi nūti ayamettha atthoti āha “atthi
tika-s0103t0:385_1: kho idaṃ āvuso vuccatī”tiādi. Āvuso yaṃ tumhehi “sassato attā ca loko cā”ti vuccati,
tika-s0103t0:385_2: idamatthi kho idaṃ vācāmattaṃ, no natthi, tasmā vācāvatthumattato tassa yaṃ kho te
tika-s0103t0:385_3: evamāhaṃsu “idameva saccaṃ moghaṃ añña”nti, taṃ tesaṃ nānujānāmīti evamettha attho
tika-s0103t0:385_4: ca yojanā ca veditabbā. Yaṃ panettha vattabbaṃ, taṃ brahmajālaṭīkāyaṃ vuttameva.
tika-s0103t0:385_5: Diṭṭhipaññattiyāti diṭṭhiyā paññāpane “evaṃ esā diṭṭhi uppannā”ti tassā diṭṭhiyā
tika-s0103t0:385_6: samudayato, atthaṅgamato, assādato, ādīnavato, nissaraṇato ca yāthāvato paññāpane.
tika-s0103t0:385_7: Aviparītavuttiyā samena ñāṇena samaṃ kañci neva samanupassāmi. Adhipaññattīti abhiññeyyadhammapaññāpanā.
tika-s0103t0:385_8: Yaṃ ajānantā bāhirakā diṭṭhipaññattiyeva allīnāti tañca paññattito ajānantā thāmasā
tika-s0103t0:385_9: parāmāsā abhinivissa voharanti. Ettha ca yāyaṃ “diṭṭhipaññatti nāmā”ti vuttā diṭṭhiyā
tika-s0103t0:385_10: diṭṭhigatikehi evaṃ gahitatāya vibhāvanā, tattha ca bhagavato uttaritaro nāma koci
tika-s0103t0:385_11: natthi, svāyamattho brahmajāle vibhāvito eva. “Adhipaññattī”ti vuttā pana vibhāviyamānā
tika-s0103t0:385_12: lokassa nibbidāhetubhāvena bahulīkārāti tassā vasena bhagavā anuttarabhāvaṃ pavedento
tika-s0103t0:385_13: ‘neva attanā samasamaṃ samanupassāmī’ti sīhanādaṃ nadī”ti keci. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana
tika-s0103t0:385_15: “idha pana paññattiyāti etthāpi paññatti ceva adhipaññatti ca adhippetā, adhipaññattīti
tika-s0103t0:385_16: etthāpī”ti ca vuttā, ubhayassapi vasenettha bhagavā sīhanādaṃ nadīti viññāyati. Ubhayaṃ
tika-s0103t0:385_17: petaṃ atthato ekanti ca paññattibhāvasāmaññaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, na bhedābhāvato. Tenāha
tika-s0103t0:385_18: “bhedato hī”tiādi. Khandhapaññattīti khandhānaṃ “khandhā”ti paññāpanā dassanā pakāsanā
tika-s0103t0:385_19: ṭhapanā nikkhipanā. “Ācikkhati dasseti paññāpeti paṭṭhapetī”ti āgataṭṭhāne hi paññāpanā
tika-s0103t0:385_20: dassanā pakāsanā paññatti nāma, “supaññattaṃ mañcapīṭha”nti āgataṭṭhāne ṭhapanā nikkhipanā
tika-s0103t0:387_0: 196. Pajahanatthanti accantāya paṭinissajjanatthaṃ. Yasmā tena pajahanena sabbe diṭṭhinissayā
tika-s0103t0:387_1: sammadeva atikkantā honti vītikkantā, tasmā “samatikkamāyāti tasseva vevacana”nti
tika-s0103t0:387_2: avoca. Na kevalaṃ satipaṭṭhānā kathitamattā, atha kho veneyyasantāne patiṭṭhāpitāti
tika-s0103t0:387_3: dassetuṃ “desitā”ti vatvā “paññattā”ti vuttanti āha “desitāti kathitā. Paññattāti
tika-s0103t0:387_4: ṭhapitā”ti. Idāni satipaṭṭhānadesanāya diṭṭhinissayānaṃ ekantikaṃ pahānāvahabhāvaṃ
tika-s0103t0:387_5: dassetuṃ “satipaṭṭhānabhāvanāya hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha satipaṭṭhānabhāvanāyāti iminā
tika-s0103t0:387_6: tesaṃ bhāvanāya eva nesaṃ pahānaṃ, desanā pana tadupanissayabhāvato tathā vuttāti
tika-s0103t0:389_0: 199. Abhinīhārādiguṇamahattena mahanto purisoti mahāpuriso, so lakkhīyati etehīti
tika-s0103t0:389_1: mahāpurisalakkhaṇāni. Taṃ mahāpurisaṃ byañjayanti pakāsentīti mahāpurisabyañjanāni.
tika-s0103t0:389_2: Mahāpuriso nimīyati anumīyati etehīti mahāpurisanimittāni. Tenāha “ayaṃ…pe… kāraṇānī”ti.
tika-s0103t0:390_0: 200. Dhārentīti lakkhaṇapāṭhaṃ dhārenti, tena lakkhaṇāni te sarūpato jānanti, na
tika-s0103t0:390_1: pana samuṭṭhānatoti dasseti. Tenāha “no ca kho”tiādi, tena anaññasādhāraṇametaṃ,
tika-s0103t0:390_2: yadidaṃ mahāpurisalakkhaṇānaṃ kāraṇavibhāvananti dasseti. Kasmā āhāti yathāvuttassa
tika-s0103t0:390_3: suttassa samuṭṭhānakāraṇaṃ pucchati, ācariyo “aṭṭhuppattiyā anurūpattā”ti vatvā tamevassa
tika-s0103t0:390_4: aṭṭhuppattiṃ vitthārato dassetuṃ “sā panā”tiādimāha. Sabbapāliphulloti sabbaso samantato
tika-s0103t0:390_5: vikasitapuppho. Vikasanameva hi pupphassa nipphatti. Pāricchattako viyāti anussavaladdhamattaṃ
tika-s0103t0:390_6: gahetvā vadanti. Uppajjatīti labbhati, nibbattatīti attho.
tika-s0103t0:391_0: Yena kammenāti yena kusalakammunā. Yaṃ nibbattanti yaṃ yaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ nibbattaṃ. Dassanatthanti
tika-s0103t0:391_1: tassa tassa kusalakammassa sarūpato, kiccato, pavattiākāravisesato, paccayato, phalavisesato
tika-s0103t0:391_2: ca dassanatthaṃ, eteneva paṭipāṭiyā uddiṭṭhānaṃ lakkhaṇānaṃ asamuddesakāraṇavibhāvanāya
tika-s0103t0:391_3: kāraṇaṃ dīpitaṃ hoti samānakāraṇānaṃ lakkhaṇānaṃ ekajjhaṃ kāraṇadassanavasenassa
tika-s0103t0:391_4: pavattattā. Evamāhāti “bāhirakāpi isayo dhārentī”tiādinā iminā iminā pakārena āha.
tika-s0103t0:393_0: 201. “Purimaṃ jātinti purimāyaṃ jātiyaṃ, bhummatthe etaṃ upayogavacana”nti vadanti.
tika-s0103t0:393_1: “Pubbe nivutthakkhandhasantāne ṭhito”ti vacanato accantasaṃyoge vā upayogavacanaṃ.
tika-s0103t0:393_2: Yattha yattha hi jātiyaṃ mahāsatto puññakammaṃ kātuṃ ārabhati, ārabhato paṭṭhāya
tika-s0103t0:393_3: accantameva tattha puññakammappasuto hoti. Tenāha “daḷhasamādāno”tiādi. Sesapadadvayepi
tika-s0103t0:393_4: eseva nayo. Nivutthakkhandhā “jātī”ti vuttā khandhavinimuttāya jātiyā abhāvato, nibbattilakkhaṇassa
tika-s0103t0:393_5: ca vikārassa idha anupayujjanato. Jātavasenāti jāyanavasena. “Tathā”ti iminā “pubbe
tika-s0103t0:393_6: nivutthakkhandhā”ti imaṃ padaṃ upasaṃharati. Bhavanavasenāti paccayato nibbattanavasena.
tika-s0103t0:393_7: Nivutthavasenāti nivusitatāvasena. Ālayaṭṭhenāti āvasitabhāvena. Nivāsattho hi niketattho.
tika-s0103t0:394_0: Tatthāti devalokādimhi. Ādi-saddena ekaccaṃ tiracchānayoniṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Na sukaranti
tika-s0103t0:394_1: devagatiyā ekantasukhatāya, duggatiyā ekantadukkhatāya, dukkhabahulatāya ca puññakiriyāya
tika-s0103t0:394_2: okāso na sulabharūpo paccayasamavāyassa dullabhabhāvato, uppajjamānā ca sā uḷārā,
tika-s0103t0:394_3: vipulā ca na hotīti gativasenāpi khettavisesatā icchitabbā “tiracchānagate dānaṃ
tika-s0103t0:394_4: datvā sataguṇā dakkhiṇā pāṭikaṅkhitabbā, puthujjanadussīle dānaṃ datvā sahassaguṇā
tika-s0103t0:394_5: dakkhiṇā pāṭikaṅkhitabbā”ti vacanato. Manussagatiyā pana sukhabahulatāya puññakiriyāya
tika-s0103t0:394_6: okāso sulabharūpo paccayasamavāyassa ca yebhuyyena sulabhabhāvato. Yañca tattha dukkhaṃ
tika-s0103t0:394_7: uppajjati, tampi visesato puññakiriyāya upanissayo hoti, dukkhūpanisā saddhāti. Yathā
tika-s0103t0:394_8: hi ayoghanena satthake nipphādiyamāne tassa ekantato aggimhi tāpanaṃ, udakena vā
tika-s0103t0:394_9: temanaṃ chedanakiriyāsamatthatāya na visesapaccayo, tāpetvā pana samānayogato udakatemanaṃ
tika-s0103t0:394_10: tassā visesapaccayo, evameva sattasantānassa ekantadukkhasamaṅgitā dukkhabahulatā
tika-s0103t0:394_11: ekantasukhasamaṅgitā sukhabahulatā ca puññakiriyāsamatthatāya na visesapaccayo, sati
tika-s0103t0:394_12: pana samānayogato dukkhasantāpane, sukhumabrūhane ca laddhūpanissayā puññakiriyā
tika-s0103t0:394_13: samatthatāya sambhavati, tathā sati uppajjamānā puññakiriyā mahājutikā mahāvipphārā
tika-s0103t0:394_14: paṭipakkhacchedanasamatthā hoti. Tasmā manussabhāvo puññakiriyāya visesapaccayo.
tika-s0103t0:394_15: Tena vuttaṃ “tattha na sukaraṃ, manussabhūtasseva sukara”nti.
tika-s0103t0:395_0: Atha “manussabhūtassā”ti ettha ko vacanattho? “Manassa ussannatāya manussāti, sūrabhāvasatimantatābrahmacariyayogyatādiguṇavasena
tika-s0103t0:395_1: upacitamanakā ukkaṭṭhaguṇacittāti attho. Ke pana te? Jambudīpavāsino sattavisesā. Tenāha bhagavā –
tika-s0103t0:396: ‘Tīhi, bhikkhave, ṭhānehi jambudīpakā manussā uttarakuruke ca manusse adhiggaṇhanti deve ca tāvatiṃse. Katamehi tīhi? Sūrā satimanto idha brahmacariyavāso’ti.
tika-s0103t0:397_0: Tathā hi buddhā bhagavanto, paccekabuddhā, aggasāvakā, mahāsāvakā, cakkavattino,
tika-s0103t0:397_1: aññe ca mahānubhāvā sattā tattheva uppajjanti. Te hi samānarūpāditāya pana saddhiṃ
tika-s0103t0:397_2: parittadīpavāsīhi itaramahādīpavāsinopi manussā tveva paññāyiṃsū”ti keci. Apare pana
tika-s0103t0:397_3: bhaṇanti “lobhādīhi, alobhādīhi ca sahitassa manassa ussannatāya manussā. Ye hi sattā
tika-s0103t0:397_4: manussajātikā, tesu visesato lobhādayo, alobhādayo ca ussannā, te lobhādiussannatāya
tika-s0103t0:397_5: apāyamaggaṃ, alobhādiussannatāya sugatimaggaṃ, nibbānagāmimaggañca paripūrenti, tasmā
tika-s0103t0:397_6: lobhādīhi, alobhādīhi ca sahitassa manassa ussannatāya parittadīpavāsīhi saddhiṃ
tika-s0103t0:397_7: catudīpavāsino sattavisesā manussāti vuccantī”ti. Lokiyā pana “manuno apaccabhāvena
tika-s0103t0:397_8: manussā”ti vadanti. Manu nāma paṭhamakappiko lokamariyādāya ādibhūto sattānaṃ hitāhitavidhāyako
tika-s0103t0:397_9: kattabbākattabbatāsu niyojanatāvasena pituṭṭhāniyo, yo sāsane “mahāsammato”ti vuccati
tika-s0103t0:397_10: amhākaṃ mahābodhisatto, paccakkhato, paramparā ca tassa ovādānusāsaniyaṃ ṭhitā sattā
tika-s0103t0:397_11: puttasadisatāya “manussā, mānusā”ti ca vuccanti. Tato eva hi te “mānavā, manujā”ti
tika-s0103t0:397_12: ca voharīyanti. Manussabhūtassāti manussesu bhūtassa jātassa, manussabhāvaṃ vā pattassāti
tika-s0103t0:397_13: attho. Ayañca nayo lokiyamahājanassa vasena vutto. Mahābodhisattānaṃ pana santānassa
tika-s0103t0:397_14: mahābhinīhārato paṭṭhāya kusaladhammapaṭipattiyaṃ sammadeva abhisaṅkhatattā tesaṃ
tika-s0103t0:397_15: sugatiyaṃ, attano uppajjanaduggatiyañca nibbattānaṃ kusalakammaṃ garutaramevāti dassetuṃ
tika-s0103t0:398_0: Evarūpe attabhāveti hatthiādiattabhāve. Ṭhitena katakammaṃ na sakkā sukhena dīpetuṃ
tika-s0103t0:398_1: loke appaññātarūpattā. Sukhena dīpetuṃ “asukasmiṃ dese asukasmiṃ nagare asuko nāma
tika-s0103t0:398_2: rājā, brāhmaṇo hutvā imaṃ kusalakammaṃ akāsī”ti evaṃ suviññāpayabhāvato. Thiraggahaṇoti
tika-s0103t0:398_3: asithilaggāhī thāmappattaggahaṇo. Niccalaggahaṇoti acañcalaggāhī tattha kenacipi
tika-s0103t0:398_4: asaṃhāriyo. Paṭikuṭatīti saṃkuṭati, jigucchanavasena vivaṭṭati vā. Pasāriyatīti vitthataṃ
tika-s0103t0:399: Taveso mahāsamuddasadisoti eso udakogho teva mahāsamuddasadiso.
tika-s0103t0:400_0: Dīyati etenāti dānaṃ, pariccāgacetanā. Diyyanavasenāti deyyadhammassa pariyattaṃ
tika-s0103t0:400_1: katvā pariccajanavasena dānaṃ. Saṃvibhāgakaraṇavasenāti tasseva attanā saddhiṃ parassa
tika-s0103t0:400_2: saṃvibhajanavasena saṃvibhāgo, tathāpavattā cetanā. Sīlasamādāneti sīlassa sammadeva
tika-s0103t0:400_3: ādāne, gahaṇe pavattaneti attho. Taṃ pavattikālena dassento “pūraṇakāle”ti āha. Mātu
tika-s0103t0:400_4: hito matteyyo, yassa pana dhammassa vasena so “matteyyo”ti vuccati, so matteyyatāti
tika-s0103t0:400_6: aññamaññavisiṭṭhesu aññesu, te pana kusalabhāvena vuttā kusalāti āha “evarūpesū”ti.
tika-s0103t0:400_7: Adhikusalesūti abhivisiṭṭhesu kusalesu, sā pana abhivisiṭṭhatā upādāyupādāya hoti.
tika-s0103t0:400_8: Yaṃ panettha ukkaṃsagataṃ adhikusalaṃ, tadukkaṃsanayena idhādhippetanti taṃ dassetuṃ
tika-s0103t0:400_9: “atthi kusalā, atthi adhikusalā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Nanu paññāpāramisaṅgahañāṇasambhārabhūtā
tika-s0103t0:400_10: kusalā dhammā nippariyāyena sabbaññutaññāṇapaṭilābhapaccayā kusalā nāma, ime pana
tika-s0103t0:400_11: mahāpurisalakkhaṇanibbattakā puññasambhārabhūtā kasmā tathā vuttāti? Sabbesampi mahābodhisattasantānagatānaṃ
tika-s0103t0:400_13: hi mahāpuriso yaṃ kiñci puññaṃ karoti, sabbaṃ taṃ sammāsambodhisamadhigamāyeva pariṇāmeti.
tika-s0103t0:400_14: Tathā hi sasambhārābyāso, dīghakālābyāso, nirantarābyāso, sakkaccābyāsoti cattāro
tika-s0103t0:401_0: Sakimpīti pi-saddena anekavārampi kataṃ vijātiyena antaritaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Abhiṇhakaraṇenāti
tika-s0103t0:401_1: bahulīkārena. Upacitanti uparūpari vaḍḍhitaṃ. Piṇḍīkatanti piṇḍaso kataṃ. Rāsīkatanti
tika-s0103t0:401_2: rāsibhāvena kataṃ. Anekakkhattuñhi pavattiyamānaṃ kusalakammaṃ santāne tathāladdhaparibhāvanaṃ
tika-s0103t0:401_3: piṇḍībhūtaṃ viya, rāsībhūtaṃ viya ca hoti. Vipākaṃ pati saṃhaccakāribhāvattā cakkavāḷaṃ
tika-s0103t0:401_4: atisambādhaṃ bhavaggaṃ atinīcaṃ, sace pane taṃ rūpaṃ siyāti adhippāyo. Vipulattāti
tika-s0103t0:401_5: mahantattā. Yasmā pana taṃ kammaṃ mettākaruṇāsatisampajaññāhi pariggahitatāya durasamussāritaṃ
tika-s0103t0:401_6: pamāṇakaraṇadhammanti pamāṇarahitatāya “appamāṇa”nti vattabbataṃ arahati, tasmā “appamāṇattā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t0:402_0: Adhibhavatīti phalassa uḷārabhāvena abhibhuyya tiṭṭhati. Atthato paṇītapaṇītānaṃ
tika-s0103t0:402_1: bhogānaṃ paṭilābho evāti āha “atirekaṃ labhatī”ti. Adhigacchatīti vindati, nibbattamānova
tika-s0103t0:402_2: tena samannāgato hotīti attho. Ekadesena aphusitvā sabbappadesehi phusanato sabbappadesehi
tika-s0103t0:402_3: phusantiyo etesaṃ pādatalānaṃ santīti “sabbāvantehi pādatalehī”ti vuttaṃ. Yathā nikkhipane
tika-s0103t0:402_4: sabbe pādatalappadesā saṃhaccakārino aninnatāya samabhāvato, evaṃ uddharaṇepīti vuttaṃ
tika-s0103t0:402_5: “samaṃ phusati, samaṃ uddharatī”ti. Idāni imassa mahāpurisalakkhaṇassa samadhigamena
tika-s0103t0:402_7: Tattha narakanti āvāṭaṃ. Anto pavisati samabhāvāpattiyā. “Cakkalakkhaṇena patiṭṭhātabbaṭṭhāna”nti
tika-s0103t0:402_8: idaṃ yaṃ bhūmippadesaṃ pādatalaṃ phusati, tattha cakkalakkhaṇampi phusanavasena patiṭṭhātīti
tika-s0103t0:402_9: katvā vuttaṃ. Tassa pana tathā patiṭṭhānaṃ suppatiṭṭhitapādatāya evāti suppatiṭṭhitapādatāya
tika-s0103t0:402_11: sīlappabhāvena. Puññatejenāti kusalappabhāvena. Dhammatejenāti ñāṇappabhāvena. Tīhipi
tika-s0103t0:402_12: padehi bhagavato buddhabhūtassa dhammā gahitā, “dasannaṃ pāramīna”nti iminā buddhakaradhammā gahitā.
tika-s0103t0:403_1: padehi theyyābhāvova vuttoti āha “niccora”ntiādi. Kharasamphassaṭṭhenāti ghaṭṭanena
tika-s0103t0:403_3: “Akhila”ntiādinā ekacārīhi corābhāvo vutto, “nirabbuda”nti iminā pana gaṇabandhavasena
tika-s0103t0:403_4: vicaraṇacorābhāvo vuttoti dassetuṃ “gumbaṃ gumbaṃ hutvā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Avikkhambhanīyoti
tika-s0103t0:403_5: na vibandhanīyo kenaci appaṭibāhanīyo ṭhānato anikkaḍḍhanīyo. Paṭipakkhaṃ aniṭṭhaṃ
tika-s0103t0:403_6: atthetīti paccatthiko, etena pākaṭabhāvena virodhaṃ akaronto veripuggalo vutto. Paṭiviruddho
tika-s0103t0:403_7: amitto paccāmitto, etena pākaṭabhāvena virodhaṃ karonto veripuggalo vutto. Vikkhambhetuṃ
tika-s0103t0:403_8: nāsakkhiṃsu, aññadatthu sayameva vighātabyasanaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu ceva sāvakattañca pavedesuṃ.
tika-s0103t0:404_0: “Kamma”ntiādīsu kammaṃ nāma buddhabhāvaṃ uddissa katūpacito lakkhaṇasaṃvattaniyo
tika-s0103t0:404_2: puññasambhārassa karaṇakāle kenaci akampanīyassa daḷhāvatthitabhāvassa anucchaviko
tika-s0103t0:404_4: svāyaṃ nimittabhāvo tasseva lakkhaṇassāti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “kammasarikkhakaṃ nāma…pe…
tika-s0103t0:404_5: mahāpurisalakkhaṇa”nti vuttaṃ. Ṭhānagamanesu pādānaṃ daḷhāvatthitabhāvo lakkhaṇaṃ
tika-s0103t0:404_6: nāma. Pādānaṃ bhūmiyaṃ samaṃ nikkhipanaṃ, pādatalānaṃ sabbabhāgehi phusanaṃ, samameva
tika-s0103t0:404_7: uddharaṇaṃ, tasmā suṭṭhu samaṃ sabbabhāgehi patiṭṭhitā pādā etassāti suppatiṭṭhitapādo,
tika-s0103t0:404_8: tassa bhāvo suppatiṭṭhitapādatāti vuccati lakkhaṇaṃ. Suṭṭhu samaṃ bhūmiyā phusaneneva
tika-s0103t0:404_9: hi nesaṃ tattha daḷhāvatthitabhāvo siddho, yaṃ “kammasarikkhaka”nti vuttaṃ. Lakkhaṇānisaṃsoti
tika-s0103t0:404_10: lakkhaṇapaṭilābhassa udrayo, lakkhaṇasaṃvattaniyassa kammassa ānisaṃsaphalanti attho.
tika-s0103t0:405_1: Gāthābandhaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, attho pana apubbaṃ natthīti adhippāyo. Porāṇakattherāti
tika-s0103t0:405_2: aṭṭhakathācariyā. Vaṇṇanāgāthāti thomanāgāthā vuttamevatthaṃ gahetvā thomanāvasena
tika-s0103t0:405_3: pavattattā. Aparabhāge therā nāma pāḷiṃ, aṭṭhakathañca potthakāropanavasena samāgatā
tika-s0103t0:405_4: mahātherā, ye sāṭṭhakathaṃ piṭakattayaṃ potthakāruḷhaṃ katvā saddhammaṃ addhaniyaciraṭṭhitikaṃ
tika-s0103t0:405_6: tadatthassa sukhaggahaṇatthaṃ gāthābandhavasena uddharaṇato atthuddhārabhūto, tayidaṃ
tika-s0103t0:405_7: pāḷiyaṃ āgatapadāni gahetvā gāthābandhavasena tadatthavicāraṇabhāvadassanaṃ, na pana
tika-s0103t0:406_0: Kusaladhammānaṃ vacīsaccassa bahukārataṃ, tappaṭipakkhassa ca musāvādassa mahāsāvajjataṃ
tika-s0103t0:406_1: dassetuṃ anantarameva kusalakammapathadhamme vadantopi tato vacīsaccaṃ nīharitvā
tika-s0103t0:406_2: katheti sacceti vā sannidhāneva “dhamme”ti vuccamānā kusalakammapathadhammā eva yuttāti
tika-s0103t0:406_3: vuttaṃ “dhammeti dasakusalakammapathadhamme”ti. Gobalībaddañāyena vā ettha attho
tika-s0103t0:406_5: gahitanti itarampi saṅgahetvā dassetuṃ saṃyamasseva gahaṇaṃ katanti “saṃyameti sīlasaṃyame”ti
tika-s0103t0:406_6: vuttaṃ. Suci vuccati puggalo yassa dhammassa vasena, taṃ soceyyaṃ, kāyasucaritādi.
tika-s0103t0:406_7: Etasseva hi vibhāgassa dassanatthaṃ vuttampi cetaṃ puna vuttaṃ, manosoceyyaggahaṇena
tika-s0103t0:406_10: samācaritabbaṃ puññakammaṃ uposatho sahacaraṇañāyena. “Avihiṃsāyāti sattānaṃ aviheṭhanāyā”ti
tika-s0103t0:406_11: vadanti, taṃ pana sīlaggahaṇeneva gahitaṃ. Tasmā avihiṃsāyāti karuṇāyāti attho. Avihiṃsāggahaṇeneva
tika-s0103t0:406_12: cettha appamaññāsāmaññena cattāropi brahmavihārā upacārāvatthā gahitā lakkhaṇahāranayena.
tika-s0103t0:406_13: Sakalanti anavasesaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ. Evamettha kāmāvacarattabhāvapariyāpannattā lakkhaṇassa
tika-s0103t0:406_15: dvādasadhā vibhattā eva. Gāthāyaṃ “sacce”tiādinā dasadhā saṅgayha dassitā. Esa nayo sesalakkhaṇepi.
tika-s0103t0:407_0: Aṃnubhīti gāthāsukhatthaṃ akāraṃ sānunāsikaṃ katvā vuttaṃ. Byañjanāni lakkhaṇāni
tika-s0103t0:407_1: ācikkhantīti veyañjanikā. Vikkhambhetabbanti paṭibāhitabbaṃ tassāti mahāpurisassa,
tika-s0103t0:407_2: tassa vā mahāpurisalakkhaṇassa. Lakkhaṇasīsena cettha taṃsaṃvattanikapuññasambhāro vuccati.
tika-s0103t0:409_0: 204. Bhayaṃ nāma bhīti, taṃ pana ubbijjanākārena, uttasanākārena ca pavattiyā duvidhanti
tika-s0103t0:409_1: āha “ubbegabhayañceva uttāsabhayañcā”ti. Tadubhayampi bhayaṃ vibhāgena dassetuṃ “tatthā”tiādi
tika-s0103t0:409_2: vuttaṃ. Apanūditāti yathā corādayo viluppanabandhanādīni parassa na karonti, katañca
tika-s0103t0:409_3: paccāharaṇādinā paṭipākatikaṃ hoti, evaṃ yathā ca caṇḍahatthiādayo dūrato parivajjitā
tika-s0103t0:409_4: honti, aparivajjite tassa yathā ṭhāne ṭhitehi abhibhavo na hoti, evaṃ apanūditā.
tika-s0103t0:409_5: Ativāhetīti atikkāmeti. Taṃ ṭhānanti taṃ sāsaṅkaṭṭhānaṃ. Asakkontānanti upayogatthe
tika-s0103t0:409_6: sāmivacanaṃ, asakkonteti attho. Asakkontānanti vā anādare sāmivacanaṃ. Saha parivārenāti
tika-s0103t0:409_7: saparivāraṃ. Tattha kiñci deyyadhammaṃ dento yadā tassa parivārabhāvena aññampi deyyadhammaṃ
tika-s0103t0:409_8: deti, evaṃ tassa taṃ dānamayaṃ puññaṃ saparivāraṃ nāma hoti.
tika-s0103t0:410_0: Tamatthaṃ vitthārena dassetuṃ “tattha anna”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha yathā deyyadhammaṃ
tika-s0103t0:410_1: tassa annadānassa parivāro, evaṃ tassa sakkaccakaraṇaṃ pīti dassento “atha kho”tiādimāha.
tika-s0103t0:410_2: Yāgubhattaṃ datvāva adāsīti yojanā. Esa nayo ito paratopi. Suttaṃ vaṭṭetīti cīvarassa
tika-s0103t0:410_3: sibbanasuttakaṃ duvaṭṭativaṭṭādivasena vaṭṭitaṃ akāsi. Rajananti alliādirajanavatthuṃ.
tika-s0103t0:411_0: Heṭṭhimānīti annādīni cattāri. Nisadaggahaṇeneva nisadapotopi gahito. Cīnapiṭṭhaṃ
tika-s0103t0:411_2: suṭṭhu vibhattaantarāni, etena cakkāvayavaṭṭhānānaṃ suparicchinnataṃ dasseti.
tika-s0103t0:412_0: Laddhābhisekā khattiyā attano vijite visavitāya brāhmaṇādike catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi
tika-s0103t0:412_1: rañjetuṃ sakkonti, na itarāti āha “rājānoti abhisittā”ti. Rājato yathāladdhagāmanigamādiṃ
tika-s0103t0:412_2: issaravatāya bhuñjantīti bhojakā, tādiso bhogo etesaṃ atthi, tattha vā niyuttāti
tika-s0103t0:412_3: bhogikā, te eva “bhogiyā”ti vuttā. Saparivāraṃ dānanti vuttanayena saparivāradānaṃ.
tika-s0103t0:412_4: Jānātūti “sadevako loko jānātū”ti iminā viya adhippāyena nibbattaṃ cakkalakkhaṇanti
tika-s0103t0:412_5: lakkhaṇasseva kammasarikkhatā dassitā. Evaṃ sati tikameva siyā, na catukkaṃ, tasmā
tika-s0103t0:412_6: cakkalakkhaṇassa mahāparivāratāya ñāpakanimittabhāvo kammasarikkhakaṃ nāma. Tenevāha
tika-s0103t0:412_7: “saparivāraṃ…pe… jānātūti nibbatta”nti. “Dīghāyukatāya taṃ nimitta”nti ca vakkhati,
tika-s0103t0:412_8: tathā “taṃ lakkhaṇaṃ bhavati tadatthajotaka”nti ca. Nissandaphalaṃ pana paṭipakkhābhibhavo
tika-s0103t0:413: 205. Etanti etaṃ gāthābandhabhūtaṃ vacanaṃ, taṃ panatthato gāthā evāti āha “imā tadatthaparidīpanā gāthā vuccantī”ti.
tika-s0103t0:414_0: Puratthāti vā “pure”ti vuttatopi pubbe. Yasmā mahāpuriso na atītāya ekajātiyaṃ, nāpi
tika-s0103t0:414_1: katipayajātīsu, atha kho purimapurimatarāsu tathāva paṭipanno, tasmā tattha paṭipattiṃ
tika-s0103t0:414_2: dassetuṃ “pure puratthā”ti vuttaṃ. Imissāpi jātiyaṃ atītakālavasena “purepuratthā”ti
tika-s0103t0:414_3: vattuṃ labbhāti tato visesanatthaṃ “purimāsu jātīsū”ti vuttanti āha “imissā”tiādi.
tika-s0103t0:414_4: Keci “imissā jātiyā pubbe tusitadevaloke katakammapaṭikkhepavacana”nti vadanti, taṃ
tika-s0103t0:414_5: tesaṃ matimattaṃ tattha tādisassa katakammassa abhāvato. Apanūdanoti apanetā. Adhimuttoti yuttapayutto.
tika-s0103t0:415_0: Puññakammenāti dānādipuññakammena. Evaṃ santeti satamattena puññakammena ekekaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ
tika-s0103t0:415_1: nibbatteyya, evaṃ sati. Na rocayiṃsūti kevalaṃ satamattena puññakammena lakkhaṇanibbattiṃ
tika-s0103t0:415_2: na rocayiṃsu aṭṭhakathācariyā. Kathaṃ pana rocayiṃsūti āha “anantesu panā”tiādi.
tika-s0103t0:415_3: Ekekaṃ kammanti ekekaṃ dānādipubbakammaṃ. Ekekaṃ sataguṇaṃ katvāti anantāsu lokadhātūsu
tika-s0103t0:415_4: yattakā sattā, tehi sabbehi paccekaṃ satakkhattuṃ katāni dānādipuññakammāni yattakāni,
tika-s0103t0:415_5: tato ekekaṃ puññakammaṃ mahāsattena sataguṇaṃ kataṃ “sata”nti adhippetaṃ, tasmā idha
tika-s0103t0:415_6: sata-saddo bahubhāvapariyāyo, na saṅkhyāvacanoti dasseti “satagghi sataṃ devamanussā”tiādīsu
tika-s0103t0:417_0: 206. Sarasacuti nāma jātassa sattassa yāvajīvaṃ jīvitvā pakatiyā maraṇaṃ. Ākaḍḍhajiyassa
tika-s0103t0:417_1: dhanudaṇḍassa viya pādānaṃ antomukhaṃ kuṭilatāya antovaṅkapādatā. Bahimukhaṃ kuṭilatāya
tika-s0103t0:417_2: bahivaṅkapādatā. Pādatalassa majjhe ūnatāya ukkuṭikapādatā. Aggapādena khañjanakā
tika-s0103t0:417_3: aggakoṇḍā. Paṇhippadesena khañjanakā paṇhikoṇḍā. Unnatakāyenāti anonatabhāvena samussitasarīrena.
tika-s0103t0:417_4: Muṭṭhikatahatthāti āvudhādīnaṃ gahaṇatthaṃ katamuṭṭhihatthā. Phaṇahatthakāti aññamaññaṃ
tika-s0103t0:417_5: saṃsaṭṭhaṅgulihatthā. Idamettha kammasarikkhakanti idaṃ imesaṃ tiṇṇampi lakkhaṇānaṃ
tika-s0103t0:417_6: tathāgatassa dīghāyukatāya ñāpakanimittabhāvo ettha āyatapaṇhitā, dīghaṅgulitā brahmujugattatāti
tika-s0103t0:417_7: etasmiṃ lakkhaṇattaye kammasarikkhakattaṃ. Nissandaphalaṃ pana anantarāyatādi daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0103t0:418_1: tadabhāvatoti āha “yathā mayhaṃ maraṇato bhayaṃ mama jīvitaṃ piya”nti. Suciṇṇenāti
tika-s0103t0:419_0: Cavitvāti saggato cavitvā. “Sujātagatto subhujo”ti ādayo sarīrāvayavaguṇā imehi lakkhaṇehi
tika-s0103t0:419_1: avinābhāvinoti dassetuṃ vuttā. Cirayapanāyāti attabhāvassa cirakālaṃ pavattanāya.
tika-s0103t0:419_2: Tenāha “dīghāyukabhāvāyā”ti. Tatoti cakkavattī hutvā yāpanato. Vasippattoti jhānādīsu
tika-s0103t0:419_3: vasībhāvañceva cetovasibhāvañca patto hutvā, kathaṃ iddhibhāvanāya iddhipādabhāvanāyāti
tika-s0103t0:421_0: 208. Raso jāto etesanti rasitāni, mahārasāni. Tenāha “rasasampannāna”nti. Piṭṭhakhajjakādīnīti
tika-s0103t0:421_1: pūpasakkhalimodakādīni. Ādi-saddena pana kadaliphalādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Piṭṭhaṃ pakkhipitvā
tika-s0103t0:422: Idha kammasarikkhakaṃ nāma sattussadatālakkhaṇassa paṇītalābhitāya ñāpakanimittabhāvo. Iminā nayena tattha tattha lakkhaṇe kammasarikkhakaṃ niddhāretvā yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0103t0:423_0: 209. Uttamo aggarasadāyakoti sabbasattānaṃ uttamo lokanātho aggānaṃ paṇītānaṃ rasānaṃ
tika-s0103t0:423_1: dāyako. Uttamānaṃ aggarasānanti paṇītesupi paṇītarasānaṃ. Khajjabhojjādijotakanti
tika-s0103t0:423_3: kāraṇūpacārena vadati. Tadatthajotakanti vā tassa paṇītabhojanadāyakattasaṅkhātassa
tika-s0103t0:423_4: atthassa jotakaṃ. Tadādhigacchatīti ettha ā-kāro nipātamattanti āha “taṃ adhigacchatī”ti.
tika-s0103t0:426_0: Sabbanti sabbaṃ upakāraṃ. Makkhetvā nāseti makkhibhāve ṭhatvā. Telena viya makkhetīti
tika-s0103t0:426_1: satadhotatelena makkheti viya. Atthasaṃvaḍḍhanakathāyāti hitāvahakathāya. Kathāgahaṇañcettha
tika-s0103t0:426_2: nidassanamattaṃ. Paresaṃ hitāvaho kāyapayogopi atthacariyā. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana vacīpayogavaseneva atthacariyā vuttā.
tika-s0103t0:427_0: Samānattatāyāti sadisabhāve samānaṭṭhāne ṭhapanena, taṃ panassa samānaṭṭhāne ṭhapanaṃ
tika-s0103t0:427_1: attasadisatākaraṇaṃ, sukhena ekasambhogatā, attano sukhuppattiyaṃ; tassa ca dukkhuppattiyaṃ
tika-s0103t0:427_2: tena attano ekasambhogatāti āha “samānasukhadukkhabhāvenā”ti. Sā ca samānasukhadukkhatā
tika-s0103t0:427_3: ekato nisajjādinā pākaṭā hotīti taṃ dassento “ekāsane”tiādimāha. Na hi sakkā ekaparibhogo
tika-s0103t0:427_4: kātuṃ jātiyā hīnattā. Tathā akariyamāne ca so kujjhati bhogena adhikattā, tasmā dussaṅgaho.
tika-s0103t0:427_5: Na hi so ekaparibhogaṃ icchati jātiyā hīnabhāvato. Na akariyamāne ca kujjhati bhogena
tika-s0103t0:427_6: hīnabhāvato. Ubhohīti jātibhogehi. Sadisopi susaṅgaho ekasadisabhāveneva itarena
tika-s0103t0:427_7: saha ekaparibhogassa paccāsīsāya, akaraṇe ca tassa kujjhanassābhāvato. Adīyamānepi
tika-s0103t0:427_8: kismiñci āmise akariyamānepi saṅgahe. Na pāpakena cittena passati pesalabhāvato.
tika-s0103t0:427_9: Tato eva paribhogopi…pe… hoti. Evarūpanti gihī ce, ubhohi sadisaṃ; pabbajito ce,
tika-s0103t0:428: Susaṅgahitāva hontīti suṭṭhu saṅgahitā eva honti daḷhabhattibhāvato. Tenāha “na bhijjantī”ti.
tika-s0103t0:430_0: 211. Anavaññātena aparibhūtena sambhāvitena. Pamodo vuccati hāso, na appamodenāti
tika-s0103t0:430_1: ettha paṭisedhadvayena so eva vutto. So ca odagyasabhāvattā na dīno dhammūpasañhitattā
tika-s0103t0:430_2: na gabbhayuttoti āha “na dīnena na gabbhitenāti attho”ti. Sattānaṃ agaṇhanaguṇenāti yojanā.
tika-s0103t0:431_0: Atiruciranti ativiya rucirakataṃ, taṃ pana passantānaṃ pasādāvahanti āha “supāsādika”nti.
tika-s0103t0:431_1: Suṭṭhu chekanti ativiya sundaraṃ. Vidhātabboti vidhātuṃ sandisituṃ sakkuṇeyyo. Piyaṃ
tika-s0103t0:431_2: vadatīti piyavadū yathā “sabbavidū”ti. Sukhameva sukhatā, taṃ sukhataṃ. Dhammañca
tika-s0103t0:433_2: veditabbā. Nidaṃsesīti sandassesi te dhamme paccakkhe katvā pakāsesi. Nidaṃsanakathanti
tika-s0103t0:433_3: pākaṭakaraṇakathaṃ. Jeṭṭhaṭṭhena aggo, pāsaṃsaṭṭhena seṭṭho, pamukhaṭṭhena pāmokkho,
tika-s0103t0:433_4: padhānaṭṭhena uttamo, hitasukhatthikehi pakārato varaṇīyato rajanīyato pavaroti evaṃ
tika-s0103t0:433_5: atthavisesavācīnampi “aggo”tiādīnaṃ padānaṃ bhāvatthassa bhedābhāvato “sabbāni aññamaññavevacanānī”ti āha.
tika-s0103t0:434_0: Uddhaṅgamanīyāti suṇantānaṃ uparūpari visesaṃ gamentīti uddhaṅgamanīyā. Saṅkhāya
tika-s0103t0:434_1: adho piṭṭhipādasamīpe eva patiṭṭhitattā adhosaṅkhā pādā etassāti adhosaṅkhapādo.
tika-s0103t0:436: Suṭṭhu saṇṭhitāti sammadeva saṇṭhitā. Piṭṭhipādassa upari pakatiaṅgulena caturaṅgule jaṅghāpadese nigūḷhā apaññāyamānarūpā hutvā ṭhitāti attho.
tika-s0103t0:438_1: ājīvavidhiṃ. Jīvikatthaṃ, sattānaṃ upakāratthañca veditabbaṭṭhena vijjā, mantasatthādi.
tika-s0103t0:438_2: Caranti tena sugatiṃ, sukhañca gacchantīti caraṇaṃ. Kammassakatāñāṇaṃ uttarapadalopena
tika-s0103t0:438_3: “kamma”nti vuttanti āha “kammanti kammassakatājānanapaññā”ti. Tāni cevāti pubbe vuttahatthiādīni
tika-s0103t0:438_4: ceva. Satta ratanānīti muttādīni satta ratanāni. Ca-saddena rañño upabhogabhūtānaṃ
tika-s0103t0:438_5: vatthaseyyādīnaṃ saṅgaho. Rañño anucchavikānīti rañño paribhuñjanayogyāni. Sabbesanti
tika-s0103t0:438_6: “rājārahānī”tiādinā vuttānaṃ sabbesaṃyeva ekajjhaṃ gahaṇaṃ. Buddhānaṃ parisā nāma
tika-s0103t0:438_7: odhiso anodhiso ca samitapāpā, tathatthāya paṭipannā ca hotīti vuttaṃ “samaṇānaṃ
tika-s0103t0:439_0: Sippādivācananti sippānaṃ sikkhāpanaṃ. Pāḷiyampi hi “vācetā”ti vācanasīsena sikkhāpanaṃ
tika-s0103t0:439_1: dassitaṃ. Ukkuṭikāsananti taṃtaṃveyyāvaccakaraṇena ukkuṭikassa nisajjā. Payojanavasena
tika-s0103t0:439_2: gehato gehaṃ gāmato gāmaṃ jaṅghāyo kilametvā pesanaṃ jaṅghapesanikā. Likhitvā pātitaṃ
tika-s0103t0:439_3: viya hoti aparipuṇṇabhāvato. Anupubbauggatavaṭṭitanti gopphakaṭṭhānato paṭṭhāya yāva
tika-s0103t0:439_4: jāṇuppadesā maṃsūpacayassa anukkamena samantato vaḍḍhitattā anupubbena uggataṃ hutvā
tika-s0103t0:440_0: 215. “Yatupaghātāyā”ti ettha ta-kāro padasandhikaro, anunāsikalopena niddesoti āha
tika-s0103t0:440_2: kammena aññaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ nibbattatī”ti codito, ācariyo “na nibbattatī”ti vatvā “yadi
tika-s0103t0:440_3: evaṃ idha kasmā lakkhaṇantaraṃ kathita”nti antolīnameva codanaṃ pariharanto “yaṃ
tika-s0103t0:440_4: pana nibbattatīti…pe… idha vutta”nti āha. Tattha yaṃ pana nibbattatīti yaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ
tika-s0103t0:440_5: vuccamānalakkhaṇanibbattakena kammunā nibbattati. Taṃ anubyañjanaṃ hotīti taṃ lakkhaṇaṃ
tika-s0103t0:440_6: vuccamānassa lakkhaṇassa anukūlalakkhaṇaṃ nāma hoti. Tasmā tena kāraṇena idha eṇijaṅghalakkhaṇakathane
tika-s0103t0:442: 216. Samitapāpaṭṭhena samaṇaṃ, na pabbajjāmattena. Bāhitapāpaṭṭhena brāhmaṇaṃ, na jātimattena.
tika-s0103t0:443_0: Mahantānaṃ atthānaṃ pariggaṇhanato mahatī paññā etassāti mahāpañño. Sesapadesupi
tika-s0103t0:443_1: eseva nayoti āha “mahāpaññādīhi samannāgatoti attho”ti. Nānattanti yāhi mahāpaññādīhi
tika-s0103t0:443_2: samannāgatattā bhagavā “mahāpañño”tiādinā kittīyati, tāsaṃ mahāpaññādīnaṃ idaṃ nānattaṃ ayaṃ vemattatā.
tika-s0103t0:444_0: Yassa kassaci visesato arūpadhammassa mahattaṃ nāma kiccasiddhiyā veditabbanti tadassā
tika-s0103t0:444_3: kiccamahantatāya, phalamahantatāya, ānisaṃsamahantatāya ca sīlakkhandhassa mahantabhāvo
tika-s0103t0:444_4: veditabbo. Tattha hetu alobhādayo. Paccayo hirottappasaddhāsativīriyādayo. Nissayo
tika-s0103t0:444_6: cārittavārittādivibhāgo. Kiccaṃ tadaṅgādivasena paṭipakkhavidhamanaṃ. Ānisaṃso piyamanāpatādi.
tika-s0103t0:444_7: Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana visuddhimagge, ākaṅkheyyasuttādīsu ca āgatanayeneva
tika-s0103t0:444_8: veditabbo. Iminā nayena samādhikkhandhādīnampi mahantatā yathārahaṃ vitthāretvā veditabbā.
tika-s0103t0:444_9: Ṭhānāṭhānānaṃ pana mahāvisayatāya, sā bahudhātukasutte āgatanayena veditabbā. Vihārasamāpattiyo
tika-s0103t0:444_11: saccavibhaṅga- taṃsaṃvaṇṇanāsu āgatanayena, satipaṭṭhānā dīnaṃ satipaṭṭhānavibhaṅgādīsu,
tika-s0103t0:444_12: taṃsaṃvaṇṇanāsu ca āgatanayena, sāmaññaphalānaṃ mahato hitassa, mahato sukhassa,
tika-s0103t0:444_14: ca; abhiññānaṃ mahāsambhārato, mahāvisayato, mahākiccato, mahānubhāvato, mahānibbattito
tika-s0103t0:445_0: Puthupaññāti etthāpi vuttanayānusārena attho veditabbo. Ayaṃ pana viseso – nānākhandhesu
tika-s0103t0:445_1: ñāṇaṃ pavattatīti “ayaṃ rūpakkhandho nāma…pe… ayaṃ viññāṇakkhandho nāmā”ti evaṃ pañcannaṃ
tika-s0103t0:445_2: khandhānaṃ nānākaraṇaṃ paṭicca ñāṇaṃ pavattati. Tesupi “ekavidhena rūpakkhandho,
tika-s0103t0:445_3: ekādasavidhena rūpakkhandho. Ekavidhena vedanākkhandho, bahuvidhena vedanākkhandho.
tika-s0103t0:445_4: Ekavidhena saññākkhandho. Ekavidhena saṅkhārakkhandho. Ekavidhena viññāṇakkhandho,
tika-s0103t0:445_5: bahuvidhena viññāṇakkhandho”ti evaṃ ekekassa khandhassa atītādibhedavasenāpi nānākaraṇaṃ
tika-s0103t0:445_6: paṭicca ñāṇaṃ pavattati. Tathā “idaṃ cakkhāyatanaṃ nāma…pe...idaṃ dhammāyatanaṃ nāma.
tika-s0103t0:445_7: Tattha dasāyatanā kāmāvacarā, dve catubhūmakā”ti evaṃ āyatanānaṃ nānattaṃ paṭicca
tika-s0103t0:445_8: ñāṇaṃ pavattati. Nānādhātūsūti “ayaṃ cakkhudhātu nāma…pe… ayaṃ manoviññāṇadhātu nāma.
tika-s0103t0:445_9: Tattha soḷasa dhātuyo kāmāvacarā, dve dhātuyo catubhūmikā”ti evaṃ nānādhātūsu ñāṇaṃ
tika-s0103t0:445_10: pavattati, tayidaṃ upādinnakadhātuvasena vuttaṃ. Paccekabuddhānampi hi dvinnañca
tika-s0103t0:445_11: aggasāvakānaṃ upādinnakadhātūsu evaṃ nānākaraṇaṃ paṭicca ñāṇaṃ pavattati, tañca kho
tika-s0103t0:445_12: ekadesatova, na nippadesato. Anupādinnakadhātūnaṃ pana lakkhaṇādimattameva jānanti,
tika-s0103t0:445_13: na nānākaraṇaṃ. Sabbaññubuddhānameva pana “imāya nāmadhātuyā ussannattā imassa rukkhassa
tika-s0103t0:445_14: khandho seto, imassa kāḷo, imassa maṭṭho, imassa bahalattaco, imassa tanutaco. Imassa
tika-s0103t0:445_15: pattaṃ vaṇṇasaṇṭhānādivasena evarūpaṃ. Imassa pupphaṃ nīlaṃ, imassa pītakaṃ, lohitakaṃ,
tika-s0103t0:445_16: odātaṃ, sugandhaṃ, duggandhaṃ. Phalaṃ khuddakaṃ, mahantaṃ, dīghaṃ, vaṭṭaṃ, susaṇṭhānaṃ,
tika-s0103t0:445_17: dussaṇṭhānaṃ, maṭṭhaṃ, pharusaṃ, sugandhaṃ, duggandhaṃ, madhuraṃ, tittakaṃ, ambilaṃ,
tika-s0103t0:445_18: kaṭukaṃ, kasāvaṃ. Kaṇṭako tikhiṇo, atikhiṇo, ujuko, kuṭilo, kaṇho, nīlo, odāto hotī”ti
tika-s0103t0:446_1: Avijjādiaṅgāni hi paccekaṃ paṭiccasamuppādasaññitāni. Tenāha saṅkhārapiṭake “dvādasa
tika-s0103t0:446_2: paccayā dvādasa paṭiccasamuppādā”ti. Nānāsuññatamanupalabbhesūti nānāsabhāvesu niccasārādivirahitesu
tika-s0103t0:446_3: suññatabhāvesu tato eva itthipurisaattattaniyādivasena anupalabbhanasabhāvesu pakāresu.
tika-s0103t0:446_4: Ma-kāro hettha padasandhikaro. Nānāatthesūti atthapaṭisambhidāya visayabhūtesu paccayuppannādivasena
tika-s0103t0:446_5: nānāvidhesu atthesu. Dhammesūti dhammapaṭisambhidāya visayabhūtesu paccayādivasena
tika-s0103t0:446_6: nānāvidhesu dhammesu. Niruttīsūti tesaṃyeva atthadhammānaṃ niddhāraṇavacanasaṅkhātesu
tika-s0103t0:446_7: nānāniruttīsu. Paṭibhānesūti atthapaṭisambhidādīsu visayabhūtesu “imāni ñāṇāni idamatthajotakānī”ti
tika-s0103t0:446_8: tathā tathā paṭibhānato upatiṭṭhanato “paṭibhānānī”ti laddhanāmesu nānāñāṇesu. “Puthunānāsīlakkhandhesū”tiādīsu
tika-s0103t0:446_9: sīlassa puthuttaṃ vuttameva, itaresaṃ pana vuttanayānusārena suviññeyyattā pākaṭameva.
tika-s0103t0:446_10: Yaṃ pana abhinnaṃ ekameva nibbānaṃ, tattha upacāravasena puthuttaṃ gahetabbanti āha
tika-s0103t0:446_11: “puthujjanasādhāraṇe dhamme samatikkammā”ti, tenassa madanimmadanādipariyāyena puthuttaṃ paridīpitaṃ hoti.
tika-s0103t0:447_0: Evaṃ visayavasena paññāya mahattaṃ, puthuttaṃ dassetvā idāni sampayuttadhammavasena
tika-s0103t0:447_1: hāsabhāvaṃ, pavattiākāravasena javanabhāvaṃ, kiccavasena tikkhādibhāvaṃ dassetuṃ
tika-s0103t0:447_2: “katamā hāsapaññā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha hāsabahuloti pītibahulo. Sesapadāni tasseva
tika-s0103t0:447_3: vevacanāni. Sīlaṃ paripūretīti haṭṭhapahaṭṭho udaggudaggo hutvā ṭhapetvā indriyasaṃvaraṃ
tika-s0103t0:447_4: tassa visuṃ vuttattā anavasesasīlaṃ paripūreti. Pītisomanassasahagatā hi paññā abhirativasena
tika-s0103t0:447_5: ārammaṇe phullitavikasitā viya pavattati, na evaṃ upekkhāsahagatā. Puna sīlakkhandhanti
tika-s0103t0:448_0: Sabbaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ aniccato khippaṃ javatīti yā rūpadhamme “aniccā”ti sīghavegena pavattati,
tika-s0103t0:448_1: paṭipakkhadūrabhāvena pubbābhisaṅkhārassa sātisayattā indena vissaṭṭhavajiraṃ viya
tika-s0103t0:448_2: lakkhaṇaṃ avirajjhantī adandhāyantī rūpakkhandhe aniccalakkhaṇaṃ vegasā paṭivijjhati,
tika-s0103t0:448_3: sā javanapaññā nāmāti attho. Sesapadesupi eseva nayo. Evaṃ lakkhaṇārammaṇikavipassanāvasena
tika-s0103t0:448_4: javanapaññaṃ dassetvā balavavipassanāvasena dassetuṃ “rūpa”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha
tika-s0103t0:448_5: khayaṭṭhenāti yattha yattha uppajjati, tattha tattheva bhijjanato khayasabhāvattā.
tika-s0103t0:448_7: niccasārādivirahato ca. Tulayitvāti tulanabhūtāya vipassanāpaññāya tuletvā. Tīrayitvāti
tika-s0103t0:448_8: tāya eva tīraṇabhūtāya tīrayitvā. Vibhāvayitvāti yāthāvato pakāsetvā paccakkhaṃ katvā.
tika-s0103t0:448_9: Vibhūtaṃ katvāti pākaṭaṃ katvā. Rūpanirodheti rūpakkhandhanirodhahetubhūte nibbāne
tika-s0103t0:449_0: Ñāṇassa tikkhabhāvo nāma savisesaṃ paṭipakkhapahānena veditabboti. “Khippaṃ kilese
tika-s0103t0:449_1: chindatīti tikkhapaññā”ti vatvā te pana kilese vibhāgena dassento “uppannaṃ kāmavitakka”ntiādimāha.
tika-s0103t0:449_2: Tikkhapañño khippābhiñño hoti, paṭipadā cassa na calatīti āha “ekasmiṃ āsane cattāro
tika-s0103t0:450_0: “Sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā dukkhā vipariṇāmadhammā, saṅkhatā paṭiccasamuppannā khayadhammā
tika-s0103t0:450_1: vayadhammā virāgadhammā nirodhadhammā”ti yāthāvato dassanena saccappaṭivedho ijjhati,
tika-s0103t0:450_2: na aññathāti kāraṇamukhena nibbedhikapaññaṃ dassetuṃ “sabbasaṅkhāresu ubbegabahulo
tika-s0103t0:450_3: hotī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ubbegabahuloti vuttanayena sabbasaṅkhāresu abhiṇhapavattasaṃvego.
tika-s0103t0:450_4: Uttāsabahuloti ñāṇuttāsavasena sabbasaṅkhāresu bahuso utrāsamānaso, etena ādīnavānupassanamāha.
tika-s0103t0:450_6: eva aparāparuppattiṃ. Bahimukhoti sabbasaṅkhārato bahibhūtaṃ nibbānaṃ uddissa pavattañāṇamukho,
tika-s0103t0:450_7: tathā vā pavattitavimokkhamukho. Nibbijjhanaṃ nibbedho, so etissā atthi, nibbijjhatīti
tika-s0103t0:450_8: vā nibbedhikā, sā eva paññā nibbedhikapaññā. Yaṃ panettha atthato avibhattaṃ, taṃ
tika-s0103t0:451_0: 217. Pabbajitaṃ upāsitāti ettha yādisaṃ pabbajitaṃ upāsato paññāpaṭilābho hoti, taṃ
tika-s0103t0:451_1: dassetuṃ “paṇḍitaṃ pabbajita”nti vuttaṃ. Upāsanañcettha upaṭṭhānavasena icchitaṃ,
tika-s0103t0:451_2: na upanisīdanamattenāti āha “payirupāsitā”ti. Atthanti hitaṃ. Abbhantaraṃ karitvāti
tika-s0103t0:451_3: abbhantaragataṃ katvā. Tenāha “atthayutta”nti. Bhāvanapuṃsakaniddeso cāyaṃ, hitūpasañhitaṃ
tika-s0103t0:451_4: katvāti attho. Antara-saddo vā cittapariyāyo “yassantarato na santi kopā”tiādīsu
tika-s0103t0:452_0: Paṭilābhatthāya gatenāti paṭilābhatthāya pavattena, paṭilābhasaṃvattaniyenāti attho.
tika-s0103t0:452_1: Uppāde ca nimitte ca chekāti uppādavidhimhi ceva nimittavidhimhi ca kusalā. Uppādanimittakovidatāsīsena
tika-s0103t0:452_2: cettha lakkhaṇakosallameva dasseti. Atha vā sesalakkhaṇānaṃ nibbattiyā buddhānaṃ,
tika-s0103t0:452_3: cakkavattīnañca uppādo anumīyati, yāni tehi laddhabbaānisaṃsāni nimittāni, tasmiṃ
tika-s0103t0:452_4: uppāde ca nimitte ca anuminanādivasena chekā nipuṇāti attho. Ñatvā passissatīti ñāṇena
tika-s0103t0:453_0: Atthānusāsanīsūti atthānaṃ hitānaṃ anusāsanīsu. Yasmā anatthapaṭivajjanapubbikā sattānaṃ
tika-s0103t0:453_1: atthapaṭipatti, tasmā anatthopi paricchijja gahetabbo, jānitabbo cāti vuttaṃ “atthānatthaṃ
tika-s0103t0:453_2: pariggāhakāni ñāṇānī”ti, yato “āyupāyakosallaṃ viya apāyakosallampi icchitabba”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t0:455_0: 218. Paṭisaṅkhānabalena kodhavinayena akkodhano, na bhāvanābalenāti dassetuṃ “na
tika-s0103t0:455_1: anāgāmimaggenā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Evaṃ akkodhavasikattāti evaṃ maghamāṇavo viya na kodhavasaṃ
tika-s0103t0:455_2: gatattā. Nābhisajjīti kujjhanavaseneva na abhisajji. Yañhi kodhassa uppattiṭṭhānabhūte
tika-s0103t0:455_3: ārammaṇe upanāhassa paccayabhūtaṃ kujjhanavasena abhisajjanaṃ, taṃ idhādhippetaṃ,
tika-s0103t0:455_4: na lubbhanavasena. Tenāha “kuṭilakaṇṭako viyā”tiādi. So hi yattha laggati, taṃ khobhento
tika-s0103t0:455_5: eva laggati. Tattha tatthāti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ mammaṭṭhāne. Mammanti phuṭṭhamattepi rujjanaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0103t0:455_6: Pubbuppattikoti paṭhamuppanno. Tato balavataro byāpādo laddhāsevanatāya cittassa
tika-s0103t0:455_7: byāpajjanato. Tato balavatarā patitthiyanāti sātisayaṃ laddhāsevanatāya tato byāpādāvatthāyapi
tika-s0103t0:456_0: Sukhumattharaṇādīti ādi-saddena paṇītabhojanīyādīnampi saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo bhojanadānassapi
tika-s0103t0:456_1: vaṇṇasampadānimittabhāvato. Tenāha bhagavā “bhojanaṃ bhikkhave dadamāno dāyako paṭiggāhakānaṃ…pe…
tika-s0103t0:456_2: āyuṃ deti, vaṇṇaṃ detī”ti tathā ca vakkhati “āmisadānena vā”ti.
tika-s0103t0:457_0: 219. Ti adāsi. Devoti megho, pajjunno eva vā. Varataroti uttamataro. Pabbajjāya visadisāvatthādi
tika-s0103t0:457_1: bhāvato na pabbajjāti apabbajjā, gihibhāvo. Acchādenti kopīnaṃ paṭicchādenti etehīti
tika-s0103t0:457_2: acchādanāni, nivāsanāni, tesaṃ acchādanānañceva sesa vatthānañca kojavādi uttamapāvuraṇānañca.
tika-s0103t0:459_0: 220. Samānetāti sammadeva ānetā samāgametā. Rajje patiṭṭhitena sakkā kātuṃ bahubhatikasseva
tika-s0103t0:459_1: ijjhanato. Kattā nāma natthīti vajjaṃ paṭicchādentīti ānetvā sambandho, karonti vajjapaṭicchādanakammanti
tika-s0103t0:459_2: vā. Nanu vajjapaṭicchādanakammaṃ nāma sāvajjanti? Saccaṃ sāvajjaṃ saṃkiliṭṭhacittena
tika-s0103t0:459_3: paṭicchādentassa, idaṃ pana asaṃkiliṭṭhacittena parassa uppajjanakaanatthaṃ pariharaṇavasena
tika-s0103t0:459_4: pavattaṃ adhippetaṃ. “Ñātisaṅgahaṃ karontenā”ti etena ñātatthacariyāvasena taṃ kammaṃ
tika-s0103t0:460_0: 221. Amittatāpanāti amittānaṃ tapanasīlā, amittatāpanaṃ hotu vā mā vā evaṃsabhāvāti
tika-s0103t0:460_1: attho. Na hi cakkavattino puttānaṃ amittā nāma keci honti, ye te bhaveyyuṃ, cakkānubhāveneva
tika-s0103t0:463_0: 222. Samanti samānaṃ. Tena tena loke viññātaguṇena samaṃ samānaṃ jānāti, yato tattha
tika-s0103t0:463_1: paṭipajjanavidhināva itarasmiṃ paṭipajjati. Sayaṃ jānātīti aparaneyyo hutvā sayameva
tika-s0103t0:463_2: jānāti. Purisaṃ jānātīti vā “ayaṃ seṭṭho, ayaṃ majjhimo, ayaṃ nihīno”ti taṃ taṃ purisaṃ
tika-s0103t0:463_3: yāthāvato jānāti. Purisavisesaṃ jānātīti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ purise vijjamānaṃ visesaṃ
tika-s0103t0:463_4: jānāti, yato tattha tattha anurūpadānapadānādipaṭipattiyā yuttapattakārī hoti. Tenāha
tika-s0103t0:464: Sampattipaṭilābhaṭṭhenāti diṭṭhadhammikādisampattīnaṃ paṭilābhāpanaṭṭhena. Samasaṅgahakammanti samaṃ jānitvā tadanurūpaṃ tassa tassa saṅgaṇhanakammaṃ.
tika-s0103t0:465: 223. Tulayitvāti tīrayitvā. Paṭivicinitvāti vīmaṃsitvā. Nipuṇayogato nipuṇā, ativiya nipuṇā atinipuṇā, sā pana tesaṃ nipuṇatā saṇhasukhumā paññāti āha “sukhumapaññā”ti.
tika-s0103t0:467: 224. Khemakāmoti anupaddavakāmo. Kammassakatāñāṇaṃ sattānaṃ vaḍḍhiāvahaṃ sabbasampattividhāyakanti āha “paññāyāti kammassakatāpaññāyā”ti.
tika-s0103t0:468: Samantaparipūrānīti samantato sabbabhāgehi paripuṇṇāni. Tato eva ahīnāni anūnāni. Dhanādīhīti dhanadhaññādīhi.
tika-s0103t0:469_0: 225. Okappanasaddhā saddheyyavatthuṃ okkanditvā pakkhanditvā saddahanasaddhā. Sā
tika-s0103t0:469_1: eva pasādanīyavatthusmimpi abhippasīdanavasena pavattiyā pasādasaddhā. Pariyattisavanenāti
tika-s0103t0:469_2: sattānaṃ hitasukhāvahāya pariyattiyā savanena. Dhāraṇaparicayādīnaṃ taṃmūlakattā
tika-s0103t0:469_3: tathā vuttaṃ. Etesanti saddhādīnaṃ. Saha hānadhammenāti sahānadhammo, na sahānadhammoti
tika-s0103t0:469_4: asahānadhammo, tassa bhāvo asahānadhammatā, taṃ asahānadhammataṃ, aparihāniyasabhāvanti attho.
tika-s0103t0:471: 226. Tilaphalamattampi bhojanaṃ. Sabbattha pharatīti sabbā rasāharaṇiyo anussarantaṃ sabhāvena sabbasmiṃ kāye pharati. Samā hutvā vahantīti avisamā ujukā hutvā pavattanti.
tika-s0103t0:472_0: Ārogyakaraṇakammanti arogabhāvakaraṃ sattānaṃ aviheṭhanakammaṃ. Madhurādibhedaṃ rasaṃ
tika-s0103t0:472_1: gasati harati etehi, sayameva vā taṃ gasanti gilanti anto pavesentīti rasaggasā,
tika-s0103t0:472_2: rasaggasānaṃ aggā rasaggasaggā, te ettha santīti rasaggasaggī, tadeva lakkhaṇaṃ.
tika-s0103t0:472_3: Bhavati hi abhinnepi vatthusmiṃ taggatavisesāvabodhanatthaṃ bhinnaṃ viya katvā vohāro
tika-s0103t0:472_4: yathā “silāputtakassa sarīra”nti. Rasaggasaggitāsaṅkhātaṃ vā lakkhaṇaṃ rasaggasaggilakkhaṇaṃ.
tika-s0103t0:473_0: 227. Vadha-saddo “attānaṃ vadhitvā vadhitvā rodatī”tiādīsu bādhanatthopi hotīti tato
tika-s0103t0:473_1: visesanatthaṃ “māraṇavadhenā”ti vuttaṃ, māraṇasaṅkhātena vadhenāti attho. Bādhanattho
tika-s0103t0:473_2: eva vā vadha-saddo, māraṇena, bādhanena cāti attho. Ubbādhanāyāti bandhanāgāre pakkhipitvā
tika-s0103t0:475_0: 228. Visaṭanti kujjhanavasena vinisaṭaṃ katvā. Tenāha “kakkaṭako viyā”tiādi. Visācīti
tika-s0103t0:475_1: virūpaṃ sācitakaṃ, vijimhanti attho. Tenāha “vaṅkakkhikoṭiyā”ti, kuṭilaakkhikoṭipātenāti
tika-s0103t0:475_2: attho. Viceyya pekkhitāti ujukaṃ anoloketvā diṭṭhipātaṃ vicāretvā oloketvā. Tenāha
tika-s0103t0:475_3: “yo kujjhitvā”tiādi. Paroti kujjhito. Na oloketi taṃ sammukhā gacchantaṃ kujjhitvā
tika-s0103t0:475_4: na oloketi, parammukhā. Viteyyāti virūpaṃ tiriyaṃ, viññūnaṃ olokanakkamaṃ vītikkamitvāti
tika-s0103t0:475_5: attho. Jimhaṃ anoloketvā ujukaṃ olokanaṃ nāma kuṭilabhāvakarānaṃ pāpadhammānaṃ abhājanaujukatacittatasseva
tika-s0103t0:475_6: hotīti āha “ujumano hutvā ujuṃ pekkhitā”ti. Yathā ca ujuṃ pekkhitā hotīti ānetvā
tika-s0103t0:475_7: sambandho. Pasaṭanti ummīlanavasena sammadeva patthaṭaṃ. Vipulaṃ vitthatanti tasseva
tika-s0103t0:475_8: vevacanaṃ. Piyaṃ piyāyitabbaṃ dassanaṃ olokanaṃ etassāti piyadassano.
tika-s0103t0:476_0: Kāṇoti akkhīni nimmīletvā pekkhanako. Kākakkhīti kekarakkho. Vaṅkakkhīti jimhapekkhanako.
tika-s0103t0:476_1: Āvilakkhīti ākuladiṭṭhipāto. Nīlapītalohitasetakāḷavaṇṇānaṃ vasena pañcavaṇṇo. Tattha
tika-s0103t0:476_3: veditabbā. “Pasādoti pana tesaṃ vaṇṇānaṃ pasannākāraṃ sandhāya vutta”nti keci. Pañcavaṇṇo
tika-s0103t0:476_4: pasādoti pana yathāvuttapañcavaṇṇaparivāro, tehi vā paṭimaṇḍito pasādoti attho. Nettasampattikarānīti
tika-s0103t0:476_6: kāraṇāni. Lakkhaṇasatthe yuttāti lakkhaṇasatthe āyuttā sukusalā.
tika-s0103t0:478: 230. Pubbaṅgamoti ettha pubbaṅgamatā nāma pamukhatā, jeṭṭhaseṭṭhakabhāvo bahujanassa anuvattanīyatāti āha “gaṇajeṭṭhako”tiādi.
tika-s0103t0:479_0: Pubbaṅgamatāti pubbaṅgamassa kammaṃ. Yassa hi kāyasucaritādikammassa vasena mahāpuriso
tika-s0103t0:479_1: bahujanassa pubbaṅgamo ahosi, tadassa kammaṃ “pubbaṅgamatā”ti adhippetaṃ, na pubbaṅgamabhāvo.
tika-s0103t0:479_2: Tenāha “idha kammaṃ nāma pubbaṅgamatā”ti. Pītipāmojjena paripuṇṇasīsoti pītiyā, pāmojjena
tika-s0103t0:480_1: paṭibhogo, upayogavatthu paṭibhogo, tassa hitāti paṭibhogiyā. Desakālaṃ ñatvā tadupakaraṇūpaṭṭhānādi
tika-s0103t0:480_2: veyyāvaccakarā sattā. Abhiharantīti byāharanti. Tassa tassa veyyāvaccassa paṭiharaṇato
tika-s0103t0:480_3: pavattanakaraṇato paṭihāro, veyyāvaccakaro, tassa bhāvo paṭihārakanti āha “veyyāvaccakarabhāva”nti.
tika-s0103t0:480_4: Visavanaṃ visavo, kāmakāro vasitā, so etassa atthīti visavīti āha “ciṇṇavasī”ti.
tika-s0103t0:482: 232. Upavattatīti anukūlabhāvaṃ upecca vattati. Tenāha “ajjhāsayaṃ anuvattatī”ti.
tika-s0103t0:483_0: Ekekalomalakkhaṇanti ekekasmiṃ lomakūpe ekekalomatālakkhaṇaṃ. Ekekehi lomehīti aññesaṃ
tika-s0103t0:483_1: sarīre ekekasmimpi lomakūpe anekānipi lomāni uṭṭhahanti, na tathāgatassa. Tehi puna
tika-s0103t0:483_2: paccekaṃ lomakūpesu ekekeheva uppannehi kuṇḍalāvattehi padakkhiṇāvattakajātehi nicitaṃ
tika-s0103t0:485: 234. Abhinditabbaparisoti parehi kenaci saṅgahena saṅgahetvā, yuttikāraṇaṃ dassetvā vā na bhinditabbapariso.
tika-s0103t0:486_0: Apisuṇavācāyāti upayogatthe sāmivacanaṃ, pesuññassa paṭipakkhabhūtaṃ kusalakammaṃ.
tika-s0103t0:486_1: Pisuṇā vācā etassāti pisuṇavāco, tassa pisuṇavācassa puggalassa. Aparipuṇṇāti cattārīsato
tika-s0103t0:488: 236. Ādeyyavācoti ādaragāravavasena ādātabbavacano. “Evameta”nti gahetabbavacano sirasā sampaṭicchitasāsano.
tika-s0103t0:489_0: Baddhajivhāti yathā sukhena parivattati, evaṃ sirādīhi palibuddhajivhā. Gūḷhajivhāti
tika-s0103t0:489_1: rasabahalatāya gūḷhagaṇḍasadisajivhā. Dvijivhāti agge kappabhāvena dvidhābhūtajivhā.
tika-s0103t0:489_2: Mammanāti apparippuṭatalāpā. Kharapharusakakkasādivasena saddo bhijjati bhinnakāro
tika-s0103t0:489_3: hoti. Vicchinditvā pavattassaratāya chinnassarā vā. Anekākāratāya bhinnassarā vā.
tika-s0103t0:489_4: Kākassa viya amanuññassaratāya kākassarā vā. Madhuroti iṭṭhe, kammaphalena vatthuno
tika-s0103t0:490_1: paresaṃ pīḷāvahaṃ. Bahuno janassa avamaddanato, pamaddābhāvakaraṇato vā bahujanappamaddanaṃ.
tika-s0103t0:490_2: Abāḷhanti vā ettha a-kāro vuddhiattho “asekkhā dhammā”tiādīsu viya, tasmā ativiya
tika-s0103t0:490_3: bāḷhaṃ pharusaṃ giranti evamettha attho veditabbo. Na bhaṇīti cettha “na abhaṇi na
tika-s0103t0:490_4: bhaṇī”ti saralopena niddeso. Susaṃhitanti suṭṭhu saṃhitaṃ. Kena pana suṭṭhu saṃhitaṃ?
tika-s0103t0:490_5: “Madhura”nti anantarameva vuttattā madhuratāyāti viññāyati, kā panassa madhuratāti
tika-s0103t0:490_6: āha “suṭṭhu pemasaṃhita”nti. Upayogaputhuttavisayo yaṃ vācā-saddoti āha “vācāyo”ti,
tika-s0103t0:490_7: sā cassā upayogaputhuttavisayatā “hadayagāminiyo”ti padena samānādhikaraṇatāya daṭṭhabbā.
tika-s0103t0:490_10: brahmuno sarasadisassarataṃ vā. Bahūnaṃ bahunti bahūnaṃ janānaṃ bahuṃ subhaṇitanti yojanā.
tika-s0103t0:492: 238. Appadhaṃsikoti appadhaṃsiyo. Ya-kārassa hi ka-kāraṃ katvā ayaṃ niddeso yathā “niyyānikā dhammā”ti guṇatoti attanā adhigataguṇato. Ṭhānatoti yathāṭhitaṭṭhānantarato.
tika-s0103t0:493: Palāpakathāyāti samphappalāpakathāya. Antopaviṭṭhahanukā ekato, ubhato vā saṃkucitavisukā. Vaṅkahanukā ekapassena kuṭilavisukā. Pabbhārahanukā purato olambamānavisukā.
tika-s0103t0:494_0: 239. Vikiṇṇavacanā nāma samphappalāpino, tappaṭikkhepena avikiṇṇavacanā mahābodhisattā.
tika-s0103t0:494_1: Vācā eva tadatthādhigamupāyatāya “byāppatho”ti vuttāti āha “avikiṇṇa…pe… vacanapatho
tika-s0103t0:494_2: assā”ti. “Dvīhi dvīhī”ti nayidaṃ āmeḍitavacanaṃ asamānādhikaraṇato, atha kho dvīhi
tika-s0103t0:494_3: diguṇatādassananti āha “dvīhi dvīhīti catūhī”ti. Tasmā “dvidugamā”ti catugamā vuttāti
tika-s0103t0:494_4: āha “catuppadāna”nti. Tathāsabhāvoti yathāssa vuttanayena kenaci appadhaṃsiyatā hoti
tika-s0103t0:496: 240. Visuddhasīlācāratāya parisuddhā samantato sabbathā vā suddhā puggalā parivārā etassāti parisuddhaparivāro.
tika-s0103t0:497_0: 241. Pahāsīti tadaṅgavasena, vikkhambhanavasena ca pariccaji. Tidivaṃ tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ
tika-s0103t0:497_1: puraṃ nagaraṃ etesanti tidivapurā, tāvatiṃsadevā, tesaṃ varo tidivapuravaro, indo.
tika-s0103t0:497_2: Tena tidivapuravarena. Tenāha “sakkenā”ti. Lapanti kathenti etenāti lapanaṃ, mukhanti
tika-s0103t0:497_3: āha “lapanajanti mukhaja”nti. Suṭṭhu dhavalatāya sukkā, īsakampi asaṃkiliṭṭhatāya
tika-s0103t0:497_4: suci. Sundarasaṇṭhānatāya suṭṭhu bhāvanato, vipassanato ca sobhanā. Kāmaṃ janānaṃ
tika-s0103t0:497_6: idha pana saparivāracatumahādīpasaññito sabbo padeso tathā vuttoti āha “cakkavāḷaparicchinno
tika-s0103t0:497_7: janapado”ti. Nanu ca yathāvutto padeso samuddaparicchinno, na cakkavāḷapabbataparicchinnoti?
tika-s0103t0:497_8: So padeso cakkavāḷaparicchinnopi hotīti tathā vuttaṃ. Ye vā samuddanissitā, cakkavāḷapādanissitā
tika-s0103t0:497_9: ca sattā, tesaṃ te te padesā patiṭṭhāti tepi saṅgaṇhanto “cakkavāḷaparicchinno”ti
tika-s0103t0:497_10: avoca. Cakkavāḷaparicchinnoti ca cakkavāḷena paricchinnoti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0103t0:497_11: Tassāti tassa cakkavattino. Puna tassāti tassa janapadassa. Bahujana sukhanti ettha
tika-s0103t0:497_12: paccattabahuvacanalopena bahujanaggahaṇanti āha “bahujanā”ti. Yathā pana te hitasukhaṃ
tika-s0103t0:497_13: caranti, taṃ vidhiṃ dassetuṃ “samānasukhadukkhā hutvā”ti vuttaṃ. Vigatapāpoti sabbaso
tika-s0103t0:497_14: samucchindanena viniddhutapāpadhammo. Daratho vuccati kāyiko, cetasiko ca pariḷāho.
tika-s0103t0:497_16: Rāgādayo yasmiṃ santāne uppannā, tassa malīnabhāvakaraṇena malā. Kacavarabhāvena
tika-s0103t0:497_17: khilā. Sattānaṃ mahānatthakarattā visesato doso kalīti vuttaṃ “dosakalīnañcā”ti.
tika-s0103t0:497_18: Panūdehīti samucchindanavasena sasantānato nīhārakehi, pajahanakehīti attho. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
tika-s0103t0:498_1: sabbaṃyeva taṃ puññakammaṃ sabbassa lakkhaṇassa kāraṇaṃ visiṭṭharūpattā phalassa.
tika-s0103t0:498_2: Na hi abhinnarūpakāraṇaṃ bhinnasabhāvassa phalassa paccayo bhavituṃ sakkoti, tasmā
tika-s0103t0:498_3: yassa yassa lakkhaṇassa yaṃ yaṃ puññakammaṃ visesakāraṇaṃ, taṃ taṃ vibhāgena dassentī
tika-s0103t0:498_4: ayaṃ desanā pavattā. Tattha yathā yādisaṃ kāyasucaritādipuññakammaṃ suppatiṭṭhitapādatāya
tika-s0103t0:498_5: kāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ, tādisameva “uṇhīsasīsatāya” kāraṇanti na sakkā vattuṃ daḷhasamādānatāvisiṭṭhassa
tika-s0103t0:498_6: tassa suppatiṭṭhitapādatāya kāraṇabhāvena vuttattā, itarassa ca pubbaṅgamatāvisiṭṭhassa
tika-s0103t0:498_7: vuttattā, evaṃ yādisaṃ āyatapaṇhitāya kāraṇaṃ, na tādisameva dīghaṅgulitāya, brahmujugattatāya
tika-s0103t0:498_8: ca kāraṇaṃ visiṭṭharūpattā phalassa. Na hi abhinnarūpakāraṇaṃ bhinnasabhāvassa phalassa
tika-s0103t0:498_9: paccayo bhavituṃ sakkoti. Tattha yathā ekeneva kammunā cakkhādinānindriyuppattiyaṃ
tika-s0103t0:498_10: avatthābhedato, sāmatthiyabhedato vā kammabhedo icchitabbo. Na hi yadavatthaṃ kammaṃ
tika-s0103t0:498_11: cakkhussa kāraṇaṃ, tadavatthameva sotādīnaṃ kāraṇaṃ hoti abhinnasāmatthiyaṃ vā, tasmā
tika-s0103t0:498_14: anekavidhaphalanibbattanasamatthatāvasena anekarūpataṃ āpannaṃ viya hoti, evamidhāpi
tika-s0103t0:498_15: “ekampi pāṇātipātā veramaṇivasena pavattaṃ kusalakammaṃ āyatapaṇhitādīnaṃ tiṇṇampi
tika-s0103t0:498_16: lakkhaṇānaṃ nibbattakaṃ hotī”ti vuccamānepi na koci virodho. Tena vuttaṃ “so tassa
tika-s0103t0:498_17: kammassa katattā…pe… imāni tīṇi mahāpurisalakkhaṇāni paṭilabhatī”ti nānākammunā pana
tika-s0103t0:498_18: tesaṃ nibbattiyaṃ vattabbameva natthi, pāḷiyaṃ pana “tassa kammassā”ti ekavacananiddeso
tika-s0103t0:498_19: sāmaññavasenāti daṭṭhabbo. Evañca katvā satapuññalakkhaṇavacanaṃ samatthitaṃ hoti.
tika-s0103t0:500_0: 242. Pākārena parikkhittanti padaṃ ānetvā sambandho. Gopuraṭṭālakayuttanti dvārapāsādena
tika-s0103t0:500_1: ceva tattha tattha pākāramatthake patiṭṭhāpitaaṭṭālakehi ca yuttaṃ. Veḷūhi parikkhittattā,
tika-s0103t0:501: Kāḷakavesenāti kalandakarūpena. Nivāpanti bhojanaṃ. Tanti uyyānaṃ.
tika-s0103t0:502_0: “Kho panā”ti vacanālaṅkāramattametanti tena samayenāti atthavacanaṃ yuttaṃ. Gahapati
tika-s0103t0:502_1: mahāsāloti gahapatibhūto mahāsāro, ra-kārassa la-kāraṃ katvā ayaṃ niddeso. Vibhavasampattiyā
tika-s0103t0:502_2: mahāsārappatto kuṭumbiko. “Putto panassa assaddho”tiādi aṭṭhuppattiko yaṃ suttanikkhepoti
tika-s0103t0:502_3: taṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ dassetuṃ āraddhaṃ. Kammaphalasaddhāya abhāvena assaddho. Ratanattaye
tika-s0103t0:502_4: pasādābhāvena appasanno. Evamāhāti evaṃ idāni vuccamānākārena vadati.
tika-s0103t0:503: Yāvajīvaṃ anussaraṇīyā hoti hitesitāya vuttā pacchimā vācāti adhippāyena. Puthudisāti visuṃ visuṃ disā, tā pana anekāti āha “bahudisā”ti.
tika-s0103t0:504_0: 243. “Na tāva paviṭṭho”tiādīsu vattabbaṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva. Na idānevāti na imāya
tika-s0103t0:504_1: eva velāya. Kiṃ carahīti āha “paccūsasamayepī”tiādi. Gihivinayanti gihīnaṃ gahaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0103t0:504_2: vinayatantibhūtaṃ “gihinā evaṃ vattitabba”nti gahaṭṭhācārassa gahaṭṭhavattassa anavasesato
tika-s0103t0:504_3: imasmiṃ sutte savisesaṃ katvā vuttattā. Tathevāti yathā buddhacakkhunā diṭṭhaṃ, tatheva
tika-s0103t0:504_4: passi. Namassati vattavasena kattabbanti gahetvā ṭhitattā.
tika-s0103t0:506_0: 244. Vacanaṃ sutvāva cintesi buddhānubhāvena attasammāpaṇidhānanimittena puññabalena
tika-s0103t0:506_1: ca codiyamāno. Na kira tā etāti tā cha disā etā idāni mayā namassiyamānā puratthimādikā
tika-s0103t0:506_2: na honti kirāti. Nipātamattanti anatthakabhāvaṃ tassa vadati. Pucchāpadanti pucchāvacanaṃ.
tika-s0103t0:507_0: Bhagavā gahapatiputtena namassitabbā cha disā pucchito desanākusalatāya ādito eva
tika-s0103t0:507_1: tā akathetvā tassa tāva paṭipattiyā naṃ bhājanabhūtaṃ kātuṃ vajjanīyavajjanatthañceva
tika-s0103t0:507_2: sevitabbasevanatthañca ovādaṃ dento “yato kho gahapatiputtā”tiādinā desanaṃ ārabhi.
tika-s0103t0:507_3: Tattha kammakilesāti kammabhūtā saṃkilesā. Kilissantīti kiliṭṭhā malīnā viya ṭhitā,
tika-s0103t0:507_4: upatāpitā ca hontīti attho. Tasmāti kilissananimittattā. Yadipi surāpānaṃ pañcaverabhāvena
tika-s0103t0:507_5: upāsakehi parivajjanīyaṃ, tassa pana apāyamukhabhāvena parato vattukāmatāya pāṇātipātādike
tika-s0103t0:507_6: eva sandhāya “cattāro”ti vuttaṃ, na “pañcā”ti. “Visuṃ akammapathabhāvato cā”ti apare.
tika-s0103t0:507_8: vacanato visuṃ kammapathabhāvena āgataṃ. Tathā hi taṃ duccaritakammaṃ hutvā duggatigāmipiṭṭhivattakabhāvena
tika-s0103t0:507_9: niyata”nti keci, tesaṃ matena ekādasa kammapathā siyuṃ. Tasmā yathāvuttesveva kammapathesu
tika-s0103t0:507_11: suvuttametaṃ. Surāpānassa bhogāpāyamukhabhāvena vattukāmatāya “cattāro” tveva avoca.
tika-s0103t0:507_12: Tiṭṭhati ettha phalaṃ tadāyattavuttitāyāti ṭhānaṃ, hetūti āha “ṭhānehīti kāraṇehī”ti.
tika-s0103t0:507_13: Apenti apagacchanti, apeti vā etehīti apāyā, apāyānaṃ, apāyā eva vā mukhāni dvārānīti
tika-s0103t0:508_0: Kiñcāpi “ariyasāvakassā”ti pubbe sādhāraṇato vuttaṃ, visesato pana paṭhamāya bhūmiyaṃ
tika-s0103t0:508_1: ṭhitasseva vakkhamānanayo yujjatīti “soti so sotāpanno”ti vuttaṃ. Pāpaka-saddo nihīnapariyāyoti
tika-s0103t0:508_2: “lāmakehī”ti vuttaṃ. Apāyadukkhaṃ, vaṭṭadukkhañca pāpentīti vā pāpakā, tehi pāpakehi.
tika-s0103t0:508_3: Cha disā paṭicchādentoti tena tena bhāgena dissantīti “disā”ti saññite cha bhāge
tika-s0103t0:508_4: satte yathā tehi saddhiṃ attano chiddaṃ na hoti, evaṃ paṭicchādento paṭisandhārento.
tika-s0103t0:508_5: Vijinanatthāyāti abhibhavanatthāya. Yo hi diṭṭhadhammikaṃ, samparāyikañca anatthaṃ
tika-s0103t0:508_6: parivajjanavasena abhibhavati, tato eva tadubhayatthaṃ sampādeti, so ubhayalokavijayāya
tika-s0103t0:508_7: paṭipanno nāma hoti paccatthikaniggaṇhanato, sakatthasampādanato ca. Tenāha “ayañceva
tika-s0103t0:508_8: loko”tiādi. Pāṇātipātādīni pañca verāni verappasavanato. Āraddho hotīti saṃsādhito
tika-s0103t0:508_9: hoti, tayidaṃ saṃsādhanaṃ kittisaddena idha sattānaṃ cittatosanena, verābhāvāpādanena
tika-s0103t0:508_10: ca hotīti āha “paritosito ceva nipphādito cā”ti. Puna pañca verānīti pañca veraphalāni uttarapadalopena.
tika-s0103t0:509_0: Katamassāti katame assa. Kilesasampayuttattā kilesoti taṃyogato taṃsadisaṃ vadati
tika-s0103t0:509_1: yathā “pītisukhaṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ, nīlaṃ vattha”nti ca. Sampayuttatā cettha tadekaṭṭhatāya
tika-s0103t0:509_2: veditabbā, na ekuppādāditāya. Evañca katvā pāṇātipātakammassa diṭṭhimānalobhādīhipi
tika-s0103t0:509_3: kiliṭṭhatā siddhā hoti, micchācārassa dosādīhi kiliṭṭhatā. Tenāha “saṃkilesoyevā”tiādi.
tika-s0103t0:509_4: Pubbe vuttaatthavasena pana sammukhenapi nesaṃ kilesapariyāyo labbhateva. Etadatthaparidīpakamevāti
tika-s0103t0:509_5: yo “pāṇātipāto kho”tiādinā vutto, etassa atthassa paridīpakameva. Yadi evaṃ kasmā
tika-s0103t0:509_6: puna vuttanti āha “gāthābandha”nti, tassa atthassa sukhaggahaṇatthaṃ bhagavā gāthābandhaṃ avocāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0103t0:511_0: 246. “Pāpakammaṃ karotī”ti kasmā ayaṃ uddesaniddeso pavattoti antolīnacodanaṃ sandhāya
tika-s0103t0:511_1: “idaṃ bhagavā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Sukkapakkhavasena hi uddeso kato, kaṇhapakkhavasena ca
tika-s0103t0:511_2: niddeso āraddho. Kāraketi pāpakammassa kārake. Akārako pākaṭo hoti yathā paṭipajjanto
tika-s0103t0:511_3: pāpaṃ karoti nāma, tathā appaṭipajjanato. Saṃkilesadhammavivajjanapubbakaṃ vodānadhammapaṭipattiācikkhanaṃ
tika-s0103t0:511_4: idha desanākosallaṃ. Paṭhamataraṃ kārakaṃ dassento āha yathā “vāmaṃ muñca dakkhiṇaṃ
tika-s0103t0:511_5: gaṇhā”ti tathā hi bhagavā aṭṭhatiṃsa maṅgalāni dassento “asevanā ca bālāna”nti vatvā
tika-s0103t0:511_6: “paṇḍitānañca sevanā”ti avoca. Chandāgatinti ettha sandhivasena saralopoti dassento
tika-s0103t0:511_7: āha “chandena pemena agati”nti. Chandāti hetumhi nissakkavacananti āha “chandenā”ti.
tika-s0103t0:511_8: Chanda-saddo cettha taṇhāpariyāyo, na kusalacchandādipariyāyoti āha “pemenā”ti. Parapadesūti
tika-s0103t0:511_9: “dosāgatiṃ gacchanto”tiādīsu vākyesu. “Eseva nayo”ti iminā “dosena kopenā”ti evamādi
tika-s0103t0:511_10: atthavacanaṃ atidisati. Mittoti daḷhamitto, sambhattoti attho. Sandiṭṭhoti diṭṭhamattasahāyo.
tika-s0103t0:511_12: Tenevāha “taṅkhaṇuppannakodhavasena vā”ti. Yaṃ vā taṃ vā ayuttaṃ akāraṇaṃ vatvā.
tika-s0103t0:511_13: Visame corādike, visamāni vā kāyaduccaritādīni samādāya vattanena nissito visamanissito.
tika-s0103t0:512: Chandāgatiādīni na gacchati maggeneva catunnampi agatigamanānaṃ pahīnattā, agatigamanānīti ca tathāpavattā apāyagamanīyā akusalacittuppādā veditabbā agati gacchati etehīti.
tika-s0103t0:513_0: Yassati tena kittīyatīti yaso, thutighoso. Yassati tena purecarānucarabhāvena parivārīyatīti
tika-s0103t0:513_1: yaso, parivāroti āha “kittiyasopi parivārayasopī”ti. Parihāyatīti pubbe yo ca yāvatake
tika-s0103t0:513_2: labbhati, tato parito hāyati parikkhayaṃ gacchati.
tika-s0103t0:515_0: 247. Pūve bhājane pakkhipitvā tajjaṃ udakaṃ datvā madditvā katā pūvasurā. Evaṃ sesasurāpi.
tika-s0103t0:515_1: Kiṇṇāti pana tassā surāya bījaṃ vuccati, ye “surāmodakā” tipi vuccanti, te pakkhipitvā
tika-s0103t0:515_2: katā kiṇṇapakkhittā. Harītakīsāsapādinānāsambhārehi saṃyojitā sambhārasaṃyuttā. Madhukatālanāḷikerādipuppharaso
tika-s0103t0:515_3: cirapārivāsiko pupphāsavo. Panasādiphalaraso phalāsavo. Muddikāraso madhvāsavo. Ucchuraso
tika-s0103t0:515_5: Taṃ sabbampīti taṃ sabbaṃ dasavidhampi. Madakaraṇavasena majjaṃ pivantaṃ madayatīti
tika-s0103t0:515_6: katvā. Surāmerayamajje pamādaṭṭhānaṃ surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānaṃ. Anu anu yogoti
tika-s0103t0:515_7: punappunaṃ taṃsamaṅgitā. Tenāha “punappunaṃ karaṇa”nti, aparāparaṃ pavattananti attho.
tika-s0103t0:515_8: Uppannā ceva bhogā parihāyanti pānabyasanena byasanakaraṇato. Anuppannā ca nuppajjanti
tika-s0103t0:515_9: pamattassa kammantesu ñāyakaraṇābhāvato. Bhogānanti bhuñjitabbaṭṭhena “bhogā”ti laddhanāmānaṃ
tika-s0103t0:515_10: kāmaguṇānaṃ. Apāyamukha-saddassa attho heṭṭhā vutto eva. Avelāyāti ayuttavelāya.
tika-s0103t0:515_11: Yadā vicarato attharakkhādayo na honti. Visikhāsu cariyāti racchāsu vicaraṇaṃ.
tika-s0103t0:516_0: Samajjā vuccati maho, yattha naccānipi payojīyanti, tesaṃ dassanādiatthaṃ tattha
tika-s0103t0:516_1: abhirativasena caraṇaṃ upagamanaṃ samajjābhicaraṇaṃ. Naccādidassanavasenāti naccādīnaṃ
tika-s0103t0:516_2: dassanādivasenāti ādisaddalopo daṭṭhabbo, dassanena vā savanampi gahitaṃ virūpekasesanayena.
tika-s0103t0:516_4: “dassanavasena” icceva vuttaṃ. Idha cittālasiyatā akāraṇanti “kāyālasiyatā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t0:518_0: 248. Sayaṃ daṭṭhabbanti sandiṭṭhaṃ. Sandiṭṭhameva sandiṭṭhikaṃ, dhanajānisaddāpekkhāya
tika-s0103t0:518_1: pana itthiliṅgavasena niddeso, diṭṭhadhammikāti ayamettha atthoti āha “idhalokabhāvinī”ti.
tika-s0103t0:518_2: Samaṃ, sammā passitabbāti vā sandiṭṭhikā, pānasamakālabhāvinīti attho. Kalahappavaḍḍhanī
tika-s0103t0:518_3: mittassa kalahe anādīnavadassibhāvato. Khettaṃ uppattiṭṭhānabhāvato. Āyatananti vā
tika-s0103t0:518_4: kāraṇaṃ, ākaro vāti attho. Paraloke akittiṃ pāpuṇanti akittisaṃvattaniyassa kammassa
tika-s0103t0:518_5: pasavanato. Kopīnaṃ vā pākaṭabhāvena akattabbarahassakammaṃ. Surāmadamattā ca pubbe
tika-s0103t0:518_6: attanā kataṃ tādisaṃ kammaṃ amattakāle chādentā vicaritvā mattakāle paccatthikānampi
tika-s0103t0:518_7: vivaranti pākaṭaṃ karonti, tena tesaṃ sā surā tassa kopīnassa nidaṃsanato “kopīnanidaṃsanī”ti
tika-s0103t0:518_8: vuccatīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Kammassakatāpaññanti nidassanamattaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
