tika-s0103t0:903_10: gatattāti attano ārammaṇe eva pavattattā. Ahānabhāgiyattāti ṭhitibhāgiyattā, visesabhāgiyattā
tika-s0103t0:903_11: vā. Suṭṭhu vimuttanti vikkhambhanavimuttiyā sammadeva vimuttaṃ. Cittassa kāyassa
tika-s0103t0:903_12: ca hananato vighāto, dukkhaṃ. Paridahanato pariḷāho, kāmadaratho. Na vedayati anuppajjanato.
tika-s0103t0:903_13: Nissaranti tatoti nissaraṇaṃ. Ke nissaranti? Kāmā. Evañca katvā kāmānanti kattari
tika-s0103t0:903_14: sāmivacanaṃ suṭṭhu yujjati. Yadaggena kāmā tato “nissaṭā”ti vuccanti, tadaggena jhānampi
tika-s0103t0:903_15: kāmato “nissaṭa”nti vattabbataṃ labhatīti vuttaṃ “kāmehi nissaṭattā”ti. Evaṃ vikkhambhanavasena
tika-s0103t0:903_16: kāmanissaraṇaṃ vatvā idāni samucchedavasena accantatova nissaraṇaṃ dassetuṃ “yo panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t0:904_0: Sesapadesūti sesakoṭṭhāsesu. Ayaṃ pana visesoti visesaṃ vadantena “taṃ jhānaṃ pādakaṃ
tika-s0103t0:904_1: katvā”tiādiko avisesoti vatvā dutiyatatiyavāresu sabbaso anāmaṭṭho, catutthavāre
tika-s0103t0:904_2: pana ayampi visesoti dassetuṃ “accantanissaraṇe cettha arahattaphalaṃ yojetabba”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t0:905_0: Yasmā arūpajjhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā aggamaggaṃ adhigantvā arahatte ṭhitassa cittaṃ sabbaso
tika-s0103t0:905_1: rūpehi nissaṭaṃ nāma hoti. Tassa hi phalasamāpattito vuṭṭhāya vīmaṃsanatthaṃ rūpābhimukhaṃ
tika-s0103t0:905_2: cittaṃ pesentassa idamakkhātanti samathayānikānaṃ vasena heṭṭhā cattāro vārā kathitā,
tika-s0103t0:905_3: idaṃ pana sukkhavipassakassa vasenāti āha “suddhasaṅkhāre”tiādi. Puna sakkāyo natthīti
tika-s0103t0:905_4: uppannanti idāni me sakkāyappabandho natthīti vīmaṃsantassa uppannaṃ.
tika-s0103t0:907_0: 322. Vimuttiyā vaṭṭadukkhato vimuccanassa āyatanāni kāraṇāni vimuttāyatanānīti āha
tika-s0103t0:907_1: “vimuccanakāraṇānī”ti. Pāḷiatthaṃ jānantassāti “idha sīlaṃ āgataṃ, idha samādhi,
tika-s0103t0:907_2: idha paññā”tiādinā taṃ taṃ pāḷiatthaṃ yāthāvato jānantassa. Pāḷiṃ jānantassāti tadatthajotanaṃ
tika-s0103t0:907_3: pāḷiṃ yāthāvato upadhārentassa. Taruṇapītīti sañjātamattā mudukā pīti jāyati. Kathaṃ
tika-s0103t0:907_4: jāyati? Yathādesitadhammaṃ upadhārentassa tadanucchavikameva attano kāyavacīmanosamācāraṃ
tika-s0103t0:907_5: pariggaṇhantassa somanassappattassa pamodalakkhaṇaṃ pāmojjaṃ jāyati. Tuṭṭhākārabhūtā
tika-s0103t0:907_6: balavapītīti purimuppannāya pītiyā vasena laddhāsevanattā ativiya tuṭṭhākārabhūtā
tika-s0103t0:907_7: kāyacittadarathapassambhanasamatthāya passaddhiyā paccayo bhavituṃ samatthā balappattā
tika-s0103t0:907_8: pīti jāyati. Yasmā nāmakāye passaddhe rūpakāyopi passaddho eva hoti, tasmā “nāmakāyo
tika-s0103t0:907_9: paṭipassambhati” icceva vuttaṃ. Sukhaṃ paṭilabhatīti vakkhamānassa cittasamādhānassa
tika-s0103t0:907_10: paccayo bhavituṃ samatthaṃ cetasikaṃ nirāmisaṃ sukhaṃ paṭilabhati vindati. “Samādhiyatī”ti
tika-s0103t0:907_11: ettha na yo koci samādhi adhippeto, atha kho anuttarasamādhīti dassento “arahatta
tika-s0103t0:907_12: phalasamādhinā samādhiyatī”ti āha. “Ayañhī”tiādi tassā desanāya tādisassa puggalassa
tika-s0103t0:907_14: nayituṃ. Samādhiyeva samādhinimittanti kammaṭṭhānapāḷiāruḷho samādhiyeva parato uppajjanakabhāvanāsamādhissa
tika-s0103t0:908_0: Vimutti vuccati arahattaṃ sabbaso kilesehi paṭippassaddhivimuttīti katvā. Paripācentīti
tika-s0103t0:908_1: sādhenti nipphādenti. Aniccānupassanāñāṇe nissayapaccayabhūte uppannasaññā, tena
tika-s0103t0:908_2: ñāṇena sahagatāti attho. Sesesupi eseva nayo. Yaṃ panettha vattabbaṃ, taṃ visuddhimaggasaṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ
tika-s0103t0:911_0: 323. Attānaṃ adhi ajjhattā, adhi-saddo samāsavisaye adhikāratthaṃ, pavattiatthañca
tika-s0103t0:911_1: gahetvā pavattatīti attānaṃ adhikicca uddissa pavattā ajjhattā; ajjhattesu bhavāni
tika-s0103t0:911_2: ajjhattikānīti niyakajjhattesupi abbhantarāni cakkhādīni vuccanti, tāni pana yena
tika-s0103t0:911_3: ajjhattabhāvena “ajjhattikānī”ti vuccanti, tamatthaṃ pākaṭaṃ katvā dassento “ajjhattikānī”ti
tika-s0103t0:911_4: āha. Saddatthato pana ajjhattajjhattāniyeva ajjhattajjhattikāni yathā “venayiko”ti
tika-s0103t0:911_5: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tato ajjhattatoti tato ajjhattajjhattato, yāni ajjhattikāni vuttāni.
tika-s0103t0:911_6: Ajjhattikānañhi paṭiyogīni bāhirāni ajjhattadhammānaṃ viya bahiddhādhammā. “Ajjhattikānī”ti
tika-s0103t0:911_7: hi saparasantānikāni cakkhādīni vuccanti, tathā rūpādīni “bāhirānī”ti. Ajjhattāni
tika-s0103t0:911_8: pana sasantānikā eva cakkhurūpādayo, tato aññeva bahiddhāti. “Viññāṇasamūhā”ti ettha
tika-s0103t0:911_9: yadipi tesaṃ viññāṇānaṃ samodhānaṃ natthi bhinnakālikattā, cittena pana ekajjhaṃ
tika-s0103t0:911_11: cakkhupasādaṃ nissāya paccayaṃ labhitvā uppannaṃ kusalākusalavipākaviññāṇaṃ cakkhuviññāṇatāsāmaññena
tika-s0103t0:911_12: ekajjhaṃ katvā vuttaṃ. Cakkhusannissito samphasso, na cakkhudvāriko. Ime dasa samphasseti
tika-s0103t0:911_13: ime pasādavatthuke dasa vipākasamphasse ṭhapetvā. Eteneva nayenāti etena phasse vutteneva
tika-s0103t0:911_14: nayena. Taṇhāchakke taṇhaṃ ārabbha pavattāpi taṇhā dhammataṇhāti veditabbā.
tika-s0103t0:912_0: Appaṭissayoti appaṭissavo, va-kārassa ya-kāraṃ katvā niddeso. Garunā kismiñci vutte
tika-s0103t0:912_1: gāravavasena paṭissavanaṃ paṭissavo, paṭissavabhūtaṃ, taṃsabhāgañca yaṃ kiñci gāravaṃ,
tika-s0103t0:912_2: natthi etasmiṃ paṭissavoti appaṭissavo, gāravarahito. Tenāha “anīcavuttī”ti. Yathā
tika-s0103t0:912_3: cetiyaṃ uddissa kataṃ satthu katasadisaṃ, evaṃ cetiyassa purato kataṃ satthu purato
tika-s0103t0:912_4: katasadisaṃ evāti āha “parinibbute panā”tiādi. Sakkaccaṃ na gacchatīti ādaraṃ gāravaṃ
tika-s0103t0:912_5: uppādetvā na upasaṅkamati. Yathā sikkhāya ekadese kopite, agārave ca kate sabbā sikkhā
tika-s0103t0:912_6: kuppati, sabbattha ca agāravaṃ kataṃ nāma hoti samudāyato saṃvarasamādānaṃ avayavato
tika-s0103t0:912_7: bhedoti. Evaṃ ekabhikkhusmiṃpi…pe… agāravo katova hoti. Anādariyamattenapi sikkhāya
tika-s0103t0:912_8: aparipūriyevāti āha “apūrayamānova sikkhāya agāravo nāmā”ti. Appamādalakkhaṇaṃ sammāpaṭipatti.
tika-s0103t0:913_0: Somanassūpavicārāti somanassasahagatā vicārā adhippetā, upasaddo ca nipātamattanti
tika-s0103t0:913_1: āha “somanassasampayuttā vicārā”ti. Tathā hissa abhidhamme “cāro vicāro…pe… upavicāro”ti
tika-s0103t0:913_2: niddeso pavatto. Somanassakāraṇabhūtanti sabhāvato, saṅkappatopi somanassassa uppattiyā
tika-s0103t0:913_3: paccayabhūtaṃ. Kāmaṃ parittabhūmakā vitakkavicārā aññamaññamaviyogino, kiriyābhedato
tika-s0103t0:913_4: pana paṭhamābhinipātatāya vitakkassa byāpāro sātisayo. Tato paraṃ vicārassāti taṃ
tika-s0103t0:913_6: Laddhapubbāsevanassa vicārassa byāpāro paññā viya hoti. Tathā hi “vicāro vicikicchāya
tika-s0103t0:913_7: paṭipakkho”ti peṭake vuttaṃ. “Diṭṭhisāmaññagato”ti ettha yāya diṭṭhiyā puggalo diṭṭhisāmaññaṃ
tika-s0103t0:913_8: gato vutto, sā paṭhamamaggasammādiṭṭhi kosambakasutte adhippetoti āha “kosambakasutte
tika-s0103t0:913_9: paṭhamamaggo kathito”ti. Idhāti imasmiṃ sutte. Catūsupi maggesu sammādiṭṭhi diṭṭhiggahaṇena
tika-s0103t0:915_0: 325. Kodhanoti kujjhanasīlo. Yasmā so appahīnakodhatāya vigatakodhano nāma na hoti,
tika-s0103t0:915_1: tasmā “kodhena samannāgato”ti āha. Upanāho etassa atthi, upanayhanasīloti vā upanāhī.
tika-s0103t0:915_2: Vivādo nāma uppajjamāno yebhuyyena paṭhamaṃ dvinnaṃ vasena uppajjatīti vuttaṃ “dvinnaṃ
tika-s0103t0:915_3: bhikkhūnaṃ vivādo”ti. So pana yathā bahūnaṃ anatthāvaho hoti, taṃ nidassanamukhena
tika-s0103t0:916_0: Paraguṇamakkhanāya pavattopi attano kārakaṃ gūthena paharantaṃ gūtho viya paṭhamataraṃ
tika-s0103t0:916_1: makkhetīti makkho, so etassa atthīti makkhī. Palāsatīti palāso, parassa guṇe ḍaṃsitvā
tika-s0103t0:916_2: viya apanetīti attho, so etassa atthīti palāsī. Palāsī puggalo hi dutiyassa dhuraṃ
tika-s0103t0:916_3: na deti, samaṃ pasāretvā tiṭṭhati. Tenāha “yugaggāhalakkhaṇena palāsena samannāgato”ti.
tika-s0103t0:916_5: micchādiṭṭhiyā vasenettha micchādiṭṭhi veditabbāti āha “natthikavādī ahetukavādī akiriyavādī”ti.
tika-s0103t0:918_0: 326. Hāpetvāti kusalacittaṃ parihāpetvā pavattitumeva appadānavasena. Abhūtaṃ byākaraṇaṃ
tika-s0103t0:918_1: byākaroti “mettā hi kho me cetovimutti bhāvitā”tiādinā attani avijjamānaṃ guṇabyāhāraṃ
tika-s0103t0:918_2: byāharati. Cetovimutti-saddaṃ apekkhitvā “nissaṭā”ti vuttaṃ. Puna byāpādo natthīti
tika-s0103t0:918_3: idāni mama byāpādo nāma natthi sabbaso natthīti ñatvā.
tika-s0103t0:919_0: “Animittā”ti vatvā yesaṃ nimittānaṃ abhāvena arahattaphalasamāpattiyā animittatā,
tika-s0103t0:919_1: taṃ dassetuṃ “sā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha rāgassa nimittaṃ, rāgo eva vā nimittanti
tika-s0103t0:919_2: rāganimittaṃ. Ādi-saddena dosanimittādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Rūpavedanādisaṅkhāranimittaṃ
tika-s0103t0:919_3: rūpanimittādi. Tesaññeva niccādivasena upaṭṭhānaṃ niccanimittādi. Tayidaṃ nimittaṃ
tika-s0103t0:919_4: yasmā sabbena sabbaṃ arahattaphale natthi, tasmā vuttaṃ “sā hi…pe… animittāti vuttā”ti.
tika-s0103t0:919_5: Nimittaṃ anusaratīti taṃ nimittaṃ anugacchati ārabbha pavattati.
tika-s0103t0:920_0: Asmimānoti “asmī”ti pavatto attavisayo māno. Ayaṃ nāma ahaṃ asmīti rūpalakkhaṇo,
tika-s0103t0:920_1: vedanādīsu vā aññataralakkhaṇo ayaṃ nāma attā ahaṃ asmi. “Asmī”ti māno samugghāṭīyati
tika-s0103t0:920_2: etenāti asmimānasamugghāto, arahattamaggo. Puna asmimāno natthīti tassa anuppattidhammatāpādanaṃ
tika-s0103t0:922_0: 327. Natthi etesaṃ uttarāni visiṭṭhānīti anuttarāni, anuttarāni eva anuttariyāni
tika-s0103t0:922_1: yathā anantameva ānantariyanti āha “anuttariyānīti anuttarānī”ti. Dassanānuttariyaṃ
tika-s0103t0:922_2: nāma anuttaraphalavisesāvahattā. Esa nayo sesesupi. Sattavidhaariyadhanalābhoti sattavidhasaddhādilokuttaradhanalābho.
tika-s0103t0:922_3: Sikkhattayapūraṇanti adhisīlasikkhādīnaṃ tissannaṃ sikkhānaṃ paripūraṇaṃ. Tattha
tika-s0103t0:922_4: paripūraṇaṃ nippariyāyato asekkhānaṃ vasena veditabbaṃ. Kalyāṇaputhujjanato paṭṭhāya
tika-s0103t0:922_5: hi satta sekkhā tisso sikkhā pūrenti nāma, arahā pana paripuṇṇasikkhoti. Iti imāni
tika-s0103t0:923_0: Anussatiyo eva diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikādihitasukhānaṃ kāraṇabhāvato ṭhānānīti anussatiṭṭhānāni.
tika-s0103t0:923_1: Evaṃ anussaratoti yathā buddhānussati visesādhigamassa ṭhānaṃ hoti, evaṃ “itipi so
tika-s0103t0:923_2: bhagavā”tiādinā buddhaguṇe anussarantassa. Upacārakammaṭṭhānanti paccakkhato upacārajjhānāvahaṃ
tika-s0103t0:923_3: kammaṭṭhānaṃ, paramparāya pana yāva arahattā lokiyalokuttaravisesāvahaṃ.
tika-s0103t0:925_0: 328. Niccavihārāti sabbadā pavattanakavihārā. Ṭhapetvā hi samāpattivelaṃ, bhavaṅgavelañca
tika-s0103t0:925_1: khīṇāsavā imināva chaḷaṅgupekkhāvihārena sabbakālaṃ viharanti. Cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvāti
tika-s0103t0:925_2: nissayavohārena vuttaṃ. Sasambhārakathā hesā yathā “dhanunā vijjhatī”ti. Tasmā nissayasīsena
tika-s0103t0:925_3: nissitassa gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbanti āha “cakkhuviññāṇena disvā”ti. Iṭṭhe arajjantoti
tika-s0103t0:925_4: iṭṭhe ārammaṇe rāgaṃ anuppādento maggena samucchinnattā. Neva sumano hoti gehasitapemavasenapi.
tika-s0103t0:925_5: Na dummano pasādaññathattavasenapi. Asamapekkhaneti iṭṭhepi aniṭṭhepi majjhattepi
tika-s0103t0:925_6: ārammaṇe na samaṃ na sammā ayoniso gahaṇe. Yo akhīṇāsavānaṃ moho uppajjati, taṃ anuppādento
tika-s0103t0:925_7: maggeneva tassa samugghāṭitattā. Ñāṇupekkhāvaseneva upekkhako viharati majjhatto.
tika-s0103t0:925_9: Chaḷaṅgupekkhāti chasu dvāresu pavattā satisampajaññassa vasena chāvayavā upekkhā.
tika-s0103t0:925_10: Ñāṇasampayuttacittāni labbhanti tehi vinā sampajānatāya asambhavato. Mahācittānīti
tika-s0103t0:925_12: pavattibhedanato. Dasa cittānīti aṭṭha mahākiriyacittāni hasituppādavoṭṭhabbanacittehi
tika-s0103t0:925_13: saddhiṃ dasa cittāni labbhanti. Arajjanādussanavasena pavatti tesampi sādhāraṇāti.“Upekkhako
tika-s0103t0:925_14: viharatī”ti vacanato chaḷaṅgupekkhāvasena āgatānaṃ imesaṃ satatavihārānaṃ “somanassaṃ
tika-s0103t0:925_15: kathaṃ labbhatī”ti codetvā “āsevanato labbhatī”ti sayameva pariharatīti. Kiñcāpi
tika-s0103t0:925_16: khīṇāsavo iṭṭhāniṭṭhepi ārammaṇe majjhatte viya bahulaṃ upekkhako viharati attano
tika-s0103t0:925_17: parisuddhapakatibhāvāvijahanato, kadāci pana tathā cetobhisaṅkhārābhāve yaṃ taṃ sabhāvato
tika-s0103t0:925_18: iṭṭhaṃ ārammaṇaṃ, tattha yāthāvasabhāvaggahaṇavasenapi arahato cittaṃ somanassasahagataṃ
tika-s0103t0:925_19: hutvā pavattateva, tañca kho pubbāsevanavasena. Tenāha “āsevanato labbhatī”ti.
tika-s0103t0:927_0: 329. “Abhijātiyo”ti ettha abhi-saddo upasaggamattaṃ, na atthavisesajotakoti āha “jātiyo”ti.
tika-s0103t0:927_1: Abhijāyatīti etthāpi eseva nayo. Jāyatīti ca antogadhahetuatthapadaṃ, uppādetīti
tika-s0103t0:927_2: attho. Jātiyā, taṃnibbattakakammānañca kaṇhasukkapariyāyatāya yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ
tika-s0103t0:927_3: heṭṭhā vuttameva. Paṭippassambhanavasena kilesānaṃ nibbāpanato nibbānaṃ sace kaṇhaṃ
tika-s0103t0:927_4: bhaveyya yathā taṃ dasavidhaṃ dussīlyakammaṃ. Sace sukkaṃ bhaveyya yathā taṃ dānasīlādikusalakammaṃ.
tika-s0103t0:927_5: Dvinnampi kaṇhasukkavipākānaṃ. Arahattaṃ adhippetaṃ “abhijāyatī”ti vacanato. Taṃ
tika-s0103t0:927_6: kilesanibbānante jātattā nibbānaṃ yathā rāgādīnaṃ khayante jātattā rāgakkhayo dosakkhayo mohakkhayoti.
tika-s0103t0:929_0: Nibbedho vuccati nibbānaṃ maggañāṇena nibbijjhitabbaṭṭhena, paṭivijjhitabbaṭṭhenāti
tika-s0103t0:929_1: attho. Nirodhānupassanāñāṇeti nirodhānupassanāñāṇe nissayapaccayabhūte uppannā saññā,
tika-s0103t0:932_1: paṭilābhāpanaṭṭhena, sampattīnaṃ vā paṭilābho sampattipaṭilābho, tassa kāraṇaṃ sampattipaṭilābhaṭṭho,
tika-s0103t0:932_3: ubhayahitatthikehi dhanāyitabbaṭṭhena dhanaṃ saddhādhanaṃ. Etthāti etesu dhanesu.
tika-s0103t0:932_4: Sabbaseṭṭhaṃ sabbesaṃ paṭilābhakāraṇabhāvato, tesañca saṃkilesavisodhanena mahājutikamahāvipphārabhāvāpādanato.
tika-s0103t0:932_5: Tenāha “paññāya hī”tiādi. Tattha paññāya ṭhatvāti kammassakatāpaññāya patiṭṭhāya
tika-s0103t0:932_6: sucaritādīni pūretvā saggūpagā honti. Tattha ceva pāramitā paññāya ca ṭhatvā sāvakapāramiñāṇādīni paṭivijjhanti.
tika-s0103t0:933: Samādhiṃ parikkharonti abhisaṅkharontīti samādhiparikkhārā, samādhissa sambhārabhūtā sammādiṭṭhiādayo. Idha pana sahakārīkāraṇabhūtā adhippetāti āha “samādhiparivārā”ti.
tika-s0103t0:934_0: Asataṃ asādhūnaṃ dhammā tesaṃ asādhubhāvasādhanato. Asantāti asundarā gārayhā. Tenāha
tika-s0103t0:934_2: vuttaṃ. Catunnampi hi saccānaṃ visesena dassanato maggapaññā sātisayaṃ “vipassanā”ti
tika-s0103t0:935_0: Sappurisānaṃ dhammāti sappurisānaṃyeva dhammā, na asappurisānaṃ. Dhammānudhammapaṭipattiyā
tika-s0103t0:935_1: eva hi dhammaññuādibhāvo, na pāḷidhammapaṭhanādimattena. Bhāsitassāti suttageyyādibhāsitassa
tika-s0103t0:935_2: ceva tadaññassa ca attatthaparatthabodhakassa padassa. Atthakusalatāvasena atthaṃ
tika-s0103t0:935_3: jānātīti atthaññū. Attānaṃ jānātīti yāthāvato attano pamāṇajānanavasena attānaṃ jānāti.
tika-s0103t0:935_5: “paṭiggahaṇaparibhogesu” icceva vuttaṃ. Evañhi tā anavajjā hontīti. Yogassa adhigamāyāti
tika-s0103t0:935_6: bhāvanāya anuyuñjanassa. Atisambādhanti atikhuddakaṃ atikkhapaññassa tāvatā kālena
tika-s0103t0:935_7: tīretuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā. Aṭṭhavidhaṃ parisanti khattiyaparisādikaṃ aṭṭhavidhaṃ parisaṃ.
tika-s0103t0:935_8: Bhikkhuparisādikaṃ catubbidhaṃ khattiyaparisādikaṃ manussaparisaṃyeva puna catubbidhaṃ
tika-s0103t0:935_9: gahetvā aṭṭhavidhaṃ vadanti apare. “Imaṃ me sevantassa akusalā dhammā parihāyanti,
tika-s0103t0:935_10: kusalā dhammā abhivaḍḍhanti, tasmā sevitabbo, vipariyāyato tadañño asevitabbo”ti
tika-s0103t0:935_11: evaṃ sevitabbāsevitabbaṃ puggalaṃ jānātīti puggalaññū. Evaṃ tesaṃ puggalānampi bodhanaṃ
tika-s0103t0:936_1: Natthi dāni imassa dasāti niddaso. Pañhoti ñātuṃ icchito attho. Puna dasavasso na
tika-s0103t0:936_2: hotīti tesaṃ matimattanti dassetuṃ “so kirā”ti kirasaddaggahaṇaṃ. “Niddaso”ti cetaṃ
tika-s0103t0:936_3: desanāmattaṃ, tassa nibbīsādibhāvassa viya ninnavādibhāvassa ca icchitattāti dassetuṃ
tika-s0103t0:936_4: “na kevalañcā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Gāme vicarantoti gāme piṇḍāya vicaranto.
tika-s0103t0:937_0: Na idaṃ titthiyānaṃ adhivacanaṃ tesu tannimittassa abhāvā. Sāsanepi sekkhassāpi na
tika-s0103t0:937_1: idaṃ adhivacanaṃ, kimaṅgaṃ pana puthujjanassa. Yassa panetaṃ adhivacanaṃ, yena ca
tika-s0103t0:937_2: kāraṇena, taṃ dassetuṃ “khīṇāsavasseta”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Appaṭisandhikabhāvo hissa paccakkhato
tika-s0103t0:937_3: kāraṇaṃ. Paramparāya itarāni, yāni pāḷiyaṃ āgatāni.
tika-s0103t0:938_0: Sikkhāya sammadeva ādānaṃ sikkhāsamādānaṃ, taṃ panassā pāripūriyā veditabbanti āha
tika-s0103t0:938_1: “sikkhattayapūraṇe”ti. Sikkhāya vā sammadeva ādito paṭṭhāya rakkhaṇaṃ sikkhāsamādānaṃ,
tika-s0103t0:938_2: tañca atthato pūraṇe paricchinnaṃ arakkhaṇe sabbena sabbaṃ abhāvato, rakkhaṇe ca
tika-s0103t0:938_3: paripūraṇato. Bahalacchandoti daḷhacchando. Āyatinti anantarānāgatadivasādikālo adhippeto,
tika-s0103t0:938_4: na anāgatabhavoti āha “anāgate punadivasādīsupī”ti. Sikkhaṃ paripūrentassa tattha
tika-s0103t0:938_5: niviṭṭhaatthitā avigatapematā, tebhūmakadhammānaṃ aniccādivasena sammadeva nijjhānaṃ
tika-s0103t0:938_8: Vīriyārambheti sammappadhānavīriyassa paggaṇhane, taṃ pana sabbaso vīriyassa paribrūhanaṃ
tika-s0103t0:938_9: hotīti āha “kāyikacetasikassa vīriyassa pūraṇe”ti. Satiyañceva nepakkabhāve cāti
tika-s0103t0:938_10: satokāritāya ceva sampajānakāritāya ca. Satisampajaññabaleneva vīriyārambho ijjhati.
tika-s0103t0:938_12: hi ijjhamāne maggasammādiṭṭhi siddhā eva hoti.
tika-s0103t0:939_0: Asubhānupassanāñāṇeti dasavidhassa, ekādasavidhassāpi vā asubhassa anupassanāvasena
tika-s0103t0:939_1: pavattañāṇe. Idañhi dukkhānupassanāya paricayañāṇaṃ. Ādīnavānupassanāñāṇeti saṅkhārānaṃ
tika-s0103t0:939_3: maggena asamucchinnabhāvena. Anusentīti santāne anu anu sayanti. Kāraṇalābhe hi sati
tika-s0103t0:939_4: uppannārahā kilesā santāne anu anu sayitā viya honti, tasmā te tadavatthā “anusayā”ti
tika-s0103t0:939_5: vuccanti. Thāmagatoti thāmappatto. Thāmagamanañca aññehi asādhāraṇo kāmarāgādīnameva
tika-s0103t0:939_6: āveṇiko sabhāvo daṭṭhabbo. Tathā hi vuttaṃ abhidhamme “thāmagatānusayaṃ pajahatī”ti.
tika-s0103t0:939_7: Kāmarāgo eva anusayo kāmarāgānusayo. Ye pana “kāmarāgassa anusayo kāmarāgānusayo”ti
tika-s0103t0:939_8: vadanti, taṃ tesaṃ matimattaṃ. Na hi kāmarāgavinimutto kāmarāgānusayo nāma koci atthi.
tika-s0103t0:939_9: Yadi “tassa bīja”nti vadeyyuṃ, tampi tabbinimuttaṃ paramatthato na upalabbhatevāti.
tika-s0103t0:941_0: Adhikarīyanti etthāti adhikaraṇāni. Ke adhikarīyanti? Samathā. Kathaṃ adhikarīyantīti?
tika-s0103t0:941_1: Samanavasena, tasmā te tesaṃ samanavasena pavattantīti āha “adhikaraṇāni samentī”tiādi.
tika-s0103t0:941_2: Uppannānaṃ uppannānanti uṭṭhitānaṃ uṭṭhitānaṃ. Samathatthanti samanatthaṃ.
tika-s0103t0:942_0: “Aṭṭhārasahi vatthūhī”ti lakkhaṇavacanametaṃ yathā “yadi me byādhī dāheyyuṃ dātabbamidamosadha”nti,
tika-s0103t0:942_1: tasmā tesu aññataraññatarena vivadantā “aṭṭhārasahi vatthūhi vivadantī”ti vuccanti.
tika-s0103t0:943_0: Adhikaraṇassa sammukhāva vinayanato sammukhāvinayo. Sannipatitaparisāya dhammavādīnaṃ
tika-s0103t0:943_1: yebhuyyatāya yebhuyyasikakammassa karaṇaṃ yebhuyyasikā. Ayanti ayaṃ yathāvuttā catubbidhā
tika-s0103t0:944_0: Saṅghasāmaggivasena sammukhībhāvo, na yathā tathā kārakapuggalānaṃ sammukhātā. Bhūtatāti
tika-s0103t0:944_1: tacchatā. Saccapariyāyo hi idha dhamma-saddo “dhammavādī”tiādīsu viya. Vineti etenāti
tika-s0103t0:944_2: vinayo, tassa tassa adhikaraṇassa vūpasamanāya bhagavatā vuttavidhi, tassa vinayassa
tika-s0103t0:944_3: sammukhatā vinayasammukhatā. Tenāha “yathā taṃ…pe… sammukhatā”ti. Yenāti yena puggalena.
tika-s0103t0:944_4: Vivādavatthusaṅkhāte atthe paccatthikā atthapaccatthikā. Saṅghasammukhatā parihāyati
tika-s0103t0:945_0: Nanti vivādādhikaraṇaṃ. “Na chandāgatiṃ gacchatī”tiādinā vuttaṃ pañcaṅgasamannāgataṃ.
tika-s0103t0:945_1: Guḷhakādīsu alajjussannāya parisāya guḷhako salākaggāho kātabbo lajjussannāya vivaṭako,
tika-s0103t0:945_2: bālussannāya sakaṇṇajappako. Yassā kiriyāya dhammavādino bahutarā, sā yebhuyyasikāti
tika-s0103t0:946_0: “Catūhi samathehi sammatī”ti idaṃ sabbasaṅgāhikavasena vuttaṃ. Tattha pana dvīhi
tika-s0103t0:946_1: dvīhi eva vūpasamanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Evaṃ vinicchitanti sace āpatti natthi, ubho khamāpetvā,
tika-s0103t0:946_2: atha atthi, āpattiṃ dassetvā ropanavasena vinicchitaṃ. Paṭikammaṃ pana āpattādhikaraṇasamathe parato āgamissati.
tika-s0103t0:947: Na samaṇasāruppaṃ assāmaṇakaṃ, samaṇehi akattabbaṃ, tasmiṃ. Ajjhācāre vītikkame sati.
tika-s0103t0:948_0: Paṭicaratoti paṭicchādentassa. Pāpussannatāya pāpiyo, puggalo, tassa kattabbakammaṃ
tika-s0103t0:948_1: tassa pāpiyasikaṃ. Sammukhāvinayeneva vūpasamo natthi paṭiññāya tathārūpāya, khantiyā
tika-s0103t0:949: Etthāti āpattidesanāya. Paṭiññāte āpannabhāvādike karaṇaṃ kiriyā “āyatiṃ saṃvareyyāsī”ti, parivāsadānādivasena ca pavattaṃ vacīkammaṃ paṭiññātakaraṇaṃ.
tika-s0103t0:950_0: Yathānurūpanti “dvīhi samathehi catūhi tīhi ekenā”ti evaṃ vuttanayena yathānurūpaṃ.
tika-s0103t0:950_1: Etthāti imasmiṃ sutte, imasmiṃ vā samathavicāre. Vinicchayanayoti vinicchaye nayamattaṃ.
tika-s0103t0:950_2: Tenāha “vitthāro panā”tiādi. Samantapāsādikāyaṃ vinayaṭṭhakathāya vutto, tasmā vuttanayeneva
tika-s0103t0:954: 333. Ayāthāvāti na yāthāvā. Aniyyānikatāya micchāsabhāvā. Viparītavuttikatāya yāthāvā. Niyyānikatāya sammāsabhāvā aviparītavuttikā.
tika-s0103t0:955_0: 334. Kucchitaṃ sīdatīti kusīto da-kārassa ta-kāraṃ katvā. Yassa dhammassa vasena
tika-s0103t0:955_1: puggalo “kusīto”ti vuccati, so kusītabhāvo idha kusīta-saddena vutto. Vināpi hi bhāvajotanaṃ
tika-s0103t0:955_2: saddaṃ bhāvattho viññāyati yathā “paṭassa sukka”nti, tasmā kusītabhāvavatthūnīti
tika-s0103t0:955_3: attho. Tenāha “kosajjakāraṇānīti attho”ti. Kammaṃ nāma samaṇasāruppaṃ īdisanti āha
tika-s0103t0:955_4: “cīvaravicāraṇādī”ti. Vīriyanti padhānavīriyaṃ, taṃ pana caṅkamanavasena karaṇe “kāyika”ntipi
tika-s0103t0:955_5: vattabbataṃ labhatīti āha “duvidhampī”ti. Pattiyāti pāpuṇanatthaṃ. Osīdananti bhāvanānuyoge
tika-s0103t0:955_6: saṅkoco. Māsehi ācitaṃ nicitaṃ viyāti māsācitaṃ, taṃ maññe. Yasmā māsā tintāvisesena
tika-s0103t0:955_7: garukā honti, tasmā “yathā tintamāso”tiādi vuttaṃ. Vuṭṭhito hoti gilānabhāvāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0103t0:956_0: 335. Tesanti ārambhavatthūnaṃ. Imināva nayenāti iminā kusītavatthūsu vutteneva nayena.
tika-s0103t0:956_1: “Duvidhampi vīriyaṃ ārabhatī”tiādinā, “idaṃ paṭhamanti idaṃ handāhaṃ vīriyaṃ ārabhāmīti
tika-s0103t0:956_2: evaṃ bhāvanāya abbhussahanaṃ paṭhamaṃ ārambhavatthū”tiādinā ca attho veditabbo. Yathā
tika-s0103t0:956_3: tathā paṭhamaṃ pavattaṃ abbhussahanañhi upari vīriyārambhassa kāraṇaṃ hoti. Anurūpapaccavekkhaṇāsahitāni
tika-s0103t0:956_4: hi abbhussahanāni, tammūlakāni vā paccavekkhaṇāni aṭṭha ārambhavatthūni veditabbāni.
tika-s0103t0:957_0: 336. Āsajjāti yassa deti, tassa āmodanahetu tena samāgamanimittaṃ. Tenāha “ettha
tika-s0103t0:957_1: āsādanaṃ dānakāraṇaṃ nāmā”ti. Bhayāti bhayahetu. Nanu bhayaṃ nāma laddhukāmatā rāgādayo
tika-s0103t0:957_2: viya cetanāya avisuddhikaraṃ, taṃ kasmā idha gahitanti? Na idaṃ tādisaṃ corabhayādiṃ
tika-s0103t0:957_3: sandhāya vuttanti dassetuṃ “tatthā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Adāsi meti yaṃ pubbe kataṃ upakāraṃ
tika-s0103t0:957_4: cintetvā dīyati, taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Dassati meti paccupakārāsīsāya yaṃ dīyati,
tika-s0103t0:957_5: taṃ sandhāya vadati. Sāhu dānanti “dānaṃ nāmetaṃ paṇḍitapaññatta”nti sādhusamācāre
tika-s0103t0:957_6: ṭhatvā deti. Alaṅkāratthanti upasobhanatthaṃ. Parivāratthanti parikkhāratthaṃ. Dānañhi
tika-s0103t0:957_7: datvā taṃ paccavekkhantassa pāmojjapītisomanassādayo uppajjanti, lobhadosaissāmaccherādayo
tika-s0103t0:957_8: vidūrī bhavanti. Idāni dānaṃ anukūladhammaparibrūhanena, paccanīkadhammavidūrībhāvakaraṇena
tika-s0103t0:957_9: ca bhāvanācittassa upasobhanāya ca parikkhārāya ca hotīti “alaṅkāratthaṃ, parivāratthañca
tika-s0103t0:957_10: detī”ti vuttaṃ. Tenāha “dānañhi cittaṃ mudukaṃ karotī”tiādi. Muducitto hoti laddhā
tika-s0103t0:957_11: dāyake “iminā mayhaṃ saṅgaho kato”ti, dātāpi laddhari. Tena vuttaṃ “ubhinnampi cittaṃ mudukaṃ karotī”ti.
tika-s0103t0:958_0: Adantadamananti adantā anassavāpissa dānena dantā assavā honti vase vattanti. Adānaṃ
tika-s0103t0:958_1: dantadūsakanti adānaṃ pana pubbe dantānaṃ assavānampi vighātuppādanena cittaṃ dūseti.
tika-s0103t0:958_2: Unnamanti dāyakā, piyaṃvadā ca paresaṃ garucittīkāraṭṭhānatāya. Namanti paṭiggāhakā
tika-s0103t0:959: Cittālaṅkāradānameva uttamaṃ anupakkiliṭṭhatāya, suparisuddhatāya, guṇavisesapaccayatāya ca.
tika-s0103t0:960_0: 337. Dānapaccayāti dānakāraṇā, dānamayapuññassa katattā upacitattāti attho. Upapattiyoti
tika-s0103t0:960_1: manussesu, devesu ca nibbattiyo. Ṭhapetīti ekavārameva anuppajjitvā yathā uparūpari
tika-s0103t0:960_2: tenevākārena pavattati, evaṃ ṭhapeti. Tadeva casa adhiṭṭhānanti āha “tasseva vevacana”nti.
tika-s0103t0:960_3: Vaḍḍhetīti brūheti, na hāpeti. Vimuttanti adhimuttaṃ, ninnaṃ poṇaṃ pabbhāranti attho.
tika-s0103t0:960_4: Vimuttanti vā visiṭṭhaṃ. Nippariyāyato uttari nāma paṇītaṃ majjhepi hīnamajjhimavibhāgassa
tika-s0103t0:960_5: labbhanatoti vuttaṃ “uttari abhāvitanti tato upari maggaphalatthāya abhāvita”nti.
tika-s0103t0:960_6: Saṃvattati tathā paṇihitaṃ dānamayacittaṃ. Yaṃ pana pāḷiyaṃ “tañca kho”tiādi vuttaṃ,
tika-s0103t0:960_7: taṃ tatrūpapattiyā vibandhakāradussīlyābhāvadassanaparaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, na dānamayassa
tika-s0103t0:961_0: Samucchinnarāgassāti samucchinnakāmarāgassa. Tassa hi siyā brahmaloke upapatti, na
tika-s0103t0:961_1: samucchinnabhavarāgassa. Vītarāgaggahaṇena cettha kāmesu vītarāgatā adhippetā, yāya
tika-s0103t0:961_2: brahmalokūpapatti siyā. Tenāha “dānamattenevā”tiādi. Yadi evaṃ dānaṃ tattha kiṃ atthiyanti
tika-s0103t0:961_3: āha “dānaṃ panā”tiādi. Dānena muducittoti baddhāghāte verīpuggalepi attano dānasampaṭicchanena mudubhūtacitto.
tika-s0103t0:962: Parisīdati parito ito cito ca samāgacchatīti parisā, samūho.
tika-s0103t0:963_0: Lokassa dhammāti sattalokassa avassambhāvī dhammā. Tenāha “etehi mutto nāma natthī”tiādi.
tika-s0103t0:963_1: Yasmā te lokadhammā aparāparaṃ kadāci lokaṃ anupatanti, kadāci te loko, tasmā tañcettha
tika-s0103t0:963_2: atthaṃ dassento “aṭṭhime”ti suttapadaṃ āhari. Ghāsacchādanādīnaṃ laddhi lābho, tāni
tika-s0103t0:963_3: eva vā laddhabbato lābho. Tadabhāvo alābho. Lābhaggahaṇena cettha tabbisayo anurodho
tika-s0103t0:963_4: gahito, alābhaggahaṇena virodho. Yasmā lohite sati tadupaghātavasena pubbo viya anurodhe
tika-s0103t0:963_5: sati virodho laddhāvasaro eva hoti, tasmā vuttaṃ “lābhe āgate alābho āgato evā”ti.
tika-s0103t0:966_0: 340. Vasati tattha phalaṃ tannimittakatāya pavattatīti vatthu, kāraṇanti vuttovāyamattho.
tika-s0103t0:966_1: Tenāha “āghātavatthūnīti āghātakāraṇānī”ti. Kopo nāmāyaṃ yasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ uppajjati,
tika-s0103t0:966_2: na tattha ekavārameva uppajjati, atha kho punapi uppajjatevāti vuttaṃ “bandhatī”ti.
tika-s0103t0:966_3: Atha vā yo paccayavisesena uppajjamāno āghāto savisaye baddho viya na vigacchati,
tika-s0103t0:966_4: punapi uppajjeyyeva, taṃ sandhāyāha “āghātaṃ bandhatī”ti. Taṃ panassa paccayavasena
tika-s0103t0:967_0: Taṃ kutettha labbhāti ettha tanti kiriyāparāmasanaṃ, padajjhāhārena ca attho veditabboti
tika-s0103t0:967_1: dassento “taṃ anatthacaraṇaṃ mā ahosī”tiādimāha. Kena kāraṇena laddhabbaṃ niratthakabhāvato.
tika-s0103t0:967_2: Kammassakā hi sattā, te kassa ruciyā dukkhitā, sukhitā vā bhavanti, tasmā kevalaṃ
tika-s0103t0:967_3: tasmiṃ mayhaṃ kujjhanamattaṃ evāti adhippāyo. Atha vā taṃ kopakaraṇamettha puggale
tika-s0103t0:967_4: kuto labbhā paramatthato kujjhitabbassa, kujjhanakassa ca abhāvato. Saṅkhāramattañhetaṃ,
tika-s0103t0:967_5: yadidaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ. Yaṃ “satto”ti vuccati, te saṅkhārā ittarakālā khaṇikā, kassa
tika-s0103t0:967_6: ko kujjhatīti attho. Lābhā nāma ke siyuṃ aññatra anuppattito.
tika-s0103t0:968_0: 341. Sattā āvasanti etesūti sattāvāsā. Nānattakāyā nānattasaññī ādibhedā sattanikāyā.
tika-s0103t0:968_1: Yasmā te te sattanikāyā tappariyāpannānaṃ sattānaṃ tāya eva tappariyāpannatāya ādhāro
tika-s0103t0:968_2: viya vattabbataṃ arahanti samudāyādhāratāya avayavassa yathā “rukkhe sākhā”ti, tasmā
tika-s0103t0:968_3: “sattānaṃ āvāsā, vasanaṭṭhānānīti attho”ti vuttaṃ. Suddhāvāsāpi sattāvāsova “na so,
tika-s0103t0:968_4: bhikkhave, sattāvāso sulabharūpo, yo mayā anāvutthapubbo iminā dīghena addhunā aññatra
tika-s0103t0:968_5: suddhāvāsehi devehī”ti vacanato. Yadi evaṃ kasmā idha na gahitāti tattha kāraṇamāha
tika-s0103t0:968_6: “asabbakālikattā”tiādi. Vehapphalo pana catutthaṃyeva sattāvāsaṃ bhajatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0103t0:969_0: 342. Opasamikoti vaṭṭadukkhassa upasamāvaho, taṃ pana vaṭṭadukkhaṃ kilesesu upasantesu
tika-s0103t0:969_1: upasamati, na aññathā, tasmā “kilesūpasamakaro”ti vuttaṃ. Takkaraṃ sambodhaṃ gametīti sambodhagāmī.
tika-s0103t0:970: Yasmiṃ devanikāye dhammadesanā na viyujjati savanasseva abhāvato, so pāḷiyaṃ “dīghāyuko devanikāyo”ti adhippetoti āha “asaññabhavaṃ vā arūpabhavaṃ vā”ti.
tika-s0103t0:971: 343. Anupubbato viharitabbāti anupubbavihārā. Anupaṭipāṭiyāti anukkamena. Samāpajjitabbavihārāti samāpajjitvā samaṅgino hutvā viharitabbavihārā.
tika-s0103t0:972: 344. Anupubbanirodhāti anupubbena anukkamena pavattetabbanirodhā. Tenāha “anupaṭipāṭiyā nirodhā”ti.
tika-s0103t0:975_0: 345. Yehi sīlādīhi samannāgato bhikkhu dhammasaraṇatāya dhammeneva nāthati īsati
tika-s0103t0:975_1: abhibhavatīti nāthoti vuccati, te tassa nāthabhāvakarā dhammā “nāthakaraṇā”ti vuttāti
tika-s0103t0:975_2: āha “sanāthā…pe… patiṭṭhākarā dhammā”ti. Tattha attano patiṭṭhākarāti yassa nāthabhāvakarā,
tika-s0103t0:975_3: tassa attano patiṭṭhāvidhāyino. Appatiṭṭho anātho, sappatiṭṭho sanāthoti patiṭṭhattho nāthattho.
tika-s0103t0:976_1: mittā etassa atthīti mitto, so vuttanayena kalyāṇo assa atthīti tassa atthitāmattaṃ
tika-s0103t0:976_2: kalyāṇamittapadena vuttaṃ. Assa tena sabbakālaṃ avijahitavāsoti taṃ dassetuṃ “kalyāṇasahāyo”ti
tika-s0103t0:976_3: vuttanti āha “tevassā”tiādi. Tevassāti te eva kalyāṇamittā assa bhikkhuno. Saha ayanatoti
tika-s0103t0:976_4: saha vattanato. Asamodhāne cittena, samodhāne pana cittena ceva kāyena ca sampavaṅko.
tika-s0103t0:977_0: Sukhaṃ vaco etasmiṃ anukūlagāhimhi ādaragāravavati puggaleti suvaco. Tenāha “sukhena
tika-s0103t0:977_1: vattabbo”tiādi. Khamoti khantā, tamevassa khamabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “gāḷhenā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t0:977_2: Vāmatoti micchā, ayoniso vā gaṇhāti. Paṭippharatīti paṭāṇikabhāvena tiṭṭhati. Padakkhiṇaṃ
tika-s0103t0:978_0: Uccāvacānīti vipulakhuddakāni. Tatrupagamanīyāti tatra tatra mahante, khuddake ca
tika-s0103t0:978_1: kamme sādhanavasena upāyena upagacchantiyā, tassa tassa kammassa nipphādanena samatthāyāti
tika-s0103t0:978_2: attho. Tatrupāyāyāti vā tatra tatra kamme sādhetabbe upāyabhūtāya.
tika-s0103t0:979_0: Dhamme assa kāmoti dhammakāmoti byadhikaraṇānaṃpi bāhirattho samāso hotīti katvā
tika-s0103t0:979_1: vuttaṃ. Kāmetabbato vā piyāyitabbato kāmo, dhammo; dhammo kāmo assāti dhammakāmo.
tika-s0103t0:979_2: Dhammoti pariyattidhammo adhippetoti āha “tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ piyāyatīti attho”ti.
tika-s0103t0:979_3: Samudāharaṇaṃ kathanaṃ samudāhāro, piyo samudāhāro etassāti piyasamudāhāro. Sayañcāti
tika-s0103t0:979_4: ettha ca-saddena “sakkacca”nti padaṃ anukaḍḍhati, tena sayañca sakkaccaṃ desetukāmo
tika-s0103t0:979_5: hotīti yojanā. Abhidhammo sattappakaraṇāni adhiko abhivisiṭṭho ca pariyattidhammoti
tika-s0103t0:979_6: katvā. Vinayo ubhatovibhaṅgā vinayanato kāyavācānaṃ. Abhivinayo khandhakaparivārā
tika-s0103t0:979_8: Dhammo eva piṭakadvayassāpi pariyattidhammabhāvato. Maggaphalāni abhidhammo nibbānadhammassa
tika-s0103t0:979_9: abhimukhoti katvā. Kilesavūpasamakāraṇaṃ pubbabhāgiyā tisso sikkhā saṅkhepato vivaṭṭanissito
tika-s0103t0:980_0: Kāraṇattheti nimittatthe. Kusaladhammanimittaṃ hissa vīriyārambho. Tenāha “tesaṃ
tika-s0103t0:980_1: adhigamatthāyā”ti. Kusalesu dhammesūti vā nipphādetabbe bhummaṃ yathā “cetaso avūpasame
tika-s0103t0:981_0: 346. Sakalaṭṭhenāti nissesaṭṭhena, anavasesapharaṇavasena cettha sakalaṭṭho veditabbo,
tika-s0103t0:981_1: asubhanimittādīsu viya ekadese aṭṭhatvā anavasesato gahetabbaṭṭhenāti attho. Tadārammaṇānaṃ
tika-s0103t0:981_2: dhammānanti taṃ kasiṇaṃ ārabbha pavattanakadhammānaṃ. Khettaṭṭhenāti uppattiṭṭhānaṭṭhena.
tika-s0103t0:981_3: Adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhenāti pavattiṭṭhānabhāvena. Yathā khettaṃ sassānaṃ uppattiṭṭhānaṃ vaḍḍhiṭṭhānañca,
tika-s0103t0:981_4: evametaṃ jhānaṃ taṃsampayuttānaṃ dhammānanti, yogino vā sukhavisesānaṃ kāraṇabhāvena.
tika-s0103t0:981_5: “Paricchinditvā” ti idaṃ uddhaṃ adhoti etthāpi yojetabbaṃ. Paricchinditvā eva hi
tika-s0103t0:981_6: sabbattha kasiṇaṃ vaḍḍhetabbaṃ. Tena tena vā kāraṇenāti tena tena upariādīsu kasiṇavaḍḍhanakāraṇena.
tika-s0103t0:981_7: Yathā kinti āha “ālokamiva rūpadassanakāmo”ti. Yathā dibbacakkhunā uddhaṃ ce rūpaṃ
tika-s0103t0:981_8: daṭṭhukāmo, uddhaṃ ālokaṃ pasāreti, adho ce adho, samantato ce rūpaṃ daṭṭhukāmo samantato
tika-s0103t0:982_1: aññassa vā kasiṇabhāvānupagamanadīpanatthaṃ, na hi aññena pasāritakasiṇaṃ tato aññena
tika-s0103t0:982_2: pasāritakasiṇabhāvaṃ upagacchati, evampi nesaṃ aññakasiṇasambhedābhāvo veditabbo.
tika-s0103t0:982_3: Na aññaṃ pathavīādi. Na hi udake ṭhitaṭṭhāne sasambhārapathavī atthi. Añño kasiṇasambhedoti
tika-s0103t0:982_4: āpokasiṇādinā saṅkaro. Sabbatthāti sabbesu sesakasiṇesu. Ekadese aṭṭhatvā anavasesapharaṇaṃ
tika-s0103t0:982_5: pamāṇassa aggahaṇato appamāṇaṃ. Teneva hi nesaṃ kasiṇasamaññā. Tathā cāha “tañhī”tiādi.
tika-s0103t0:982_6: Cetasā pharantoti bhāvanācittena ārammaṇaṃ karonto. Bhāvanācittañhi kasiṇaṃ parittaṃ
tika-s0103t0:982_7: vā vipulaṃ vā sakalameva manasi karoti, na ekadesaṃ.
tika-s0103t0:983_1: Tathā hi taṃ “viññāṇañca”nti vuccati. Kasiṇavasenāti yathāugghāṭitakasiṇavasena.
tika-s0103t0:983_2: Kasiṇugghāṭimākāse uddhaṃadhotiriyatā veditabbā. Yattakañhi ṭhānaṃ kasiṇaṃ pasāritaṃ,
tika-s0103t0:983_3: tattakaṃ ākāsabhāvanāvasena ākāso hotīti; evaṃ yattakaṃ ṭhānaṃ ākāsaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhitaṃ,
tika-s0103t0:983_4: tattakaṃ sakalameva pharitvā viññāṇassa pavattanato āgamanavasena viññāṇakasiṇepi
tika-s0103t0:983_5: uddhaṃadhotiriyatā vuttāti āha “kasiṇugghāṭiṃ ākāsavasena tattha pavattaviññāṇe uddhaṃadhotiriyatā veditabbā”ti.
tika-s0103t0:985_0: 347. Pathabhūtattāti tesaṃ pavattanupāyattā maggabhūtattā. Methunasamācāresūti sadārasantosaparadāragamanavasena
tika-s0103t0:985_1: duvidhesu methunasamācāresu. Tepi hi kāmetabbato kāmā nāma. Methunavatthūsūti methunassa
tika-s0103t0:985_2: vatthūsu tesu sattesu. Micchācāroti gārayhācāro. Gārayhatā cassa ekantanihīnatāya
tika-s0103t0:986_0: Sagottehi rakkhitā gottarakkhitā. Sahadhammikehi rakkhitā dhammarakkhitā. Sassāmikā
tika-s0103t0:986_1: sārakkhā. Yassā gamane raññā daṇḍo ṭhapito, sā saparidaṇḍā. Bhariyābhāvatthaṃ dhanena
tika-s0103t0:986_2: kītā dhanakkītā. Chandena vasantī chandavāsinī. Bhogatthaṃ vasantī bhogavāsinī. Paṭatthaṃ
tika-s0103t0:986_3: vasantī paṭavāsinī. Udakapattaṃ āmasitvā gahitā odapattakinī. Cumbaṭaṃ apanetvā gahitā
tika-s0103t0:986_4: obhatacumbaṭā. Karamarānītā dhajāhaṭā. Taṅkhaṇikā muhuttikā. Abhibhavitvā vītikkame
tika-s0103t0:986_5: micchācāro mahāsāvajjo, na tathā dvinnaṃ samānacchandatāya. “Abhibhavitvā vītikkamane
tika-s0103t0:986_7: na hoti abhibhuyyamānassā”ti vadanti. Sevanacitte sati payogābhāvo appamāṇaṃ yebhuyyena
tika-s0103t0:986_8: itthiyā sevanapayogassa abhāvato. Tasmiṃ asati puretaraṃ sevanacittassa upaṭṭhāpanepi
tika-s0103t0:986_9: tassā micchācāro na siyā, tathā purisassapi sevanapayogābhāveti. Tasmā attano ruciyā
tika-s0103t0:986_10: pavattitassa vasena tayo balakkārena pavattitassa vasena tayoti sabbepi aggahitaggahaṇena
tika-s0103t0:987_1: attho vutto. Tattha tanninnatāyāti tasmiṃ parabhaṇḍe lubbhanavasena ninnatāyāti ayamettha
tika-s0103t0:987_2: adhippāyo veditabbo. Abhipubbo vā jhā-saddo lubbhane niruḷho daṭṭhabbo. Upasaggavasena
tika-s0103t0:987_3: atthavisesavācino eva dhātusaddā. Adinnādānassa appasāvajjamahāsāvajjatā brahmajālavaṇṇanāyaṃ
tika-s0103t0:987_4: vuttāti āha “adinnādānaṃ viya appasāvajjā, mahāsāvajjā cā”ti. Tasmā “yassa bhaṇḍaṃ
tika-s0103t0:987_5: abhijjhāyati, tassa appaguṇatāya appasāvajjatā, mahāguṇatāya mahāsāvajjatā”tiādinā
tika-s0103t0:987_6: appasāvajjamahāsāvajjavibhāgo veditabbo. Attano pariṇāmanaṃ cittenevāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0103t0:988_0: Hitasukhaṃ byāpādayatīti yo naṃ uppādeti, tassa yaṃ pati cittaṃ uppādeti, tassa tassa
tika-s0103t0:988_1: sati samavāye hitasukhaṃ vināseti. Pharusavācāya appasāvajjamahāsāvajjatā brahmajālavaṇṇanāyaṃ
tika-s0103t0:988_2: vibhāvitāti āha “pharusavācā viyā”tiādi. Tasmā “yaṃ pati cittaṃ byāpādeti, tassa
tika-s0103t0:988_3: appaguṇatāya appasāvajjo, mahāguṇatāya mahāsāvajjo”tiādinā tadubhayavibhāgo veditabbo.
tika-s0103t0:988_4: “Aho vatā”ti iminā parassa accantāya vināsacintanaṃ dīpeti. Evañhi ssa dāruṇappavattiyā kammapathappavatti.
tika-s0103t0:989_1: gahaṇena. Micchā passatīti vitathaṃ passati. “Samphappalāpo viyā”ti iminā āsevanassa
tika-s0103t0:989_2: mandatāya appasāvajjataṃ, mahantatāya mahāsāvajjataṃ dasseti. Gahitākāraviparītatāti
tika-s0103t0:989_4: Tathābhāvenāti gahitākāreneva viparītākāreneva. Tassa diṭṭhigatikassa, tassa vā vatthuno
tika-s0103t0:990: Dhammatoti sabhāvato. Koṭṭhāsatoti phassapañcamakādīsu cittaṅgakoṭṭhāsesu ye koṭṭhāsā honti, tatoti attho.
tika-s0103t0:992_0: “Paṭipāṭiyā sattā”ti ettha nanu cetanā abhidhamme kammapathesu na vuttāti paṭipāṭiyā
tika-s0103t0:992_1: sattannaṃ kammapathabhāvo na yuttoti? Na, avacanassa aññahetukattā. Na hi tattha
tika-s0103t0:992_2: cetanāya akammapathappattattā kammapatharāsimhi avacanaṃ, kadāci pana kammapatho
tika-s0103t0:992_3: hoti, na sabbadāti kammapathabhāvassa aniyatattā avacanaṃ. Yadā pana kammapatho hoti,
tika-s0103t0:993_0: Etthāha – yadi cetanāya sabbadā kammapathabhāvābhāvato aniyato kammapathabhāvoti
tika-s0103t0:993_1: kammapatharāsimhi avacanaṃ, nanu abhijjhādīnampi kammapathabhāvaṃ appattānaṃ atthitāya
tika-s0103t0:993_2: aniyato kammapathabhāvoti tesampi kammapatharāsimhi avacanaṃ āpajjatīti? Nāpajjati
tika-s0103t0:993_3: kammapathatātaṃsabhāgatā hi tesaṃ tattha vuttattā. Yadi evaṃ cetanāpi tattha vattabbā
tika-s0103t0:993_4: siyāti? Saccametaṃ, sā pana pāṇātipātādikāvāti pākaṭo tassā kammapathabhāvoti na
tika-s0103t0:993_5: vuttaṃ siyā. Cetanāya hi “cetanāhaṃ, bhikkhave, kammaṃ vadāmi, tividhā, bhikkhave,
tika-s0103t0:993_6: kāyasañcetanā akusalaṃ kāyakamma”nti vacanato kammabhāvo pākaṭo; kammaṃyeva ca sugatiduggatīnaṃ,
tika-s0103t0:993_8: tassā kammapathabhāvo. Abhijjhādīnaṃ pana cetanāsamīhanabhāvena sucaritaduccaritabhāvo,
tika-s0103t0:993_10: pathabhāvo cāti na tathā pākaṭo kammapathabhāvoti te eva tena sabhāvena dassetuṃ
tika-s0103t0:993_11: abhidhamme cetanā kammapathabhāve na vuttā, atathājātiyattā vā cetanā tehi saddhiṃ
tika-s0103t0:993_12: na vuttāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Mūlaṃ patvāti mūladesanaṃ patvā, mūlasabhāvesu dhammesu desiyamānesūti attho.
tika-s0103t0:994_0: “Adinnādānaṃ sattārammaṇa”nti idaṃ “pañcasikkhāpadā parittārammaṇā evā”ti imāya pañhapucchakapāḷiyā
tika-s0103t0:994_1: virujjhati. Yañhi pāṇātipātādidussīlyassa ārammaṇaṃ, tadeva taṃveramaṇiyā ārammaṇaṃ.
tika-s0103t0:994_2: Vītikkamitabbavatthuto eva hi viratīti. Sattārammaṇanti vā sattasaṅkhātasaṅkhārārammaṇaṃ,
tika-s0103t0:994_3: tameva upādāya vuttanti na koci virodho. Tathā hi vuttaṃ sammohavinodaniyaṃ “yāni
tika-s0103t0:994_4: sikkhāpadāni ettha ‘sattārammaṇānī’ti vuttāni, tāni yasmā sattoti saṅkhaṃ gate saṅkhāreyeva
tika-s0103t0:994_5: ārammaṇaṃ karontī”ti. esa nayo ito paresupi. Visabhāgavatthuno “itthī puriso”ti gahetabbato
tika-s0103t0:994_6: “sattārammaṇo”ti eke. “Eko diṭṭho, dve sutā”tiādinā samphappalāpena diṭṭhasutamutaviññātavasena.
tika-s0103t0:994_7: Tathā abhijjhāti ettha tathā-saddo “diṭṭhasutamutaviññātavasenā” tidampi upasaṃharati,
tika-s0103t0:994_8: na sattasaṅkhārārammaṇatameva dassanādivasena abhijjhāyanato. “Natthi sattā opapātikā”ti
tika-s0103t0:994_9: pavattamānāpi micchādiṭṭhi tebhūmakadhammavisayā evāti adhippāyenassā saṅkhārārammaṇatā
tika-s0103t0:994_10: vuttā. Kathaṃ pana micchādiṭṭhiyā sabbe tebhūmakadhammā ārammaṇaṃ hotīti? Sādhāraṇato.
tika-s0103t0:994_11: “Natthi sukatadukkaṭānaṃ kammānaṃ phalaṃ vipāko”ti pavattamānāya atthato rūpārūpāvacaradhammāpi gahitā eva hontīti.
tika-s0103t0:995_0: Sukhabahulatāya rājāno hasamānāpi “ghātethā”ti vadanti, hāso pana nesaṃ attavūpasamādiaññavisayoti
tika-s0103t0:995_1: āha “sanniṭṭhāpaka…pe… hotī”ti. Majjhattavedano na hoti, sukhavedanova ettha sambhavatīti.
tika-s0103t0:995_2: Musāvādo lobhasamuṭṭhāno sukhavedano vā siyā majjhattavedano vā, dosasamuṭṭhāno dukkhavedano
tika-s0103t0:995_3: vāti musāvādo tivedano. Iminā nayena sesesupi yathārahaṃ vedanābhedo veditabbo.
tika-s0103t0:996_0: Dosamohavasena dvimūlakoti sampayuttamūlameva sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tassa hi mūlaṭṭhena
tika-s0103t0:996_1: upakārakabhāvo. Nidānamūle pana gayhamāne “lobhamohavasenapī”ti vattabbaṃ siyā. Āmisakiñjakkhahetupi
tika-s0103t0:996_2: pāṇaṃ hananti. Tenevāha – “lobho nidānaṃ kammānaṃ samudayāyā”tiādi. Sesesupi eseva nayo.
tika-s0103t0:998_1: desitattā. Verahetutāya verasaññitaṃ pāṇātipātādipāpadhammaṃ maṇati “mayi idha ṭhitāya
tika-s0103t0:998_2: kathaṃ āgacchasī”ti tajjantī viya nīharatīti veramaṇī, viramati etāyāti vā “viramaṇī”ti
tika-s0103t0:998_3: vattabbe niruttinayena “veramaṇī”ti vuttaṃ. Samādānavasena uppannā virati samādānavirati.
tika-s0103t0:998_5: Kilesānaṃ samucchindanavasena pavattā maggasampayuttā virati samucchedavirati. Kāmañcettha
tika-s0103t0:998_6: pāḷiyaṃ viratiyeva āgatā, sikkhāpadavibhaṅge pana cetanāpi āharitvā dassitāti tadubhayampi
tika-s0103t0:998_7: gaṇhanto “cetanāpi vattanti viratiyopī”ti āha. Anabhijjhā hi mūlaṃ patvāti kammapathakoṭṭhāse
tika-s0103t0:998_8: “anabhijjhā”ti vuttadhammo mūlato alobho kusalamūlaṃ hotīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0103t0:999_0: Dussīlyārammaṇā tadārammaṇajīvitindriyādiārammaṇā kathaṃ dussīlyāni pajahantīti taṃ
tika-s0103t0:999_1: dassetuṃ “yathā panā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Pajahantīti veditabbā pāṇātipātādīhi viramaṇavaseneva
tika-s0103t0:999_2: pavattanato. Atha tadārammaṇabhāve, na so tāni pajahati. Na hi tadeva ārabbha taṃ
tika-s0103t0:1000: Anabhijjhā…pe… viramantassāti abhijjhaṃ pajahantassāti attho. Na hi manoduccaritato virati atthi anabhijjhādīheva tappahānasiddhito.
tika-s0103t0:1002_0: 348. Ariyānameva vāsāti ariyavāsā anariyānaṃ tādisānaṃ asambhavato. Ariyāti cettha
tika-s0103t0:1002_1: ukkaṭṭhaniddesena khīṇāsavā gahitā, te ca yasmā tehi sabbakālaṃ avirahitavāsā eva,
tika-s0103t0:1002_2: tasmā vuttaṃ “ariyā eva vasiṃsu vasanti vasissantī”ti. Tattha vasiṃsūti nissāya vasiṃsu.
tika-s0103t0:1002_4: “saṅkhāyekaṃ paṭisevati, adhivāseti, parivajjeti, vinodetī”ti vuttesu apassenesu
tika-s0103t0:1003: Ñāṇādayoti ñāṇañceva taṃsampayuttadhammā ca. Tenāha “ñāṇanti vutte”tiādi. Tattha vattabbaṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva.
tika-s0103t0:1004: Ārakkhakiccaṃ sādheti sativepullappattattā. “Carato”tiādinā niccasamādānaṃ dasseti, taṃ vikkhepābhāvena daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0103t0:1005_0: Pabbajjupagatāti yaṃ kiñci pabbajjaṃ upagatā, na samitapāpā. Bhovādinoti jātimattabrāhmaṇe
tika-s0103t0:1005_1: vadati. Pāṭekkasaccānīti tehi tehi diṭṭhigatikehi pāṭiyekkaṃ gahitāni “idameva sacca”nti
tika-s0103t0:1005_2: abhiniviṭṭhāni diṭṭhisaccādīni. Diṭṭhigatānipi hi “idameva sacca”nti gahaṇaṃ upādāya
tika-s0103t0:1005_3: “saccānī”ti voharīyanti. Tenāha “idamevā”tiādi. Nīhaṭānīti attano santānato nīharitāni
tika-s0103t0:1005_4: apanītāni. Gahitaggahaṇassāti ariyamaggādhigamato pubbe gahitassa diṭṭhigāhassa.
tika-s0103t0:1006: Natthi etāsaṃ vayo vekalyanti avayāti āha “anūnā”ti, anavasesāti attho. Esanāti heṭṭhā vuttakāmesanādayo.
tika-s0103t0:1008_0: Paccavekkhaṇāya phalaṃ kathitanti paccavekkhaṇamukhena ariyaphalaṃ kathitaṃ. Adhigate
tika-s0103t0:1008_1: hi aggaphale sabbaso rāgādīnaṃ anuppādadhammataṃ pajānāti, tañca pajānanaṃ paccavekkhaṇañāṇanti.
tika-s0103t0:1010_0: Phalañca te sampayuttadhammā cāti phalasampayuttadhammā, ariyaphalasabhāvā sampayuttā
tika-s0103t0:1010_1: dhammāti attho. Phalasampayuttadhammāti phaladhammā ceva taṃsampayuttadhammā cāti
tika-s0103t0:1010_2: evamettha attho veditabbo. Dvīsupi ṭhānesu paññāva kathitā sammā dassanaṭṭhena sammādiṭṭhi,
tika-s0103t0:1010_3: sammā jānanaṭṭhena sammāñāṇanti ca. Atthi hi dassanajānanānaṃ savisaye pavattiākāraviseso,
tika-s0103t0:1010_4: svāyaṃ heṭṭhā dassito eva. Phalasamāpattidhammāti phalasamāpattiyaṃ dhammā, phalasamāpattisahagatadhammāti
tika-s0103t0:1010_5: attho. Ariyaphalasampayuttadhammāpi hi sabbaso paṭipakkhato vimuttataṃ upādāya “vimuttī”ti
tika-s0103t0:1010_6: vattabbataṃ labhanti. Kenaci pana yathā asekkhā phalapaññā dassanakiccaṃ upādāya
tika-s0103t0:1010_7: “sammādiṭṭhī”ti vuttā, jānanakiccaṃ upādāya “sammāñāṇa”ntipi vuttā eva; evaṃ ariyaphalasamādhi
tika-s0103t0:1010_9: tipi vutto. Evañca katvā “anāsavaṃ cetovimutti”nti dutiyavimuttiggahaṇañca samatthitaṃ hotīti.
tika-s0103t0:1014_0: 349. Okappanāti balavasaddhā. Āyatiṃ bhikkhūnaṃ avivādahetubhūtaṃ tattha tattha bhagavatā
tika-s0103t0:1014_1: desitānaṃ atthānaṃ saṅgāyanaṃ saṅgīti, tassa ca kāraṇaṃ ayaṃ suttadesanā tathā pavattattāti
tika-s0103t0:1014_2: vuttaṃ “saṅgītipariyāyanti sāmaggiyā kāraṇa”nti. Samanuñño satthā ahosi “paṭibhātu
tika-s0103t0:1014_3: ta,ṃ sāriputta, bhikkhūnaṃ dhammiṃ kathā”ti ussāhetvā ādito paṭṭhāya yāva pariyosānā
tika-s0103t0:1014_4: suṇanto, sā panettha bhagavato samanuññatā “sādhu, sādhū”ti anumodanena pākaṭā jātāti
tika-s0103t0:1014_5: vuttaṃ “anumodanena samanuñño ahosī”ti. Jinabhāsito nāma jāto, na sāvakabhāsito.
tika-s0103t0:1014_6: Yathā hi rājayuttehi likhitapaṇṇaṃ yāva rājamuddikāya na lañjitaṃ hoti, na tāva “rājapaṇṇa”nti
tika-s0103t0:1014_7: saṅkhyaṃ gacchati, lañjitamattaṃ pana rājapaṇṇaṃ nāma hoti. Evameva “sādhu, sādhu
tika-s0103t0:1014_9: lañjitattā ayaṃ suttanto jinabhāsito nāma jāto āhaccavacano. Yaṃ panettha atthato
tika-s0103t0:1015_0: 350. Āvuso bhikkhaveti sāvakānaṃ ālapananti sāvakānaṃ āmantanavasena ālapanasamudācāro,
tika-s0103t0:1015_1: na kevalaṃ “bhikkhave”ti, so pana buddhānaṃ ālapanaṃ. Tenāha “buddhā hī”tiādi. Satthusamudācāravasena
tika-s0103t0:1015_2: asamudācāro evettha satthu uccaṭṭhāne ṭhapanaṃ. Sampati āgatattā katthaci na nibaddho
tika-s0103t0:1015_3: vāso etesanti anibaddhavāsā, antevāsikā. Kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā sappāyasenāsanaṃ gavesantā
tika-s0103t0:1015_4: yaṃ kiñci disaṃ gacchantīti disāgamanīyā. Idāni tamatthaṃ vitthārato dassetuṃ “buddhakāle”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t0:1016_1: ñatvā tadanurūpaṃ tadanurūpameva deti. Mohacaritassapi kāmaṃ ānāpānassatikammaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0103t0:1016_2: sappāyaṃ, kammaṭṭhānabhāvanāya pana bhājanabhūtaṃ kātuṃ sammohavigamāya paṭhamaṃ
tika-s0103t0:1016_4: ācikkhatī”ti. Saddhācaritassa visesato purimā cha anussatiyo sappāyā, tāsaṃ pana
tika-s0103t0:1016_6: Ñāṇacaritassāti buddhicaritassa, tassa pana maraṇassati, upasamānussati, catudhātuvavatthānaṃ,
tika-s0103t0:1016_7: āhārepaṭikūlasaññā visesato sappāyā, tesaṃ pana upakāradhammadassanatthaṃ “aniccatādi…pe…
tika-s0103t0:1016_8: kathetī”ti vuttaṃ. Tatthevāti satthu santike eva. Temāsikaṃ paṭipadanti tīhi māsehi
tika-s0103t0:1017_0: Ime bhikkhūti imissā dhammadesanāya bhājanabhūtā bhikkhū. “Evaṃ āgantvā gacchante
tika-s0103t0:1017_1: pana bhikkhū”ti idaṃ “buddhakāle”tiādinā taduddesikavasena vuttabhikkhū sandhāya
tika-s0103t0:1017_2: vuttaṃ, na “ime bhikkhū”ti anantaraṃ vuttabhikkhū. Tenāha “pesetī”ti. Apalokethāti
tika-s0103t0:1017_4: yebhuyyavasena vuttaṃ. Āyasmā hi dhammasenāpati bhikkhū yebhuyyena sotāpattiphalaṃ
tika-s0103t0:1017_5: pāpetvā vissajjeti “evamete niyatā sambodhiparāyaṇā”ti. Āyasmā pana mahāmoggallāno
tika-s0103t0:1017_6: “sabbāpi bhavūpapatti jigucchitabbāvā”ti bhikkhū yebhuyyena uttamatthaṃyeva pāpeti.
tika-s0103t0:1018_0: Sāvakehi vinetuṃ sakkuṇeyyā sāvakaveneyyā nāma na sāvakeheva vinetabbāti dassento
tika-s0103t0:1018_1: āha “sāvakaveneyyā nāmā”tiādi. Dasadhā mātikaṃ ṭhapetvāti ekakato paṭṭhāya yāva dasakā
tika-s0103t0:1018_2: dasadhā dasadhā mātikaṃ ṭhapetvā vibhattoti dasuttaro. Dasuttaro gatotipi dasuttaroti
tika-s0103t0:1018_3: ekakato paṭṭhāya yāva dasakā dasahi uttaro adhiko hutvā gato pavattotipi dasuttaro.
tika-s0103t0:1018_4: Ekekasmiṃ pabbeti ekakato paṭṭhāya yāva dasakā dasasu pabbesu ekekasmiṃ pabbe. Dasa
tika-s0103t0:1018_5: dasa pañhāti “katamo dhammo bahukāro appamādo kusalesu dhammesū”tiādinā dasa dasa
tika-s0103t0:1018_6: pañhā. Visesitāti vissajjitā. Dasuttaraṃ pavakkhāmīti desiyamānaṃ desanaṃ nāmakittanamukhena
tika-s0103t0:1018_7: paṭijānāti vaṇṇabhaṇanatthaṃ. Pavakkhāmīti pakārehi vakkhāmi. Tathā hettha paññāsādhikānaṃ
tika-s0103t0:1018_8: pañcannaṃ pañhasatānaṃ vasena desanā pavattā. Dhammanti idha dhamma-saddo pariyattipariyāyo
tika-s0103t0:1018_9: “idha bhikkhu dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇātī”tiādīsu viya. Suttalakkhaṇo cāyaṃ dhammoti āha
tika-s0103t0:1018_10: “dhammanti sutta”nti. Svāyaṃ dhammo yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjamānassa nibbānāvaho.
tika-s0103t0:1018_11: Tato eva vaṭṭadukkhasamucchedāya hoti, sa cāyamassa ānubhāvo sabbesaṃ khandhānaṃ
tika-s0103t0:1019_0: Uccaṃ karontoti udaggaṃ uḷāraṃ paṇītaṃ katvā dassento, paggaṇhantoti attho. Pemaṃ
tika-s0103t0:1019_1: janentoti bhattiṃ uppādento. Idañca desanāya paggaṇhanaṃ buddhānampi āciṇṇaṃ evāti
tika-s0103t0:1021: 351. (Ka) kāra-saddo upa-saddena vināpi upakāratthaṃ vadati, “bahukārā, bhikkhave, mātāpitaro puttāna”ntiādīsu viyāti āha “bahukāroti bahūpakāro”ti.
tika-s0103t0:1022_0: (Kha) vaḍḍhane vutte nānantariyatāya uppādanaṃ vuttameva hotīti “bhāvetabboti vaḍḍhetabbo”ti
tika-s0103t0:1022_1: vutto. Uppādanapubbikā hi vaḍḍhanāti. Nanu ca “eko dhammo uppādetabbo”ti uppādanaṃ
tika-s0103t0:1022_2: pettha visuṃ gahitaṃ evāti? Aññavisayattā tassa nāyaṃ virodho. Tathā hi “eko dhammo
tika-s0103t0:1022_3: pariññeyyo”ti tīhipi pariññāhi pariññeyyataṃ vatvāpi “eko dhammo pahātabbo”ti pahātabbatā vuttā.
tika-s0103t0:1024: (Gha) pahānānupassanāyāti pajahanavasena pavattāya anupassanāya. Missakavasena cetaṃ anupassanāgahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0103t0:1029_0: Sabbattha mātikāsūti dukādivasena vuttāsu sabbāsu mātikāsu. Ettha ca āyasmā dhammasenāpati
tika-s0103t0:1029_1: te bhikkhū bhāvanāya niyojetvā uttamatthe patiṭṭhāpetukāmo paṭhamaṃ tāva bhāvanāya
tika-s0103t0:1029_2: upakāradhammaṃ uddesavasena dassento “eko dhammo bahukāro”ti vatvā tena upakārakena
tika-s0103t0:1029_3: upakattabbaṃ dassento “eko dhammo bhāvetabbo”ti āha. Ayañca bhāvanā vipassanāvasena
tika-s0103t0:1029_4: icchitāti āha “eko dhammo pariññeyyo”ti. Pariññā ca nāma yāvadeva pahātabbapajahanatthāti
tika-s0103t0:1029_5: āha “eko dhammo pahātabbo”ti. Pajahantena ca hānabhāgiyaṃ nīharitvā visesabhāgiye
tika-s0103t0:1029_6: avaṭṭhātabbanti āha “eko dhammo hānabhāgiyo, eko dhammo visesabhāgiyo”ti. Visesabhāgiye
tika-s0103t0:1029_8: siddhameva hotīti āha “eko dhammo duppaṭivijjho, eko dhammo uppādetabbo”ti. Tayidaṃ
tika-s0103t0:1029_9: dvayaṃ abhiññeyyādijānanena hotīti āha “eko dhammo abhiññeyyo”ti. Abhiññeyyañce abhiññātaṃ,
tika-s0103t0:1029_10: sacchikātabbaṃ sacchikatameva hotīti. Ettāvatā ca niṭṭhitakiccova hoti, nāssa uttari
tika-s0103t0:1029_11: kiñci karaṇīyanti evaṃ tāva mahāthero ekakavasena tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ paṭipattividhiṃ
tika-s0103t0:1029_12: uddisanto imāni dasa padāni iminā anukkamena uddisi.
tika-s0103t0:1030_0: (Ka) evaṃ aniyamato uddiṭṭhadhamme sarūpato niyametvā dassetuṃ “katamo eko dhammo”tiādinā
tika-s0103t0:1030_1: desanaṃ ārabhi. Tena vuttaṃ “iti āyasmā sāriputto”tiādi. Esa nayo dukādīsu. Veḷukāroti
tika-s0103t0:1030_2: veno. So hi veḷuvikārehi kilañjādikaraṇena “veḷukāro”ti vutto. Anto, bahi ca sabbagatagaṇṭhiṃ
tika-s0103t0:1030_3: nīharaṇena niggaṇṭhiṃ katvā. Ekekakoṭṭhāseti ekakādīsu dasasu koṭṭhāsesu ekekasmiṃ koṭṭhāse.
tika-s0103t0:1031_0: Sabbatthakaṃ upakārakanti sabbatthakameva sammā paṭipattiyā upakāravantaṃ. Idāni
tika-s0103t0:1031_1: tamatthaṃ vitthārato dassetuṃ “ayañhī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Vipassanāgabbhaṃ gaṇhāpaneti
tika-s0103t0:1031_2: yathā upari vipassanā paripaccati tikkhā visadā hutvā maggena ghaṭeti, evaṃ pubbabhāgavipassanāvaḍḍhane.
tika-s0103t0:1031_4: attho. Esa nayo ito paresupi. Ṭhānāṭṭhānesūti ṭhāne, aṭṭhāne ca jānitabbe. Mahāvihārasamāpattiyanti
tika-s0103t0:1031_6: ādikāni saṅgaṇhāti. Aṭṭhasu vijjāsūti ambaṭṭhasutte āgatanayāsu aṭṭhasu vijjāsu.
tika-s0103t0:1032: Teneva bhagavā thometīti yojanā. Nanti appamādaṃ.
tika-s0103t0:1033_0: Thāmasampannenāti ñāṇabalasamannāgatena. Dīpetvāti “evampi appamādo kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ
tika-s0103t0:1033_1: sampādane bahupakāro”ti pakāsetvā. Yaṃ kiñci anavajjapakkhikamatthaṃ appamāde pakkhipitvā
tika-s0103t0:1034_0: (Kha) kāyagatāsatīti rassaṃ akatvā niddeso, niddesena vā etaṃ samāsapadaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0103t0:1034_1: “Aṭṭhikāni puñjakitāni terovassikāni…pe… pūtīni cuṇṇikajātānī”ti evaṃ pavattamanasikāro
tika-s0103t0:1034_3: Ettha uppannasatiyāti etasmiṃ yathāvutte ekūnatiṃsavidhe ṭhāne uppannāya satiyā.
tika-s0103t0:1034_4: Sukhasampayuttāti nippariyāyato sukhasampayuttā, pariyāyato pana catutthajjhāne upekkhāpi
tika-s0103t0:1035_0: (Ga) paccayabhūto ārammaṇādivisayopi ārammaṇabhāvena vaṇo viya āsave paggharati,
tika-s0103t0:1035_1: so sampayogasambhavābhāvepi saha āsavehīti sāsavo. Tathā upādānānaṃ hitoti upādāniyo.
tika-s0103t0:1038_0: (Cha) idha pana vipassanānantaro maggo “ānantariko cetosamādhī”ti adhippeto. Kasmā?
tika-s0103t0:1038_1: Vipassanāya anantarattā, attano vā pavattiyā anantaraṃ phaladāyakattā. Saddatthato
tika-s0103t0:1038_2: pana anantaraṃ phalaṃ anantaraṃ, tasmiṃ anantare niyuttā, taṃ vā arahati, anantarapayojanoti vā ānantariko.
tika-s0103t0:1040_0: (Jha) attano phalaṃ āharatīti āhāro, paccayoti āha “āhāraṭṭhitikāti paccayaṭṭhitikā”ti.
tika-s0103t0:1040_1: Ayaṃ eko dhammoti ayaṃ paccayasaṅkhāto eko dhammoti paccayatāsamaññena ekaṃ katvā
tika-s0103t0:1041: (Ña) akuppā cetovimuttīti arahattaphalavimutti akuppabhāvena ukkaṃsagatattā. Aññathā sabbāpi phalasamāpattiyo akuppā eva paṭipakkhehi akopanīyattā.
tika-s0103t0:1042_0: Abhiññāyāti “abhiññeyyo”ti ettha laddhaabhiññāya. Pariññāyāti etthāpi eseva nayo.
tika-s0103t0:1042_2: pahānasacchikiriyānaṃ ekāvāratāya pariññāya saheva ijjhanato. Sacchikātabboti visesato
tika-s0103t0:1042_3: phalaṃ kathitaṃ. Ekasmiṃyeva sattame eva pade labbhati. Phalaṃ pana anekesupi padesu
tika-s0103t0:1042_4: labbhati paṭhamaṭṭhamanavamadasamesu labbhanato. Yasmā taṃ nippariyāyato dasame eva
tika-s0103t0:1042_5: labbhati, itaresu pariyāyato tasmā “labbhati evā”ti sāsaṅkaṃ vadati.
tika-s0103t0:1043_0: Sabhāvato vijjamānāti yena bahukārādisabhāvena desitā, tena sabhāvena paramatthato
tika-s0103t0:1043_1: upalabbhamānā. Yāthāvāti aviparītā. Tathāsabhāvāti taṃsabhāvā. Na tathā na hontīti
tika-s0103t0:1043_2: avitathattā tathāva honti. Tato eva vuttappakārato aññathā na hontīti pañcahipi padehi
tika-s0103t0:1043_3: tesaṃ dhammānaṃ yathābhūtameva vadati. Sammāti ñāyena. Yaṃ pana ñātaṃ, taṃ hetuyuttaṃ
tika-s0103t0:1043_4: kāraṇayuttameva hotīti āha “hetunā kāraṇenā”ti. Okappanaṃ janesīti jinavacanabhāvena
tika-s0103t0:1046_1: sabbattha appamādo viya upakārakā”ti etena satisampajaññānampi appamādassa viya sabbattha
tika-s0103t0:1046_2: upakārakatā pakāsitā hoti atthato nātivilakkhaṇattā tato tesaṃ. Satiavippavāso hi
tika-s0103t0:1046_3: appamādo, so ca atthato sabbattha avijahitā sati eva, sā ca kho ñāṇasampayuttā eva
tika-s0103t0:1047: (Kha) tesaṃ pañcasatamattānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pubbabhāgapaṭipattivasena desitattā pubbabhāgā kathitā.
tika-s0103t0:1048_0: (Cha) ayonisomanasikāro saṃkilesassa mūlakāraṇabhāvena pavatto hetu, paribrūhanabhāvena
tika-s0103t0:1048_1: pavatto paccayo. Yonisomanasikārepi eseva nayo. Yathā ca sattānaṃ saṃkilesāya, visuddhiyā
tika-s0103t0:1048_2: ca paccayabhūtā ayonisomanasikāro, yonisomanasikāroti “ime dve dhammā duppaṭivijjhā”ti
tika-s0103t0:1048_3: ettha nīharitvā vuttā, evaṃ imehi dhammā nīharitvā vattabbāti dassento “tathā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0103t0:1048_4: Tattha asubhajjhānādayo cattāro visaṃyogā nāma kāmayogādipaṭipakkhabhāvato. “Evaṃ
tika-s0103t0:1048_5: pabhedā”ti iminā “avijjābhāgino dhammā, vijjābhāgino dhammā, kaṇhā dhammā, sukkā
tika-s0103t0:1049: (Jha) paccayehi samecca sambhuyya katattā pañcakkhandhā saṅkhatā dhātu. Kenaci anabhisaṅkhatattā nibbānaṃ asaṅkhatā dhātu.
tika-s0103t0:1050: (Ña) tisso vijjā vijjanaṭṭhena, viditakaraṇaṭṭhena ca vijjā. Vimuttīti arahattaphalaṃ paṭipakkhato sabbaso vimuttattā.
tika-s0103t0:1051_0: Abhiññādīnīti abhiññāpaññādīni. Ekakasadisāneva purimavāre viya vibhajja kathetabbato.
tika-s0103t0:1051_1: Maggo kathitoti ettha “maggova kathito”ti evamatthaṃ aggahetvā “maggo kathitovā”ti
tika-s0103t0:1051_2: evamattho gahetabbo “anuppāde ñāṇa”nti iminā phalassa gahitattā. Sacchikātabbapade
tika-s0103t0:1051_3: phalaṃ kathitanti etthāpi “phalameva kathita”nti aggahetvā “phalaṃ kathitamevā”ti
tika-s0103t0:1051_4: attho gahetabbo vijjāggahaṇena tadaññassa saṅgahitattā. Esa nayo ito paresupi evarūpesu ṭhānesu.
tika-s0103t0:1054_0: 353. (Cha) soti anāgāmimaggo. Sabbaso kāmānaṃ nissaraṇaṃ samucchedavasena pajahanato.
tika-s0103t0:1054_1: Āruppe arahattamaggo nāma arūpajjhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā uppanno aggamaggo. Puna uppattinivāraṇatoti
tika-s0103t0:1054_2: rūpānaṃ uppattiyā sabbaso nivāraṇato. Nirujjhanti saṅkhārā etenāti nirodho, aggamaggo.
tika-s0103t0:1054_3: Tena hi kilesavaṭṭe nirodhite itarampi vaṭṭadvayaṃ nirodhitameva hoti. Tassa pana
tika-s0103t0:1054_4: nirodhassa pariyosānattā aggaphalaṃ “nirodho”ti vattabbataṃ labbhatīti āha “arahattaphalaṃ
tika-s0103t0:1054_5: nirodhoti adhippeta”nti. “Arahattaphalena hi nibbāne diṭṭhe” ti idaṃ arahattamaggena
tika-s0103t0:1054_6: nibbānadassanassāyaṃ nibbattīti katvā vuttaṃ. Evañca katvā “arahattasaṅkhātanirodhassa
tika-s0103t0:1054_7: paccayattā” ti idampi vacanaṃ samatthitaṃ hoti.
tika-s0103t0:1055_0: (Ja) atītaṃ sārammaṇanti atītakoṭṭhāsārammaṇaṃ ñāṇaṃ, atītā khandhāyatanadhātuyo
tika-s0103t0:1055_1: ārabbha pavattanakañāṇanti attho. “Maggo kathitovā”ti avadhāraṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, tathā
tika-s0103t0:1056: (Ña) āsavānaṃ khaye ñāṇanti ca āsavānaṃ khayante ñāṇanti adhippāyo, aññathā maggo kathito siyā.
tika-s0103t0:1059: 354. (Ka) dārumayaṃ cakkaṃ dārucakkaṃ, tathā ratanacakkaṃ. Āṇaṭṭhena dhammo eva dhammacakkaṃ. Iriyāpathānaṃ aparāparappavattito iriyāpathacakkaṃ, tathā sampatticakkaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0103t0:1060_0: Anucchavike deseti puññakiriyāya, sammāpaṭipattiyā anurūpadese. Sevanaṃ kālena kālaṃ
tika-s0103t0:1060_1: upasaṅkamanaṃ. Bhajanaṃ bhattivasena payirupāsanaṃ. Attano sammā ṭhapananti attano
tika-s0103t0:1060_2: cittasantānassa yoniso ṭhapanaṃ saddhādīsu nivesananti āha “sace”tiādi. Idamevettha
tika-s0103t0:1060_3: pamāṇanti idameva pubbekatapuññatāsaṅkhātaṃ sampatticakkamettha etesu sampatticakkesu
tika-s0103t0:1060_4: pamāṇabhūtaṃ itaresaṃ kāraṇabhāvato. Tenāha “yena hī”tiādi. So eva ca katapuñño puggalo
tika-s0103t0:1060_5: attānaṃ sammā ṭhapeti akatapuññassa tadabhāvato. Paṭhamo lokiyova, tatthāpi kāmāvacarova.
tika-s0103t0:1060_6: Idhāti imasmiṃ dasuttarasutte. Pubbabhāge lokiyāvāti maggassa pubbabhāge pavattanakā
tika-s0103t0:1061: (Ca) kāmayogavisaṃyogo anāgāmimaggo, diṭṭhiyogavisaṃyogo sotāpattimaggo, itare dve arahattamaggoti evaṃ anāgāmimaggādivasena veditabbā.
tika-s0103t0:1062_0: (Cha) paṭhamassa jhānassa lābhinti yvāyaṃ appaguṇassa paṭhamassa jhānassa lābhī,
tika-s0103t0:1062_1: taṃ. Kāmasahagatā saññāmanasikārā samudācarantīti tato vuṭṭhitaṃ ārammaṇavasena kāmasahagatā
tika-s0103t0:1062_2: hutvā saññāmanasikārā samudācaranti codenti tudenti. Tassa kāmānupakkhandānaṃ saññāmanasikārānaṃ
tika-s0103t0:1062_3: vasena so paṭhamajjhānasamādhi hāyati parihāyati, tasmā “hānabhāgiyo samādhī”ti vutto.
tika-s0103t0:1062_4: Tadanudhammatāti tadanurūpasabhāvo. “Sati santiṭṭhatī”ti idaṃ micchāsatiṃ sandhāya
tika-s0103t0:1062_5: vuttaṃ. Yassa hi paṭhamajjhānānurūpasabhāvā paṭhamajjhānaṃ santato paṇītato disvā
tika-s0103t0:1062_6: assādayamānā apekkhamānā abhinandamānā nikanti hoti, tassa nikantivasena so paṭhamajjhānasamādhi
tika-s0103t0:1062_7: neva hāyati, na vaḍḍhati, ṭhitikoṭṭhāsiko hoti, tena vuttaṃ “ṭhitibhāgiyo samādhī”ti.
tika-s0103t0:1063_0: Avitakkasahagatāti avitakkaṃ dutiyajjhānaṃ santato paṇītato manasi karoto ārammaṇavasena
tika-s0103t0:1063_2: dutiyajjhānādhigamatthāya codenti tudenti, tassa upari dutiyajjhānupakkhandānaṃ saññāmanasikārānaṃ
tika-s0103t0:1063_3: vasena so paṭhamajjhānasamādhi visesabhūtassa dutiyajjhānassa uppattipadaṭṭhānatāya
tika-s0103t0:1063_4: “visesabhāgiyo samādhī”ti vutto. Nibbidāsahagatāti tameva paṭhamajjhānalābhiṃ jhānato
tika-s0103t0:1063_5: vuṭṭhitaṃ nibbidāsaṅkhātena vipassanāñāṇena sahagatā. Vipassanāñāṇañhi jhānaṅgesu
tika-s0103t0:1063_6: pabhedena upaṭṭhahantesu nibbindati ukkaṇṭhati, tasmā “nibbidā”ti vuccati. Samudācarantīti
tika-s0103t0:1063_7: nibbānasacchikaraṇatthāya codenti tudenti. Virāgūpasañhitoti virāgasaṅkhātena nibbānena
tika-s0103t0:1063_8: upasañhito. Vipassanāñāṇañhi “sakkā iminā maggena virāgaṃ nibbānaṃ sacchikātu”nti
tika-s0103t0:1063_10: eva nāma. Tassa tesaṃ saññāmanasikārānaṃ vasena so paṭhamajjhānasamādhi ariyamaggapaṭivedhassa
tika-s0103t0:1063_12: sabbā samāpattiyo. Attho veditabboti hānabhāgiyādiattho tāva vitthāretvā veditabbo.
tika-s0103t0:1064: Maggo kathito catunnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ uddhaṭattā. Phalaṃ kathitaṃ sarūpeneva.
tika-s0103t0:1067_1: hi tameva vibhajati. Tenāha “pītiṃ pharamānā uppajjatī”tiādi.“So imameva kāyaṃ vivekajena
tika-s0103t0:1067_2: pītisukhena abhisandetī”tiādinā nayena pītiyā, sukhassa ca pharaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ. Sarāgavirāgatādivibhāgadassanavasena
tika-s0103t0:1067_3: paresaṃ ceto pharamānā. Ālokapharaṇeti kasiṇālokassa pharaṇe sati teneva ālokena
tika-s0103t0:1067_4: pharitappadese. Tassa samādhissa rūpadassanapaccayattā paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ paccavekkhaṇanimittaṃ.
tika-s0103t0:1068_0: Pītipharaṇatā sukhapharaṇatāti ārammaṇe ṭhatvā catutthajjhānassa uppādanato tā “pādā
tika-s0103t0:1068_1: viyā”ti vuttā. Cetopharaṇatā ālokapharaṇatāti taṃtaṃkiccasādhanato tā “hatthā viyā”ti
tika-s0103t0:1068_2: vuttā. Abhiññāpādakajjhānaṃ samādhānassa sarīrabhāvato “majjhimakāyo viyā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t0:1069_1: sukhanti vuttaṃ “appitappitakkhaṇe sukhattā paccuppannasukho”ti. Purimassa purimassa
tika-s0103t0:1069_2: vasena pacchimaṃ pacchimaṃ laddhāsevanatāya santatarapaṇītatarabhāvappatti hotīti
tika-s0103t0:1070_1: kilesānaṃ paṭippassambhanabhāvaṃ. Laddhattā pattattā tabbhāvaṃ upagatattā. Lokiyasamādhissa
tika-s0103t0:1070_2: paccanīkāni nīvaraṇapaṭhamajjhānanikantiādīni niggahetabbāni, aññe kilesā vāretabbā,
tika-s0103t0:1070_3: imassa pana arahattasamādhissa paṭippassaddhasabbakilesattā na niggahetabbaṃ, vāretabbañca
tika-s0103t0:1070_4: atthīti maggānantaraṃ samāpattikkhaṇe ca appayogena adhigatattā, ṭhapitattā ca aparihānavasena
tika-s0103t0:1070_6: satiyā satibahulatāya sato eva nāmāti dasseti, “yathāparicchinnakālavasenā”ti etena
tika-s0103t0:1070_7: paricchindanasatiyā satoti dasseti. Sesesu ñāṇaṅgesu. Pañcañāṇikoti ettha vuttasamādhimukhena
tika-s0103t0:1071: Maggo kathito indriyasīsena sammāvāyāmādīnaṃ kathitattā. Phalaṃ kathitaṃ asekkhānaṃ sīlakkhandhādīnaṃ kathitattā.
tika-s0103t0:1074: 356. Maggo kathitoti ettha vattabbaṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva.
tika-s0103t0:1076_1: evaṃ ādinā hetunā. Nayenāti “yathā ime saṅkhārā etarahi, evaṃ atīte, anāgate ca aniccā
tika-s0103t0:1076_2: saṅkhatā paṭiccasamuppannā khayadhammā vayadhammā virāgadhammā nirodhadhammā”ti atītānāgatesu
tika-s0103t0:1076_3: nayananayena. Kāmaṃ khīṇāsavassa sabbesaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ aniccatādi sudiṭṭhā suppaṭividdhā,
tika-s0103t0:1076_4: taṃ pana asammohanavasena kiccato, vipassanāya pana ārammaṇakaraṇavasenāti dassento
tika-s0103t0:1076_5: āha “vipassanāñāṇena sudiṭṭhā hontī”ti. Kilesavasena uppajjamāno pariḷāho vatthukāmasannissayo,
tika-s0103t0:1076_6: vatthukāmāvassayo cāti vuttaṃ “dvepi sapariḷāhaṭṭhena aṅgārakāsu viyā”ti. Ninnassevāti
tika-s0103t0:1076_7: [ninnassa (aṭṭhakathāyaṃ)] ninnabhāvasseva. Anto vuccati lāmakaṭṭhena taṇhā. Byantaṃ
tika-s0103t0:1076_9: vigatantibhūtaṃ (?)] Nittaṇhanti attho”ti. Idha sattake. Bhāvetabbapade maggo kathito
tika-s0103t0:1079_1: eva venayiko”ti, tassā ādibrahmacariyikāya. Kā pana sāti āha “paññāyā”ti. Sikkhattayasaṅgahassāti
tika-s0103t0:1079_4: (aṭṭhakathāyaṃ)]. Ādibhūtāyāti paṭhamāvayavabhūtāya, desanāvasena cetaṃ vuttaṃ. Uppattikāle
tika-s0103t0:1079_5: pana natthi maggadhammānaṃ ādimajjhapariyosānatā ekacittuppādapariyāpannattā ekajjhaṃyeva
tika-s0103t0:1079_6: uppajjanato. Pemanti daḷhabhatti, taṃ pana vallabhavasena pavattamānaṃ gehasitasadisaṃ
tika-s0103t0:1079_7: hotīti “gehasitapema”nti vuttaṃ. Garukaraṇavasena pavattiyā garu cittaṃ etassāti
tika-s0103t0:1079_8: garucitto, tassa bhāvo garucittabhāvo, garumhi garukāro. “Kilesā na uppajjantī”ti
tika-s0103t0:1079_9: vatvā tattha kāraṇamāha “ovādānusāsaniṃ labhatī”ti. Garūnañhi santike ovādānusāsaniṃ
tika-s0103t0:1079_10: labhitvā yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjantassa kilesā na uppajjanti. Tenāha “tasmā”tiādi.
tika-s0103t0:1080_0: (Cha) petāti petamahiddhikā. Asurānanti devāsurānaṃ. Petāsurā pana petā evāti tesaṃ
tika-s0103t0:1080_1: petehi saṅgaho avuttasiddhova. Āvāhanaṃ gacchantīti sambhogasaṃsaggamukhena peteheva
tika-s0103t0:1081_1: viya. Paccayesu appiccho paccayaappiccho, cīvarādipaccayesu icchārahito. Adhigamaappicchoti
tika-s0103t0:1081_3: icchārahito. Dhutaṅgaappicchoti dhutaṅgesu appiccho dhutaṅgavibhāvena icchārahito.
tika-s0103t0:1081_5: ca dhutaṅgaguṇassa ca nigūhanena chādanena. Sampajjatīti nippajjati sijjhati. No
tika-s0103t0:1081_6: mahicchassāti mahatiyā icchāya samannāgatassa, icchaṃ vā mahantassa no sampajjati
tika-s0103t0:1082_2: adhippeto, na gaṇasaṅgaṇikābhāvamattanti dasseti. Kammanti yogakammaṃ.
tika-s0103t0:1083_0: Sattehi kilesehi ca saṅgaṇanaṃ samodhānaṃ saṅgaṇikā, sā āramitabbaṭṭhena ārāmo etassāti
tika-s0103t0:1083_1: saṅgaṇikārāmo, tassa. Tenāha “gaṇasaṅgaṇikāya cevā”tiādi. Āraddhavīriyassāti paggahitavīriyassa,
tika-s0103t0:1083_2: tañca kho upadhiviveke ninnatāvasena “ayaṃ dhammo”ti vacanato. Esa nayo ito paresupi.
tika-s0103t0:1083_3: Vivaṭṭasannissitaṃyeva hi samādhānaṃ idhādhippetaṃ, tathā paññāpi. Kammassakatāpaññāya
tika-s0103t0:1083_4: hi patiṭṭhato kammavasena “bhavesu nānappakāro anattho”ti jānanto kammakkhayakarañāṇaṃ
tika-s0103t0:1083_5: abhipattheti, tadatthañca ussāhaṃ karoti. Mānādayo sattasantānaṃ saṃsāre papañcenti
tika-s0103t0:1086_2: puggalassa parisuddhiyā padhānabhūtaṃ aṅgaṃ. Tenāha “parisuddhabhāvassa padhānaṅga”nti.
tika-s0103t0:1086_3: Samathassa visuddhibhāvo vodānaṃ paguṇabhāvena paricchinnanti āha “aṭṭha paguṇasamāpattiyo”ti.
tika-s0103t0:1086_4: Vigatupakkilesañhi “paguṇa”nti vattabbataṃ labbhati, na saupakkilesaṃ hānabhāgiyādibhāvappattito.
tika-s0103t0:1086_6: kaṅkhāvitaraṇavisuddhi. Yasmā nāmarūpaṃ nāma sappaccayameva, tasmā taṃ pariggaṇhantena
tika-s0103t0:1086_7: atthato tassa sappaccayatāpi pariggahitā eva hotīti vuttaṃ “diṭṭhivisuddhīti sappaccayaṃ
tika-s0103t0:1086_8: nāmarūpadassana”nti. Yasmā pana nāmarūpassa paccayaṃ pariggaṇhantena tīsu addhāsu
tika-s0103t0:1086_10: vuttaṃ yathā kaṅkhāvitaraṇavisuddhi “dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇa”nti vuccati. Maggāmagge ñāṇanti
tika-s0103t0:1086_11: maggāmagge vavatthapetvā ṭhitañāṇaṃ. Ñāṇanti idha taruṇavipassanā kathitā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
tika-s0103t0:1086_14: maggo pana kathanti? Maggo bahukārapade virāgaggahaṇena gahito. Vakkhati hi “idha
tika-s0103t0:1087_2: Saññānānattanti ettha rūpasaññādisaññānānattampi labbhateva, taṃ pana kāmasaññādiggahaṇeneva
tika-s0103t0:1087_3: gayhati. Kāmasaññādīti ādi-saddena byāpādasaññādīnaṃ gahaṇaṃ. Saññānidānattā papañcasaṅkhānaṃ
tika-s0103t0:1087_4: “saññānānattaṃ paṭicca saṅkappanānatta”nti vuttaṃ, “yaṃ saṅkappeti, taṃ papañcetī”ti
tika-s0103t0:1087_5: vacanato “saṅkappanānattaṃ paṭicca chandanānatta”nti vuttaṃ. Chandanānattanti ca
tika-s0103t0:1087_6: taṇhāchandassa nānattaṃ. Rūpapariḷāhoti rūpavisayo rūpābhipatthanāvasena pavatto
tika-s0103t0:1087_7: kilesapariḷāho. Saddapariḷāhoti etthāpi eseva nayo. Kileso hi uppajjamāno appattepi
tika-s0103t0:1087_8: ārammaṇe patto viya pariḷāhova uppajjati. Tathābhūtassa pana kilesachandassa vasena
tika-s0103t0:1087_10: Tathā pariyesantassa sace taṃ rūpādi labbheyya, taṃ sandhāyāha “pariyesanādinānattatāya
tika-s0103t0:1088_1: attho. Āhāraṃ pariggaṇhantassāti gamanādivasena āhāraṃ paṭikkūlato pariggaṇhantassa.
tika-s0103t0:1090_0: 360. (Jha) nijjarakāraṇānīti pajahanakāraṇāni. Imasmiṃ abhiññāpade maggo kathīyatīti
tika-s0103t0:1090_1: katvā “ayaṃ heṭṭhā..pe… puna gahitā”ti vuttaṃ. Tathā hi vakkhati “idha abhiññāpade
tika-s0103t0:1090_2: maggo kathito” kiñcāpi nijjiṇṇā micchādiṭṭhīti ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. Yathā micchādiṭṭhi
tika-s0103t0:1090_3: vipassanāya nijjiṇṇāpi na samucchinnāti samucchedappahānadassanatthaṃ puna gahitā,
tika-s0103t0:1090_4: evaṃ micchāsaṅkappādayopi vipassanāya pahīnāpi asamucchinnatāya idha puna gahitāti
tika-s0103t0:1091_0: Ettha cāti “sammāvimuttipaccayā ca aneke kusalā dhammā bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchantī”ti
tika-s0103t0:1091_1: etasmiṃ pāḷipade. Ettha ca samucchedavasena, paṭippassaddhivasena ca paṭipakkhadhammā
tika-s0103t0:1091_2: sammadeva vimuccanaṃ sammāvimutti, tappaccayā ca maggaphalesu aṭṭha indriyāni bhāvanāpāripūriṃ
tika-s0103t0:1091_3: upagacchantīti maggasampayuttānipi saddhādīni indriyāni uddhaṭāni. Maggavasena hi
tika-s0103t0:1091_4: phalesu bhāvanā pāripūrī nāmāti. Abhinandanaṭṭhenāti ativiya sinehanaṭṭhenidañhi.
tika-s0103t0:1091_5: Somanassindriyaṃ ukkaṃsagatasātasabhāvaṃ sampayuttadhamme sinehantaṃ tementaṃ viya
tika-s0103t0:1092: Addhena saha chaṭṭhāni pañhasatāni, paññāsādhikāni saha pañhasatānīti attho.
tika-s0103t0:1093_0: Ettha ca āyasmā dhammasenāpati “dasasu nāthakaraṇadhammesu patiṭṭhāya dasakasiṇāyatanāni
tika-s0103t0:1093_1: bhāvento dasaāyatanamukhena pariññaṃ paṭṭhapetvā pariññeyyadhamme parijānanto dasamicchatte,
tika-s0103t0:1093_2: dasaakusalakammapathe ca pahāya dasakusalakammapathesu ca avaṭṭhito dasasu ariyāvāsesu
tika-s0103t0:1093_3: āvasitukāmo dasasaññā uppādento dasanijjaravatthūni abhiññāya dasaasekkhadhamme adhigacchatī”ti
tika-s0103t0:1093_4: tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ovādaṃ matthakaṃ pāpento desanaṃ niṭṭhapesi. Pamodavasena paṭiggaṇhanaṃ
tika-s0103t0:1093_5: abhinandananti āha “sādhu sādhūti abhinandantā sirasā sampaṭicchiṃsū”ti. Tāya attamanatāyāti
tika-s0103t0:1093_7: attho. Imameva suttaṃ āvajjamānāti imasmiṃ sutte tattha tattha āgate abhiññeyyādibhede
tika-s0103t0:1093_8: dhamme abhijānanādivasena samannāharantā. Saha paṭisambhidāhi…pe… patiṭṭhahiṃsūti
tika-s0103t0:1093_9: attano upanissayasampannatāya, therassa ca desanānubhāvena yathāraddhaṃ vipassanaṃ
tika-s0103t0:1097: Therānaṃ mahākassapādīnaṃ vaṃso paveṇī anvayo etassāti theravaṃsanvayo, tena; catumahānikāyesu theriyenāti attho.
tika-s0103t0:1098_1: Ayañhi āgamo brahmajālādīsu, mahāpadānādīsu, sampasādanīyādīsu ca tattha tattha visesato
tika-s0103t0:1098_2: buddhaguṇānaṃ pakāsanavasena pavattoti. Tathā hi vuttaṃ ādito “saddhāvahaguṇassā”ti.
tika-s0103t0:1101_0: Mūlakaṭṭhakathāsāranti pubbe vuttaṃ dīghanikāyamahāaṭṭhakathāsārameva puna nigamanavasena
tika-s0103t0:1101_1: vadati. Atha vā mūlakaṭṭhakathāsāranti porāṇaṭṭhakathāsu atthasāraṃ, tenetaṃ dasseti
tika-s0103t0:1101_2: “dīghanikāyamahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ atthasāraṃ ādāya imaṃ sumaṅgalavilāsiniṃ karonto sesamahānikāyānampi
tika-s0103t0:1101_3: mūlakaṭṭhakathāsu idha viniyogakkhamaṃ atthasāraṃ ādāyayeva akāsi”nti.
tika-s0103t0:1102_2: mūlakaṭṭhakathāsāraṃ ādāyā”ti ca. Tena puññena. Hotu sabbo sukhī lokoti kāmāvacarādivibhāgo
tika-s0103t0:1102_3: sabbopi sattaloko yathārahaṃ bodhittayādhigamanavasena sampattena nibbānasukhena
tika-s0103t0:1102_4: sukhito hotūti sadevakassa lokassa accantasukhādhigamāya attano puññaṃ pariṇāmeti.
tika-s0103t0:1103: Parimāṇato sādhikaṭṭhavīsasahassanavutibhāṇavārā niṭṭhitāti. Parimāṇato sādhikaṭṭhavīsasahassamattaganthena dīghanikāyaṭīkā racitācariyadhammapālena.
tika-s0103t0:1105: Rakkhaṇatthāya sakkaccaṃ, mañjūsaṃ viya kāritanti. (etthantare pāṭho pacchā likhito)
